original: Child: ... [mind="I'm so thirsty..."/]
translation: Child: ……[mind="好渴……"/]

original: Out of the corner of your eye,[p/] you spot a child watching you from afar.
translation: 余光看到远处，[p/]有个小孩正盯着你。

original: Her eyes are fixed on the flasks of apple juice.
translation: 更确切地说是盯着这几瓶苹果汁。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: ...How about 20sp for [i]three[/i] flasks?
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: ……20 银币<u>三瓶</u>如何？

original: Merchant: O-[p/][s/]Of course, sir!
translation: Merchant: 当、[p/][s/]当然可以！

original: :The Kingdom of Wyverngarde:[p/] established several centuries ago by the seven High Archmages.
translation: 几世纪前，七位高阶奥术法师建立了维文加德王国。

original: The kingdom is currently ruled by King Olivier de Wyverngarde and the mages of his nobility.
translation: 王国目前处于奥利维尔·维文加德国王和奥术法师贵族的统治之下。

original: The nobility will tell you that our "marvelous kingdom" is a land of prosperity and happiness...
translation: 贵族大肆宣扬我们“伟大的王国”是一片繁荣幸福的土地……

original: A land where its people share the wealth and succor provided by the kingdom’s magic.
translation: 一片人民享受着王国魔法带来富足的土地。

original: Child: T-[p/][s/]Thank you! [mind="I haven’t had anything like this in years…"/]
translation: Child: 谢、[p/][s/]谢谢你！ [mind="好久没喝过这样的东西了……"/]

original: The child's passing thoughts tell you [i]exactly[/i] how much “succor” the kingdom is sharing.
translation: 她一闪而过的思绪昭示了，这个王国的“援助” <u>多么</u>徒有虚名。

original: Ruby Tymora: I didn’t know you had such an eye for rural economics.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 没想到你还会关心城乡经济。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: W-[p/]Well,[p/] I suppose I just have a good intuition for this sort of thing.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 欸、[p/]啊，[p/]我只是对某些事的直觉很准罢了。

original: Ruby Tymora: ...Or did you use another kind of "Eye"?
translation: Ruby Tymora: ……是直觉还是说你有别样的“眼睛”呢？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Ruby Tymora: Don’t get me wrong.[p/] Your so-called "Eye of Horus" is an amazing gift.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 别误会。[p/]你那名为“荷鲁斯之眼”的才能很了不起。

original: Ruby Tymora: You should take every opportunity to hone it.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 你应该竭尽所能去磨练它。

original: Ruby Tymora: ...But try to be more subtle next time.
translation: Ruby Tymora: ……但最好下次隐晦点用。

original: Ruby: If [i]I[/i] can see through you,[p/] others will be able to as well.
translation: Ruby: 如果<u>我</u>能看穿你的能力，那其他人也可以。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: R-[p/][s/]Right...
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 好、[p/][s/]好的……

original: Ruby Tymora: Anyways,[p/] I did some asking around while you were...[p/] haggling.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 言归正传，[p/]当你在……[p/]讨价还价的时候，我在附近打听了一下。

original: Ruby Tymora: Supposedly,[p/] the McCoy Tavern should be north of here.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 照理说，[p/] 麦考伊的酒馆就在北边。

original: Ruby Tymora: If my tip is correct,[p/] [i]this[/i] should be the place.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 不出意外，[p/]<u>这</u>就是我们在找的酒馆了。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Wait…[p/] [i]This[/i] is the McCoy tavern?
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 呃……[p/]<u>这里</u>是麦考伊的酒馆？

original: With the state it's in,[p/] calling it a "tavern" is being pretty generous.
translation: 这样的建筑可完全称不上酒馆……

original: You find it hard to believe that [i]this[/i] has a secret meeting place for dissidents…
translation: 很难相信<u>这里</u>是供持不同政见的人秘密聚会的地方……

original: But now that you think about it,[p/] maybe [i]that's[/i] the entire point.
translation: 但仔细一想，[p/]或许<u>这正是</u>能作为秘密集会点的原因。

original: Ruby Tymora: The tavern has been shut down for years.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 酒馆已经停业很多年了。

original: Ruby Tymora: Nowadays,[p/] Flinhart just uses it to host his rallies.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 现在，[p/]它只是弗林哈特用来举办集会的地方。

original: Ruby Tymora: Although,[p/] I [i]do[/i] wonder how they’ve been keeping themselves afloat for this long.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 虽然我<u>很</u>好奇他们这么多年是如何维持生计的。

original: Flinhart McCoy: Hey![p/][s/] You lot![p/][s/] The McCoy Tavern is closed!
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 喂！[p/][s/]你们！[p/][s/]麦考伊酒馆已经关门了！

original: A gruff man approaches your carriage as you step out of it.
translation: 刚下马车，一个外表粗暴的男人走上前来。

original: He’s eyeing you and Ms. Tymora,[p/] a clear look of contempt on his face.
translation: 他看着你和泰摩拉女士，[p/]明显在蔑视你们。

original: Ruby Tymora: …I take it that [i]you’re[/i] Flinhart McCoy?
translation: Ruby Tymora: ……这么说，<u>你就是</u>弗林哈特·麦考伊？

original: Flinhart McCoy: I am![p/][s/] What of it?!
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 我是！[p/][s/]有何贵干？！

original: Ruby Tymora: Sorry for not writing ahead of time...
translation: Ruby Tymora: 未能提前通知，深表歉意……

original: Ruby Tymora: But I'm Ruby Tymora.[p/] I wanted to speak with you.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 我是鲁比·泰摩拉。[p/]我想和你聊聊。

original: Flinhart McCoy: “Ruby Tymora”…?
translation: Flinhart McCoy: “鲁比·泰摩拉”……？

original: Flinhart McCoy: Wait…[p/][s/] [i]The[/i] Ruby Tymora?!
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 欸……[p/][s/]<u>那个</u>鲁比·泰摩拉？！

original: Any animosity he initially had immediately vanishes.
translation: 他先前的敌意立刻烟消云散了。

original: He lets out a laugh.[p/] It's as if he were meeting an old friend.
translation: 他仰天大笑，[p/]仿佛是旧友重逢。

original: Flinhart McCoy: Why didn’t you say so?![p/][s/] Come on in!
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 怎么不早说？！[p/][s/]快进来！

original: You didn't expect someone like [i]him[/i] to know about Ms. Tymora.
translation: 没想到像<u>他这样的人</u>会认识泰摩拉女士。

original: But you suppose it makes sense.[p/] They both fight against the same enemy.
translation: 但你并不觉得意外，[p/]毕竟他们有着共同的敌人。

original: Albeit,[p/] in different ways...
translation: 虽然，[p/]是从不同意义上……

original: Flinhart McCoy: Sorry about the mess.[p/] We haven't exactly been-...
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 抱歉里面这么乱，[p/]说实话我们已经很久没……

original: Flinhart McCoy: Well,[p/] anyways...[p/] What brings you here?
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 唉！话说回来，[p/]什么风把你吹来了？

original: Flinhart McCoy: I take it you didn’t journey all this way to see my wrecked tavern.
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 你肯定不是专程跑来看我破破烂烂的酒馆的。

original: Ruby Tymora: I'm here on behalf of a client.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 我是替我的一个委托人来的。

original: Ruby: We have a proposition that you might be interested in.
translation: Ruby: 有个你可能会感兴趣的提案。

original: Ruby Tymora: ...Is there anywhere where we could talk more privately?
translation: Ruby Tymora: ……这儿有没有可以避人耳目的地方？

original: Flinhart McCoy: Sure,[p/] the kitchen is empty.
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 当然有，[p/]厨房就可以。

original: Ruby Tymora: Wonderful.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 好。

original: Ruby Tymora: Tyrion,[p/] stay here while I speak with McCoy.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 提利昂，[p/]在这等我。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: W-[p/][s/]What…?[p/] Don't you need my help?
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 哈、[p/][s/]哈？[p/]你不用我帮忙吗？

original: Ruby Tymora: There’s no need for that.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 没必要。

original: Like hell there's no need for that!
translation: 没必要个鬼！

original: If she's trying to make a deal with Flinhart,[p/][s/] you can [i]easily[/i] read his thoughts to help her!
translation: 如果要和弗林哈特谈判，[p/][s/]你可以<u>轻而易举地</u>用读心来帮她！

original: Ruby Tymora: ...
translation: Ruby Tymora: ……

original: You desperately want to object.[p/] But she shoots you a stern look that causes you to freeze up.
translation: 你超想接着反驳她，[p/]但只需她狠狠盯你一眼，就能让你打消这个念头。

original: You slowly look away from her.
translation: 你慢慢地移开视线。

original: You spend some time waiting alone in the tavern's dining area.
translation: 独自一人在酒馆的就餐区等待。

original: It's already been hours since Ms. Tymora and Flinhart went to talk in the kitchen.
translation: 泰摩拉女士和弗林哈特已经谈了好几个小时了。

original: You can hear faint murmurs from behind the closed door,[p/] and you’ve been resisting the urge to eavesdrop.
translation: 虽然透过紧闭的门传来了一些模糊的只言片语，[p/]但你强忍着偷听他们在聊什么的欲望。

original: But even from here,[p/] you can tell that their conversation is slowly becoming more frustrated.
translation: 虽然不知道内容，[p/]但从语气中也能得知他们的谈判并不顺利。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: ...It looks like they're going to be a while.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: ……看来一时半会儿是结束不了了。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: ...
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: ……

original: Well,[p/] it’s a good thing you always bring a chess set around.
translation: 所幸你总是带着一套国际象棋。

original: You bring out the small chessboard that you’ve carried around since you were a child.
translation: 拿出自幼以来一直带在身边的棋盘。

original: Chess can be played with one person.[p/] And you’ve always taken advantage of that.
translation: 国际象棋是可以一个人玩的，[p/]你总是自己和自己下棋。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: …
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: ……

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Checkmate.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 将军。

original: You win against yourself.[p/] This time as black.
translation: 你又赢了自己。[p/]这次是黑方胜。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: *mutters* I’ve played ten games already…[p/] And I’ve won seven out of ten times as black.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: *嘀咕*已经十局了……[p/]黑棋赢了七次。

original: Celeste McCoy: …Hello?
translation: Celeste McCoy: ……你好？

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: *mutters* Statistically,[p/] white is more likely to win.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert:  *嘀咕*从数据上讲，白棋更容易赢才对。

original: Celeste McCoy: Um…?
translation: Celeste McCoy: 嗯……？

original: Unbeknownst to you,[p/] you're thinking out loud.
translation: 不知不觉中，你把自己想的东西都说出来了。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: *mutters* So why am I performing so much [i]better[/i] when playing as black?
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: *嘀咕*那为什么我黑棋下得<u>更好</u>呢？

original: Celeste McCoy: Hello?
translation: Celeste McCoy: 那个……

original: You still don't notice her.[p/] And you're verbalizing your thoughts just as fast as you're thinking them.
translation: 你还没注意到她，[p/]还在继续把自己的想法说出来。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: *mutters* Am I becoming overconfident as white because it has a first-move advantage?
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: *嘀咕*是不是因为白棋先动所以太自信了呢？

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Or perhaps that [i]very[/i] advantage is affecting my choices and making me play in a suboptimal manner…
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 或许<u>白棋先动的</u>优势影响了我的抉择，导致我一直选择一种次优的策略……

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: If a personal quirk is making me play illogically,[p/] then I need to correct it.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 如果因为个人的癖好导致我无法理性下棋的话，[p/]那我得想想办法更正一下。

original: Celeste McCoy: Hey!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 喂！

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Ah![p/][s/] What?!
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 啊！[p/][s/]谁？！

original: Tyrion: H-[p/][s/]How long have you been standing there?!
translation: Tyrion: 你、[p/][s/]你什么时候来的？！

original: Celeste McCoy: It’s about time you noticed me!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 你也差不多该注意到我了吧！

original: Celeste McCoy: I’ve been trying to get your attention for a while now!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 你也太能走神了吧！我一直都在叫你！

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: O-[p/]Oh,[p/] sorry…
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 啊、[p/]啊……[p/]抱歉……

original: Celeste McCoy: Do you know where my dad is?
translation: Celeste McCoy: 你知道我爸爸在哪吗？

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: ...Your dad?
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: ……你爸爸？

original: Celeste McCoy: Flinhart McCoy.[p/] I’m his daughter: Celeste.
translation: Celeste McCoy: 弗林哈特·麦考伊。[p/]我是他的女儿塞莱斯特。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Oh,[p/] Flinhart is speaking with my mo-[p/]… mentor, right now.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 哦，弗林哈特正和我妈[p/]……导师聊天呢。

original: Celeste McCoy: Aw,[p/] I wanted to show him something.
translation: Celeste McCoy: 啊哦，[p/]我还有东西想让他看看呢。

original: Celeste McCoy: Do you know when they’ll be done?
translation: Celeste McCoy: 那你知道什么时候结束吗？

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: I don’t know.[p/] They've been speaking in the kitchen for a while now.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 不知道，[p/]他们已经聊了有一会儿了。

original: You hear Flinhart and Ms. Tymora’s voices getting louder and more frustrated.[p/] But Celeste doesn’t seem to notice.
translation: 弗林哈特与泰摩拉女士争论的声音越来越响，[p/]不过塞莱斯特貌似并没注意到。

original: Her eyes seem to be focused on your chessboard.
translation: 她倒是对你的棋盘很感兴趣。

original: Celeste McCoy: This is chess, right?
translation: Celeste McCoy: 这是国际象棋对吧？

original: Celeste: Are you playing against someone?
translation: Celeste: 你在和谁下棋吗？

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Oh,[p/] I’m playing against myself, actually…
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 呃，[p/]我其实在和自己下棋……

original: Celeste McCoy: O-[p/]Oh…[p/] That’s…
translation: Celeste McCoy: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/]那可真是……

original: You feel a judgmental stare.
translation: 感到一股对你评头论足的视线。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: ...Playing alone helps me develop new strategies.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: ……自己与自己下棋有助我思考新对策。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Plenty of professionals do it.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 职业选手都这么做。

original: Celeste McCoy: Hey,[p/] I’m not the type to shame a man for playing with himself.
translation: Celeste McCoy: 嘛，[p/]我又不会因为你在“自娱自乐”就瞧不起你。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: T-[p/][s/]That's...
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 所、[p/][s/]所以说这是……

original: Celeste McCoy: Relax,[p/] I’m just joking.
translation: Celeste McCoy: 别紧张，[p/]我就是开个玩笑。

original: Celeste McCoy: Anyways,[p/] if you’re still waiting for your mentor,[p/] do you want to play a game?
translation: Celeste McCoy: 不过，[p/]既然我们都在等人，[p/]要不你就和我下棋吧？

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Oh,[p/] you know how to play?
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 哦？[p/]你会下棋？

original: Celeste McCoy: Sure![p/] I’ve read about this before.
translation: Celeste McCoy: 那是当然！我以前读过一点。

original: She's [i]read[/i] about it?
translation: 她<u>读过</u>一点？

original: Celeste McCoy: Ugh...[p/] This table is so dusty...
translation: Celeste McCoy: 呜哇……[p/]桌子好脏……

original: Celeste takes a seat on the other side of the table.
translation: 塞莱斯特坐在了桌子对面。

original: She tries to set up her side of the board but fumbles with the pieces.[p/] She stares at one of them, confused.
translation: 她试着摆棋，但摆着摆着就停下了。[p/]她歪着头，满脸困惑地瞪着这些棋子。

original: Celeste McCoy: Um...[p/] How do I arrange these things again?
translation: Celeste McCoy: 啊……[p/]这些棋子怎么摆来着？

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: ...
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: ……

original: A part of you regrets accepting her challenge.[p/] But it would be impolite to back out now.
translation: 突然就后悔同意和她下棋了，[p/]但现在把她赶走可太没礼貌了。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Here...[p/] I'll arrange them for you.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 来……[p/]我来帮你摆吧。

original: Celeste McCoy: Thanks!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 谢啦！

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: …Checkmate.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: ……将军。

original: You defeat her in two moves...
translation: 你仅用两步就赢了她……

original: Celeste McCoy: ...
translation: Celeste McCoy: ……

original: Celeste McCoy: Wait,[p/][s/] what?![p/][s/] Already?!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 哈？[p/][s/]什么情况？！[p/][s/]我输了？这么快？！

original: Celeste McCoy: How did you do that?!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 你怎么赢的这么快？！

original: You decide [i]against[/i] telling her what the name of that mate was.
translation: 你打算<u>藏招</u>，不告诉她这步棋是怎么下的。

original: Celeste McCoy: Rematch me![p/][s/] I want a do over!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 再来一局！[p/][s/]我要再来一局！

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Sure,[p/] why not?
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 好啊，[p/]没问题。

original: It's not as if you have anything better to do.
translation: 反正也没有别的事做。

original: Celeste McCoy: ...
translation: Celeste McCoy: ……

original: Celeste’s brow furrows as she tries to decide on her next move.
translation: 塞莱斯特紧皱着眉，思考着下一步怎么走。

original: …But she hasn’t realized that the game is already finished.
translation: ……但她明显没意识到这局早就结束了。

original: Celeste McCoy: …Here!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 这里！

original: She moves her knight into a position to attack your Queen.
translation: 她跳马试图威胁你的皇后。

original: It should have stopped your assault on her king. [p/] But…
translation: 本应该能阻止你对国王的进攻，但是……

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Checkmate.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 将军。

original: A scholar's mate this time.
translation: 这次是四回合将杀。

original: Celeste McCoy: What?!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 哈啊？！

original: Celeste: Come on![p/][s/] How do you keep doing that?!
translation: Celeste: 什么啊！[p/][s/]你是怎么做到的呀！？

original: You look at the closed door to the kitchen.
translation: 你看了看厨房紧闭的门。

original: Flinhart and Ms. Tymora's discussion is becoming louder.
translation: 弗林哈特和泰摩拉女士的讨论愈演愈烈。

original: It doesn’t sound like they’ll be done anytime soon.
translation: 听起来不像是快要结束的样子。

original: Celeste McCoy: Again![p/][s/] I’ll definitely beat you this time!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 再来！[p/][s/]这次我肯定能赢你！

original: For someone who had clearly [i]never[/i] played before,[p/] she’s quickly improving with each game.
translation: 在<u>零基础</u>的人里，[p/]她算进步相当快的了。

original: It's impressive.[p/] She's observing your strategies and adapting them to her playstyle.
translation: 令人惊叹的是，[p/]她能观察学习你的下法，并融会贯通形成自己的风格。

original: With the way she's playing now,[p/] she could even defeat a nationally ranked noble.
translation: 她进步飞快，[p/]甚至现在已经能打败排行榜上的贵族棋手了。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Checkmate.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 将军。

original: …But even so.[p/] You've been playing this game for a [i]lot[/i] longer than she has.
translation: ……话虽这么说，[p/]你下赢她还是<u>轻而易举</u>的。

original: Celeste McCoy: How are you always one step ahead of me?!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 你怎么总能知道我下一步要怎么走？！

original: Celeste McCoy: It's like you're reading my mind!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 就好像你能知道我在想什么一样！

original: As if you’d even need to...
translation: 搞得好像需要读你的心一样……

original: Celeste McCoy: Just one more game![p/][s/] I'll get you this time!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 再、再来一局！[p/][s/]这局我肯定能赢你！

original: Ruby Tymora: *sigh*[p/] Hello, Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby Tymora: *叹气*[p/]我回来了，卡斯伯特。

original: Ms. Tymora emerges from the kitchen with Flinhart.
translation: 泰摩拉女士和弗林哈特从厨房回来了。

original: They both look mentally exhausted...[p/] It looks like negotiations didn’t go well.
translation: 他们俩看起来都累坏了，[p/]看来谈判结果不是很理想。

original: Celeste McCoy: ...Hi, Dad!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 啊，爸！

original: Flinhart McCoy: Oh…[p/] Hello, sweetie.
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 哦……[p/]你好啊，宝贝。

original: Flinhart looks irritated.[p/] But as soon as he sees Celeste,[p/] he quickly hides it behind a smile.
translation: 虽然弗林哈特一开始看起来很恼火，[p/]但一看到塞莱斯特，[p/]他就用笑容将负面感情隐藏起来。

original: You wonder what their discussion was about.
translation: 你不禁好奇他们到底聊了什么。

original: Flinhart McCoy: …What’s this?[p/] Some kind of game?
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 这是什么？[p/]某种游戏？

original: Ms. Tymora glances at pieces on the board.
translation: 泰摩拉女士扫了眼棋盘。

original: Ruby Tymora: ...Don’t feel [i]too[/i] bad about losing to him.[p/] He’s nationally ranked.
translation: Ruby Tymora: ……别觉得输给他<u>很</u>不服气，他在国内都能排得上号。

original: Celeste McCoy: Oh,[p/] you're a professional.[p/] Is that why you’re wearing a suit?
translation: Celeste McCoy: 哇哦！[p/]你是职业选手，[p/]所以才要穿西装？

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: No…[p/] Chess is just a hobby.[p/] I’m actually a defense attorney.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 不是的……[p/]下棋只是爱好，[p/]我其实是个辩护律师。

original: Celeste McCoy: …An attorney?
translation: Celeste McCoy: ……辩护律师？

original: Ruby Tymora: Speaking of which,[p/] we should probably be on our way.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 说到这个，[p/]我们差不多该走了。

original: Flinhart McCoy: Aye…[p/] Sorry for refusing you after you came all this way.
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 啊，[p/]抱歉让你大老远白跑一趟。

original: Flinhart McCoy: I really respect what you're doing.
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 我衷心对你所做的事业献上敬意。

original: Flinhart McCoy: But I don't want anything to do with your mage friends.
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 但我实在不想和你的法师朋友们扯上关系。

original: Celeste McCoy: …
translation: Celeste McCoy: ……

original: You wonder what he meant by that.
translation: 蛮好奇他这话是何意。

original: Was Ms. Tymora trying to introduce him to one of our clients?
translation: 难道是泰摩拉女士想把他介绍给委托人之一？

original: Celeste McCoy: A-[p/][s/]Anyways,[p/] it [i]is[/i] getting late.
translation: Celeste McCoy: 那、[p/][s/]那个，[p/]现在时间<u>不早</u>了。

original: Celeste McCoy: If you leave now,[p/] you won't get back to the city until morning.
translation: Celeste McCoy: 要是你们现在启程的话，[p/]得走到明早才能到城里。

original: Flinhart McCoy: Mm…[p/] She’s right.[p/]
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 嗯……[p/]她说得对。[p/]

original: Flinhart McCoy: This region is littered with bandits and brigands.
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 这片区域土匪和路霸猖獗。

original: Flinhart: You wouldn't want to run into them this late.
translation: Flinhart: 这么晚了遇到他们准没好事。

original: Ruby Tymora: …I guess you have a point.
translation: Ruby Tymora: ……你说得有道理。

original: Flinhart McCoy: We have plenty of empty rooms that you can stay in until morning.
translation: Flinhart McCoy: 我们这有挺多空房间的，你可以待到明早再走。

original: Flinhart McCoy: …It’s the least I can do after you came all this way.
translation: Flinhart McCoy: ……就当是我补偿你们吧。

original: Ruby: Well,[p/] if it's not too much trouble,[p/] we might as well stay here until tomorrow.
translation: Ruby: 要是没添多大麻烦的话，[p/]那就恭敬不如从命了。

original: Celeste McCoy: The tavern is shut down.[p/] But we still have some sheets and blankets.
translation: Celeste McCoy: 虽然酒馆停业了，[p/]但我们还有一些床单被褥。

original: Celeste McCoy: I’ll go get the rooms ready!
translation: Celeste McCoy: 我马上去准备房间！

original: Celeste and Flinhart leave the dining area to get your rooms ready.
translation: 塞莱斯特和弗林哈特离开就餐区去准备房间了。

original: You’re left in the dining room with Ms. Tymora.
translation: 你与泰摩拉女士也离开了就餐区。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: So…[p/] I take it that negotiations didn’t go well?
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 所以说……[p/]谈判不太顺利咯？

original: Ruby Tymora: No... [p/]I didn't expect him to be so stubborn.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 是啊……[p/]我没想到他那么固执。

original: Ruby Tymora: Honestly,[p/] I have no idea what that man has against mages.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 说实话，[p/]我真想不通他怎么那么抵触法师。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Well... [p/]There [i]is[/i] one way to find out.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 嗯……[p/]总<u>有办法</u>知道的。

original: Ruby Tymora: ...
translation: Ruby Tymora: ……

original: Tyrion: ...Why are you being so secretive?
translation: Tyrion: ……为什么要这么隐秘？

original: Tyrion: If your business with Flinhart is related to our clients, [p/]I can help.
translation: Tyrion: 如果你们聊的与我们的委托人有关，[p/]我可以帮忙。

original: Ruby: ...It wasn't important. [p/]And your presence was [i]not[/i] necessary.
translation: Ruby: ……没什么大事。[p/]而且也<u>不需要</u>你出场。

original: That's such an obvious lie.[p/] But you can’t read a single thought from her mind.
translation: 这谎也太明显了，[p/]但你完全读不到她在想什么。

original: She's had years of practice hiding her thoughts from the Eye of Horus.
translation: 经过多年的练习，她已经能从你的荷鲁斯之眼下藏起心中的想法。

original: Celeste: Um…
translation: Celeste: 呃……

original: Celeste enthusiastically came back downstairs.
translation: 塞莱斯特元气十足地回到楼下。

original: But she seems to have noticed the tension between you and Ms. Tymora.
translation: 但她貌似注意到了你们之间紧张的氛围。

original: Celeste: S-[p/]Sorry to interrupt,[p/] but your rooms are ready now.
translation: Celeste: 抱、[p/]抱歉打扰了，[p/]房间已经准备好了。

original: Ruby: ...Right.
translation: Ruby: ……好的。

original: Tyrion: ...Thank you.
translation: Tyrion: ……谢谢你。

original: An awkward silence hangs in the air as you and Ms. Tymora head upstairs.
translation: 一股尴尬的寂静伴随你和泰摩拉女士上楼。

original: You reach the upper hallway,[p/] and see the two rooms that Celeste prepared for you.
translation: 来到了二楼走廊，[p/]映入眼帘的便是塞莱斯特为你们准备的房间。

original: Ruby: …
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ms. Tymora stops before entering her room.
translation: 泰摩拉女士在房间门前停下了。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: You were playing chess with Flinhart's daughter earlier. [p/]Was she any good?
translation: Ruby: 你刚刚和弗林哈特的女儿下棋来着？[p/]她棋下得好吗？

original: Tyrion: …Not at first.[p/] But she got a lot better as we kept playing.
translation: Tyrion: ……最开始不怎么样，[p/]但她边下边学，进步很大。

original: Ruby: ...I'm sorry for leaving you there for so long.[p/] I didn't expect our discussion to last that long.
translation: Ruby: ……真抱歉让你一个人待那么久，[p/]我没想到会聊这么长。

original: Tyrion: No...[p/] It's fine.[p/] Despite everything,[p/] I enjoyed playing against her.
translation: Tyrion: 没事，[p/]我还蛮喜欢和她下棋的。

original: Ruby: ...I see.
translation: Ruby: ……好吧。

original: Ruby: Well...[p/] I suppose you [i]are[/i] at that age.
translation: Ruby: 嗯……[p/]再怎么说你也到<u>那个年龄</u>了。

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No![p/][s/] It’s not like that!
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/][s/]不是！[p/][s/]不是那样的！

original: Tyrion: It's just that outside of tournaments,[p/] I never really get to play against another player…
translation: Tyrion: 我只是从没在比赛以外的地方和别人下过棋而已。

original: Tyrion: And [i]you[/i] only ever want to play Shogi against me.
translation: Tyrion: 而且<u>你</u>只和我下将棋。

original: Ruby: Because Shogi is clearly superior.
translation: Ruby: 将棋明显更有逻辑性。

original: Tyrion: It’s complete anarchy,[p/][s/] is what it is!
translation: Tyrion: 那完全没有逻辑可言好吧！

original: Tyrion: You just bring fallen pieces back to life like some kind of necromancer!
translation: Tyrion: 将棋规则就像死灵术，吃掉的棋子还能接着用！

original: Ruby: It adds depth.[p/][s/] Dropping adds a dimension of play that isn't present in chess!
translation: Ruby: 将棋更有深度，[p/][s/]“打入”也是国际象棋所没有的维度！

original: You sternly look at each other,[p/] your positions already made.
translation: 你们凶巴巴地望着彼此，[p/]两人都不打算让步。

original: After a few moments of silence,[p/] you both burst out laughing.
translation: 几许寂静后，你们同时笑出了声。

original: Ruby: …
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: I’m sorry if it looks like I don't trust you.[p/] I know you're just trying to help.
translation: Ruby: 抱歉我看起来很不信任你。[p/]我知道你只是想帮我的忙。

original: Ruby: But there are some things about my work that I just can’t tell you about yet.
translation: Ruby: 但我的工作有些难言之隐。

original: Ruby: But one day...[p/] I'll tell you everything.
translation: Ruby: 总有一天……[p/]我会对你坦白一切的。

original: Tyrion: Right…[p/] I’m sorry for prying.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……[p/]抱歉我那么爱打破沙锅问到底。

original: Tyrion: I just...[p/] want to show you I’m ready to be an attorney.
translation: Tyrion: 我只是……[p/]想让你知道我已经是一个堂堂正正的律师了。

original: Ruby: You are.[p/] I know you are.
translation: Ruby: 我知道，[p/]我知道你已经是一位合格的律师了。

original: The rare praise from your mentor catches you off guard.
translation: 她罕见的赞扬让你猝不及防。

original: Ruby: A-[p/]Anyways,[p/] get some rest.
translation: Ruby: 总、[p/]总之，[p/]好好休息吧。

original: Ruby: ...You should mentally prepare yourself for the journey tomorrow.
translation: Ruby: ……你也得为了明天的路程好好休养。

original: Tyrion: R-[p/][s/]Right...
translation: Tyrion: 嗯、[p/][s/]好……

original: You completely forgot about the carriage ride back.
translation: 完全忘了还要坐马车回去。

original: You can already feel your stomach churning in protest.
translation: 已经能感受到胃里在翻江倒海了。

original: You lay in the bed that the McCoys prepared for you.
translation: 你躺在麦考伊一家为你准备的床上。

original: And as you close your eyes,[p/] you slowly drift into a deep slumber.
translation: 闭上双眼，[p/]思绪逐渐远去。

original: ...As this happens,[p/] you feel something…[p/] invasive.
translation: ……但是同时，[p/]你有一种……[p/]被入侵的感觉。

original: Your mind drifts away.[p/] And you feel yourself being pulled elsewhere.
translation: 意识逐渐远去，[p/]但你能感觉自己被拉到了别处。

original: You find yourself in a surreal and unsettling landscape.
translation: 你发现自己置身于一片离奇且令人不安的环境中。

original: You’re fairly certain that you’re dreaming right now.
translation: 你很确定自己在做梦。

original: ...But some instinct in the back of your mind tells you that something is fundamentally wrong about this.
translation: ……但你心中的某种本能告诉你，有什么根本上的不对。

original: You see a woman in the far distance.[p/] She’s staring directly at you.
translation: 你远远望见一个女人。[p/]她正直直地盯着你。

original: Eris: ………………What………………presence…………………?
She’s murmuring something,[p/] but you can’t quite make it out.[p/] Is she trying to say something to you?
translation: 她在嘀咕着什么，[p/]但你听不清。[p/]她是在对你说什么吗？

original: Eris: ………………finally………………found………………!
Eris: I’ve finally found you, heavensborn!
translation: Eris: 总算找到你了，天诞之物！

original: You’re jolted wide awake.
translation: 从睡梦中惊醒。

original: You can’t exactly remember what that woman said to you.[p/]
translation: 记不太清那个女人对你说了什么[p/]。

original: But whatever her words were,[p/] they sent a piercing chill down your spine.
translation: 无论她说了什么，[p/]都令你寒毛直竖。

original: Your breath is heavy and your heart is beating at a hundred miles per hour.
translation: 喘着粗气，[p/]心跳飞快。

original: Tyrion: *sigh*[p/] Calm down... [p/]It was just a dream.
translation: Tyrion: *叹气*没事的……[p/]只是梦而已。

original: ...At least,[p/] that's what you [i]try[/i] to tell yourself.
translation: ……至少，[p/]你<u>希望</u>如此。

original: Celeste: P-[p/][s/]Please![p/][s/] Just let me explain!
translation: Celeste: 求、[p/][s/]求你了！[p/][s/]听我解释！

original: Flinhart: I don’t want to hear it!
translation: Flinhart: 我不想听！

original: You hear the voices of Celeste and Flinhart ring out from downstairs.
translation: 楼下传来塞莱斯特和弗林哈特的争吵声。

original: It must be extremely late.[p/] What could they possibly be arguing about at [i]this[/i] hour?
translation: 都这么晚了，[p/]这个<u>时候</u>他们在吵什么呢？

original: Flinhart: I WANT YOU OUT OF MY HOUSE![p/][s/] OUT!
translation: Flinhart: <size=1.5em>给我滚出我的房子！[p/][s/]出去！</size>

original: A dead silence lingers in the air before you hear someone rush out of the tavern.
translation: 死一般的寂静后，[p/]你听到有人跑出了酒馆。

original: Whoever left slams the door behind them.
translation: 而且是摔门而去。

original: Tyrion: What was [i]that[/i] all about?
translation: Tyrion: 咋回事啊？

original: ...It's none of your business.[p/] You only met those two today.
translation: ……很明显不关你事，[p/]你今天才刚认识他们两个。

original: It would probably be best not to get involved in their affairs.
translation: 最好别多管闲事。

original: ...And as you tell yourself that,[p/] a brief image of Celeste’s smile appears in your mind.
translation: ……这么劝自己的同时，[p/]你回忆起塞莱斯特的笑容。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Damn it.
translation: Tyrion: 豁出去了。

original: You slowly make your way out of your room.
translation: 悄悄地离开了客房。

original: But the hallway is nearly pitch black. [p/]You can barely see a few inches ahead of you.
translation: 走廊伸手不见五指，[p/]你只能看清自己面前几厘米的路。

original: You have to watch your step to avoid tripping.
translation: 必须注意脚下走的每一步才行。

original: Flinhart: …!
translation: Flinhart: ……！

original: You run into Flinhart,[p/] who was slowly walking up the stairs.
translation: 你与正慢慢上楼梯的弗林哈特撞了个满怀。

original: Even this close,[p/] it’s hard to see his expression in the darkness.
translation: 即使这么接近，[p/]黑暗中他的神情也很难分辨。

original: Tyrion: S-[p/]Sorry…[p/] I just heard-
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/]抱歉……[p/]我听到你们——

original: Flinhart: Right…[p/] I forgot you two were…
translation: Flinhart: 哈啊……[p/]我忘了你们两个还在这了……

original: His words trail off.
translation: 他的话没了后续。

original: Tyrion: Is... [p/]everything okay?
translation: Tyrion: 没……[p/]没事吧？

original: Flinhart: ...
translation: Flinhart: ……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: S-[p/]sorry,[p/] I’m just going to…
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/]抱歉，[p/]我只是要……

original: You awkwardly shimmy past Flinhart to head down the stairs.
translation: 你尴尬地越过弗林哈特下楼。

original: He doesn’t move out of your way.[p/] It’s clear his mind is elsewhere.
translation: 他没有给你让路，[p/]很明显他在想别的事。

original: You arrive at the dining room.[p/] But you don’t see Celeste anywhere.
translation: 来到了餐厅，[p/]但这里没有塞莱斯特的身影。

original: Honestly though,[p/] it’s hard to tell with how dark the room is.
translation: 说实话，[p/]房间暗到很难看清她在不在这。

original: Tyrion: Celeste…?[p/] Are you still here?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……？[p/]你在这吗？

original: You don’t receive an answer.
translation: 一片寂静。

original: You remember hearing someone slam the front door earlier.[p/] Your eyes are drawn to the tavern entrance.
translation: 你记得听到有人从前门摔门而去，[p/]于是来到了入口。

original: Tyrion: ...Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: ……塞莱斯特？

original: No answer.
translation: 没有回应。

original: Tyrion: Celeste?![p/][s/] Where are you?!
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特？！[p/][s/]你在哪？！

original: Merchant: …Ugh.
translation: Merchant: ……真是的。

original: The merchant you spoke with before steps out from his shop holding a lantern.
translation: 先前和你斗智斗勇的商人拿着灯笼走到你旁边。

original: He appears to be irritated by all the noise you’ve been making.
translation: 他看起来因为你大喊大叫而十分生气。

original: Merchant: Oh,[p/] you’re that kid from before.
translation: Merchant: 哦，[p/]你是之前那个小子。

original: Merchant: Do you have any idea what time it is?
translation: Merchant: 你知道现在几点了吗？

original: Merchant: This isn’t the city. [p/]You can't just make a bunch of noise like this.
translation: Merchant: 我虽然不知道城里的规矩，[p/]但你在这不许大喊大叫。

original: Tyrion: R-[p/]Right...[p/] Sorry.
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/]不好意思。

original: Tyrion: I was just looking for Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: 我在找塞莱斯特。

original: Merchant: ...Who?
translation: Merchant: ……谁？

original: Tyrion: Celeste McCoy.[p/] She’s Flinhart’s daughter.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特·麦考伊，[p/]她是弗林哈特的女儿。

original: Merchant: ...
translation: Merchant: ……

original: The merchant’s expression becomes a little colder.
translation: 商人的表情变得冷漠了一些。

original: Tyrion: Do you...[p/] [i]know[/i] them?
translation: Tyrion: 你……[p/]<u>认识</u>她？

original: Merchant: ...What do you want with that bastard? [mind="That damn mage..."/]
translation: Merchant: ……你找那个混蛋干什么？ [mind="那个混蛋法师……"/]

original: Tyrion: ...W-[p/][s/]What?
translation: Tyrion: ……哈、[p/][s/]哈啊？

original: Merchant: Those two probably woke up half the street with all their yelling.
translation: Merchant: 他们俩的大喊大叫快把整条街吵醒了。

original: Merchant: I don’t need [i]you[/i] keeping us up too.
translation: Merchant: 不需要<u>你</u>也加入他们。

original: Merchant: If I hear any more noise,[p/] I’m going to call the town guard.
translation: Merchant: 我要是再听到什么噪音，[p/]就让镇警来处理你们。

original: Before you can get a word in,[p/] the merchant walks back into his home in a huff.
translation: 还没来得及说些什么，[p/]商人便气呼呼回家了。

original: Tyrion: …
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You look around but you still don’t see any sign of Celeste.[p/] You decide to continue searching.
translation: 周围没有发现塞莱斯特的身影。[p/]于是你打算扩大搜索范围。

original: Flinhart: …
translation: Flinhart: ……

original: Flinhart: I can’t believe I said those things to her…
translation: Flinhart: 我竟然说得那么过分……

original: Flinhart: She'll never forgive me for this.
translation: Flinhart: 她绝对不会原谅我的。

original: Garrick: I see your temper is as short as ever, Flinhart.
translation: Garrick: 看来你的暴脾气还是一如既往啊，弗林哈特。

original: Flinhart: ...You?!
translation: Flinhart: ……是你？！

original: Garrick: Honestly,[p/] how do you live in this darkness?
translation: Garrick: 真是的，[p/]你到底是怎么在这么暗的地方生活的？

original: Garrick: [i]Luxo[/i].
translation: Garrick: [i]Luxo[/i]。

original: Flinhart: What are [i]you[/i] doing here?!
translation: Flinhart: <u>你</u>来干什么？！

original: Flinhart: And how dare you bring that…[p/][s/] [i]witchcraft[/i] into my home?!
translation: Flinhart: 谁许你在我家用那种……[p/][s/]<u>巫术</u>的？！

original: Garrick: You’ve been busy lately.
translation: Garrick: 你最近很忙啊。

original: Garrick: Your little rallies have gained [i]quite[/i] a lot of support.
translation: Garrick: 看起来你的集会得到了<u>不少</u>援助金。

original: Garrick: …Too much support for my family’s liking.
translation: Garrick: ……多到我的家族有点不高兴了。

original: Flinhart: And what?[p/] You came all this way to convince me to stop?
translation: Flinhart: 那又怎样？[p/]你大老远跑过来就是想让我收手？

original: Garrick: You have my word.
translation: Garrick: 我向你保证。

original: Garrick: If you stop spreading dissidence,[p/] no harm will come to you or your family.
translation: Garrick: 只要立刻停止传播异见，[p/]你和你的家人都不会受任何伤害。

original: Flinhart: Hah![p/][s/] Your “word” is as good as the dirt you lick off of King Olivier's boots.
translation: Flinhart: 哈！[p/][s/]信你的“保证”？还不如去学你对奥利维尔王点头哈腰。

original: Flinhart: As if I’d [i]ever[/i] trust the words of a [i]murderer[/i] like you…
translation: Flinhart: 我<u>绝不可能</u>相信你这种<u>杀人犯</u>的话……

original: Garrick: …
translation: Garrick: ……

original: Garrick: Flinhart,[p/] please…
translation: Garrick: 弗林哈特，[p/]拜托……

original: Garrick: As someone you once called a friend,[p/] I’m only going to ask you one time.
translation: Garrick: 作为你的老朋友，[p/]我只求你这一次。

original: Flinhart: “Friend”…?[p/][s/] “Friend”?!
translation: Flinhart: “老朋友”……？[p/][s/]“老朋友”？！

original: Flinhart: I’ll be dead in the ground before I ever call the likes of [i]you[/i] a "friend"!
translation: Flinhart: 我死也不会管<u>你</u>这样的人叫“老朋友”！

original: Flinhart: Get out of my house.
translation: Flinhart: 滚出去。

original: Flinhart: I don’t have time for your nonsense.
translation: Flinhart: 我没时间听你放屁。

original: Garrick: …
translation: Garrick: ……

original: Garrick: Unfortunately,[p/] I don’t think you’ll have much time for anything.
translation: Garrick: 可惜，[p/]你想干什么都没时间了。

original: Flinhart: GAH!
translation: Flinhart: 噶啊！

original: Garrick: ...
translation: Garrick: ……

original: Garrick Pierce: Damn it...
translation: Garrick Pierce: 可恶……

original: Garrick Pierce: Damn it!
translation: Garrick Pierce: 可恶！

original: Garrick Pierce: Flinhart, you fool!
translation: Garrick Pierce: 弗林哈特，你这个蠢货！

original: Garrick: Why couldn’t you have just [i]listened[/i] to me?!
translation: Garrick: 为什么就不能<u>听</u>我的？

original: Garrick Pierce: ...
translation: Garrick Pierce: ……

original: Garrick Pierce: Rudolf.[p/] I require your assistance.
translation: Garrick Pierce: 鲁道夫。[p/]我需要你帮忙。

original: Rhys Rudolf: Yes, sir?
translation: Rhys Rudolf: 有何吩咐？

original: Rhys Rudolf: By the Scaled Lord![p/][s/] What did you-?!
translation: Rhys Rudolf: 鳞甲领主在上！[p/][s/]你到底做了什——！？

original: Rhys Rudolf: You...[p/][s/] killed him!
translation: Rhys Rudolf: 你……[p/][s/]杀了他！

original: Garrick: ...
translation: Garrick: ……

original: Garrick: Alert the town guard.[p/] Tell them that you saw his daughter fleeing the scene.
translation: Garrick: 向镇警报案。[p/]告诉他们你看见他女儿逃离了现场。

original: Garrick: I’m sure their neighbors heard them arguing with each other.
translation: Garrick: 邻居肯定都听到他们吵架了。

original: Garrick: They'll immediately suspect her.
translation: Garrick: 她会成为头号嫌疑人。

original: Rhys Rudolf: ...
translation: Rhys Rudolf: ……

original: Rhys Rudolf: At once, sir.
translation: Rhys Rudolf: 马上照做，阁下。

original: You’ve been searching for Celeste for a while.
translation: 你开始寻找塞莱斯特已经过去一段时间了。

original: How long have you been outside?[p/] Two hours?[p/] Three?
translation: 已经找了多久了？[p/]两个小时？[p/]三个小时？

original: However long it's been,[p/] it's clearly taking a toll on you.
translation: 不管具体过去多久，[p/]你的身体都已精疲力竭。

original: Where [i]is[/i] she...?
translation: 她到底跑哪去了……？

original: Celeste: ...What am I going to do now?
translation: Celeste: ……我该怎么办？

original: You hear a faint voice...[p/] Could it be...?
translation: 你听到一个模糊的声音……[p/]会是她吗？

original: Celeste: O-[p/][s/]Oh…!
translation: Celeste: 欸、[p/][s/]啊……！

original: As you peer behind an old tree,[p/] you finally find her.
translation: 你终于在一棵古树后找到了她。

original: She looks just as tired as you are.[p/] Probably, even more so.
translation: 她看起来和你一样身心俱疲，[p/]甚至可能更严重。

original: Her eyes are puffy and red.[p/] But she’s doing her best to hide it with a smile.
translation: 即使她努力用微笑掩饰，[p/]哭红的双眼也出卖了她的悲伤。

original: Tyrion: I’ve...[p/] been looking all over for you.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]一直在找你。

original: Celeste: Oh…[p/] sorry.
translation: Celeste: 啊……[p/]抱歉。

original: Celeste: ...I’m guessing we woke you up?
translation: Celeste: ……我们把你吵醒了吧？

original: Tyrion: Yeah...
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……

original: Tyrion: ...Is everything okay?
translation: Tyrion: ……你还好吗？

original: Celeste: It’s nothing. [p/]It was just an argument…
translation: Celeste: 没什么大不了的，[p/]只是吵了一架……

original: But from the way she reacted,[p/] this is clearly not common.
translation: 从她的反应来看，[p/]这种事并不频繁。

original: ...You suppose that it's none of your business.[p/] You decide not to pry further.
translation: ……再怎么说这也是他们父女之间的事，[p/]你觉得还是不要深究为好。

original: Celeste: …Have you been looking for me all this time?
translation: Celeste: ……已经好几个小时了，[p/]你一直都在找我吗？

original: Tyrion: I have...
translation: Tyrion: 对啊……

original: Celeste: T-[p/][s/]Thank you.
translation: Celeste: 谢、[p/][s/]谢谢你。

original: Celeste: …But I’m okay now.[p/] You should head back.
translation: Celeste: ……我现在没事了，[p/]你应该回去休息。

original: Tyrion: …What about you?
translation: Tyrion: ……那你呢？

original: Celeste: I think I’m going to stay out a little longer.
translation: Celeste: 我想再待一会儿。

original: Tyrion: …
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You know that you should mind your own business… [p/]but…
translation: 你心里很清楚这事与你无关，[p/]但……

original: Tyrion: ...I’m sure whatever happened between you two,[p/] it’s nothing you can’t talk out.
translation: Tyrion: ……无论你们之间发生了什么，[p/]都不是好好谈谈解决不了的。

original: Celeste: …!
translation: Celeste: ……！

original: Tyrion: It doesn’t happen a lot.[p/] But sometimes Ms. Tymora and I get into fights too.
translation: Tyrion: 我和泰摩拉女士也会吵架，[p/]虽然不是很频繁吧。

original: Tyrion: But no matter what happens,[p/] we were always able to talk through it.
translation: Tyrion: 但无论发生了什么，[p/]我们最后总能用言语化解矛盾。

original: Celeste: I...
translation: Celeste: 我……

original: Tyrion: S-[p/][s/]Sorry![p/] I know it’s none of my business,[p/] but I just-!
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉！[p/]我知道这不关我的事，[p/] 但我就是——！

original: Celeste: No, I really appreciate it.[p/] Thank you.
translation: Celeste: 不，我很感激。[p/]谢谢你。

original: Celeste: …
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: You’re right… [p/]Let’s go back.
translation: Celeste: 你说得对……[p/]我们回去吧。

original: Tyrion: What...?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么情况？！

original: You arrive back at the McCoy Tavern.
translation: 回到了麦考伊的酒馆。

original: ...But it’s now surrounded by several carriages and knights clad in plate armor.
translation: ……但酒馆现在被好几辆马车与全副武装的骑士包围。

original: Tyrion: Is that…[p/][s/] the Inquisition?!
translation: Tyrion: 那是……[p/][s/]裁判所？！

original: Celeste: What…?
translation: Celeste: 什么……?

original: Tyrion: The Arcane Inquisition.[p/] They're an order of knights that investigate crimes committed using magic.
translation: Tyrion: 奥术裁判所，[p/]由一群负责调查涉及魔法的刑事案件骑士组成。

original: As you say the word “crimes”,[p/] you and Celeste share a glance and come to the same realization.
translation: 说到“刑事案件”，[p/]你和塞莱斯特对视了一下，得出了相同的结论。

original: Both of you rush towards the tavern,[p/] but Celeste outpaces you by a large margin.
translation: 你们一同冲向酒馆，[p/]但塞莱斯特的速度远超于你。

original: Celeste: What…?
translation: Celeste: 什么……?

original: Celeste: N-[p/]No...
translation: Celeste: 不、[p/]不……

original: Celeste: NOOOOOO!
translation: Celeste: <size=1.5em>不！</size>

original: She reaches the tavern before you.[p/] And before anyone can stop her,[p/] she takes a look inside the inn.
translation: 她先你一步来到酒馆，[p/]并向酒馆内看去，[p/]没人来得及阻止她。

original: [i]Whatever[/i] she saw makes her cry out in anguish.
translation: <u>看到的事</u>令她失声痛哭。

original: She drops to the ground in tears.
translation: 她泪流满面，跌坐在地上。

original: Orym: [i]There[/i] she is!
translation: Orym: 她在那儿！

original: ORYM: Celeste McCoy![p/][s/] By the authority of the Wyverngarde crown,[p/][s/] I'm placing you under arrest!
translation: ORYM: 塞莱斯特·麦考伊！[p/][s/]我以维文加德皇室的名义逮捕你！

original: Upon seeing Celeste,[p/] one of the knights steps forward and grabs her.
translation: 看见塞莱斯特后，[p/]骑士之一上前尝试制服她。

original: Surprisingly,[p/] she’s able to break free from his grip and tries to push further into the tavern.
translation: 惊讶的是，[p/]她挣脱了骑士的控制，并试图进入酒馆。

original: Noticing the commotion,[p/] three other knights rush to grab her and begin dragging her away.
translation: 意识到骚乱后，[p/]立刻有另外三位骑士上前抓住她，把她拖开。

original: She kicks and screams against them,[p/] desperately trying to break free.
translation: 她又踢又喊，[p/]拼命地想要挣脱。

original: Even between the three knights,[p/] it's taking all of their strength to subdue her.
translation: 甚至需要三位骑士使出全力才能制服她。

original: Tyrion: What are you doing to her?![p/][s/] What is going on here?!
translation: Tyrion: 为什么要逮捕她！？ [p/][s/]这里发生什么事了？！

original: Ruby: ...Tyrion!
translation: Ruby: ……提利昂！

original: Ms. Tymora approaches you.[p/] You breathe a small sigh of relief when you see that she’s okay.
translation: 泰摩拉女士走上前。[p/]看到她安然无恙，你悬着的心放了下来。

original: Tyrion: M-[p/][s/]Ms. Tymora!
translation: Tyrion: 泰、[p/][s/]泰摩拉女士！

original: Orym: Bah![p/] I should have known that he was one of [i]yours[/i].
translation: Orym: 哼！[p/]我早该知道他是和你<u>一伙</u>的。

original: Orym: Just stay out of our way.
translation: Orym: 别来捣乱。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora…[p/][s/] What's going on?!
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士……[p/][s/]出什么事了？！

original: Tyrion: Why is the [i]Inquisition[/i] here?!
translation: Tyrion: 为什么这儿有裁判所的人？！

original: Ruby: …
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: I’m surprised myself.
translation: Ruby: 我也很震惊。

original: Ruby: But from what I understand…[p/] Flinhart McCoy has been murdered.
translation: Ruby: 但据我所知……[p/]弗林哈特·麦考伊被人谋杀了。

original: Tyrion: Murdered?!
translation: Tyrion: 谋杀？！

original: There's only one locked door that leads into the cell.
translation: 仅有一扇门通向牢房。

original: And it seems to be locked by some kind of magical mechanism.
translation: 门锁看起来是某种魔法装置。

original: Lit torches are hanging on the wall of the cell.
translation: 牢房墙上挂着点燃的火把。

original: It seems a bit irresponsible to put a potentially harmful item in here with the prisoners.
translation: 把这种可能有害的东西放在囚犯触手可及的地方，好像不太安全。

original: ...But perhaps the Inquisition doesn't care about that.
translation: ……也许裁判所根本不在乎这一点。

original: The cell has a barred window.
translation: 牢房有扇铁栅窗。

original: Even if a prisoner somehow broke through the bars,[p/] there's a three-story drop to freedom.
translation: 就算囚犯能打破铁栏，[p/]离自由也隔着一个三层楼的自由落体。

original: Tyrion: ...I'm sorry for freezing up like that.
translation: Tyrion: ……抱歉让你看见我丢人的样子。

original: Tyrion: I almost lost us the trial…
translation: Tyrion: 我差点就输掉了审理……

original: Celeste: N-[p/][s/]No,[p/][s/] there’s no need to apologize!
translation: Celeste: 不、[p/][s/]不，[p/][s/]你不用道歉的！

original: Celeste: You did great!
translation: Celeste: 你做得很好啊！

original: But it was only thanks to her.[p/] If she hadn't calmed you down...[p/] who [i]knows[/i] what would have happened?
translation: 但都是多亏了她，[p/]如果她没有让你冷静下来……[p/]谁<u>知道</u>会发生什么？

original: Celeste: ...But I still don’t understand, though.
translation: Celeste: ……但是我还是想不通。

original: Celeste: Why were there traces of magic on my dad’s body?
translation: Celeste: 为什么我父亲身上有这么多魔法痕迹？

original: Right...[p/] Those traces of magic were on the sword [i]and[/i] the body.
translation: 确实……[p/]那些痕迹存在于剑<u>和</u>尸体上。

original: Magical traces are particles of magical residue that are left behind when a mage casts a spell.
translation: 魔法痕迹是法师施法后留下的某种魔法粒子残留物。

original: They only linger around for 48 hours.[p/] And that gives you a rough timeline of when and where a spell is cast.
translation: 这些残留物只存在48小时，[p/]能通过它们粗略判断出法术的施法时间和位置。

original: Tyrion: Did you cast [b]Mage Blade[/b] on your sword that day?
translation: Tyrion: 你那天给你的剑附魔[b]法术剑刃[/b]了吗？

original: Celeste: I did.[p/] I usually cast it when I train in the morning.
translation: Celeste: 嗯，[p/]我每天早上训练时都会用一次。

original: That explains why there was a trace on the sword, at least.
translation: 至少能解释为什么剑上留下了痕迹。

original: Celeste: Did the trace on my sword leave the magical trace on my dad’s body?
translation: Celeste: 有没有可能，是我剑上的痕迹蔓延到父亲的身体上？

original: Tyrion: No…[p/] Magical traces can't be moved around physically.
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/]魔法痕迹不可被物理性转移。

original: Tyrion: For a spell to leave a trace,[p/] it has to be active when physical contact is made.
translation: Tyrion: 要留下痕迹，[p/]物理必须在法术生效时有物理接触。

original: Celeste: Really?[p/] What does that mean then?
translation: Celeste: 真的？[p/]那这意思是？

original: Tyrion: Whatever killed your father had a [b]transmutation[/b] spell active on it at the time.
translation: Tyrion: 杀死你父亲的凶器当时一定被施了某种[b]形变术[/b]。

original: Tyrion: The magical trace on your sword was just an unlucky coincidence.
translation: Tyrion: 你剑上的魔法痕迹只是个非常不幸的巧合。

original: Celeste: I can’t believe this…
translation: Celeste: 难以置信……

original: Tyrion: Could you tell me more about your father?
translation: Tyrion: 能和我聊聊你父亲吗？

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: Sorry,[p/] I know this must be difficult after everything that’s happened.
translation: Tyrion: 抱歉，[p/]我知道现在可能很难讨论这些。

original: Celeste: No…[p/] It’s okay.
translation: Celeste: 不……[p/]没事的。

original: Celeste: If it helps you,[p/] I’ll try my best to answer your questions.
translation: Celeste: 如果能帮助你破案，[p/]我会尽我所能回答问题。

original: Tyrion: Were you two close?
translation: Tyrion: 你们俩很亲密？

original: Celeste: We were…
translation: Celeste: 之前是的……

original: Celeste: I’m sure you know this by now,[p/] but I was adopted by him and my mom.
translation: Celeste: 你现在应该也知道了，[p/]我是他和妈妈收养的孩子。

original: Celeste: But even though I didn’t have their blood,[p/] they [i]treated[/i] me as if I did.
translation: Celeste: 尽管我是捡来的，[p/]他们还是把我当亲生女儿一样<u>对待</u>。

original: Celeste: He loved me with all his heart until…
translation: Celeste: 他全心全意爱着我，直到……

original: Celeste: …
translation: Celeste: ……

original: “Until”…?[p/] Until what?
translation: “直到”……？[p/]直到什么？

original: Does this have something to do with the argument that they had?
translation: 是不是和他们那晚的争吵有关？

original: Tyrion: I'm sorry to say this...[p/] But I could hear your argument from my room that night…
translation: Tyrion: 很抱歉提起这个……[p/]但那晚我的房间里都能听到你们的争吵……

original: Tyrion: Could you tell me about what happened?
translation: Tyrion: 能告诉我当时发生了什么吗？

original: Celeste: …
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: For as long as I can remember,[p/] my dad has hated mages.
translation: Celeste: 从我记事起，[p/]我父亲就讨厌法师。

original: Celeste: I’m not sure why,[p/] but if you even mentioned magic around him,[p/] he’d fly into a rage.
translation: Celeste: 我不太清楚原因，[p/]如果你当他面提魔法的事，[p/]他马上就会生气。

original: Celeste: So I hid my magic from my family.
translation: Celeste: 所以我一直隐瞒了自己会魔法的事。

original: Tyrion: But why even learn magic in the first place?
translation: Tyrion: 那当初为什么要学魔法呢？

original: Tyrion: If you really wanted to,[p/] you could have gone your whole life without using it.
translation: Tyrion: 你可以就这样平凡度过一生的。

original: Celeste: Ever since our tavern closed,[p/] my family’s been in a lot of debt.
translation: Celeste: 自从酒馆停业后，[p/]我家就欠了很多债。

original: Celeste: I decided to become a mercenary and use magic to enhance my ability to fight.
translation: Celeste: 我决定去当雇佣兵，[p/]用魔法来提升我的战斗力。

original: Celeste: Most mages are in the nobility.[p/] So people will pay a lot for a sellsword who can use magic.
translation: Celeste: 大多数法师都是贵族，[p/]所以雇主愿意付很多钱来雇佣会魔法的人。

original: ...So [i]that's[/i] why she's a mercenary.
translation: ……<u>所以</u>她才要当雇佣兵。

original: Celeste: But I know now…[p/] Learning magic was the biggest mistake I've ever made…
translation: Celeste: 但我现在明白了，[p/]学魔法是我这辈子最大的错误……

original: Celeste: On that night,[p/] my dad found my [b]Spell Compendium[/b].
translation: Celeste: 那天晚上，[b]爸爸发现了我的[b]法术汇编[/b]。

original: Celeste: When he confronted me about it,[p/] I finally came clean to him.
translation: Celeste: 当他质问我时，[p/]我和他坦白了。

original: Celeste: …That’s when he flew into another one of his rages.
translation: Celeste: ……这时他的脾气又爆发了。

original: Celeste: He shouted at me.[p/] He told me that I’d betrayed him and his family.
translation: Celeste: 他向我大吼，[p/]说我背叛了他和整个家。

original: Tyrion: I’m so sorry…[p/] I can't imagine how that must have felt.
translation: Tyrion: 抱歉……[p/]我都不敢想这会多难受。

original: Celeste: I deserved every bit of it…
translation: Celeste: 这是我自作自受……

original: Celeste: I knew how much he hated magic,[p/] but I learned to use it anyways.
translation: Celeste: 我明知他是那么的痛恨魔法，[p/]但我还是一意孤行。

original: Celeste: He showed me so much love and I just threw it all away…
translation: Celeste: 他那么爱我，我却……

original: Tyrion: D-[p/][s/]Don’t say that![p/][s/] I’m sure he still loved you!
translation: Tyrion: 别、[p/][s/]别这么说！[p/][s/]他肯定还是爱你的！

original: Celeste: No…[p/] I could see it in his eyes.[p/] He hated me. [mind="And he died hating me..."/]
translation: Celeste: 不可能……[p/]从他的眼神就能看出来。[p/]他恨我。 [mind="他至死都在恨我……"/]

original: You feel a sharp pain in your chest as you see that thought.
translation: 看见她那么想，你心如刀割。

original: Tyrion: S-[p/]So…[p/] There’s a locked room in the tavern.[p/] It's at the very end of the hallway upstairs.
translation: Tyrion: 换、[p/]换个话题……[p/]二楼走廊尽头有个锁住的门。

original: Tyrion: The Inquisition probably searched it already,[p/] but I just wanted to investigate it to make sure.
translation: Tyrion: 虽然裁判所很可能已经搜查过了，[p/]但我想自己调查一下。

original: Celeste: A locked room at the end of the hallway?
translation: Celeste: 二楼走廊尽头锁住的门？

original: Celeste: I think that’s my room.
translation: Celeste: 那应该是我的房间。

original: Tyrion: Do you know how I could get in there?
translation: Tyrion: 你知道怎么能让我进去吗？

original: Tyrion: It's the only room in the tavern that I haven't investigated.
translation: Tyrion: 整个酒馆就剩那里我没有调查过了。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: You feel a suspicious gaze from Celeste.
translation: 你感到塞莱斯特向你投来了怀疑的眼神。

original: Tyrion: …What’s that look for?!
translation: Tyrion: ……干嘛那样看我！？

original: Tyrion: I’m your lawyer![p/][s/] I’m not going to do anything weird!
translation: Tyrion: 我是你的辩护律师！[p/][s/]不会做什么奇怪的事！

original: Celeste: …S-[p/][s/]Sorry,[p/] you’re right.
translation: Celeste: ……抱、[p/][s/]抱歉。[p/]你说得对。

original: Celeste: Here.[p/] You can use this key to get inside.
translation: Celeste: 给，[p/]你可以用这把钥匙。

original: You probably shouldn't show this to her.
translation: 不应该给她看这个。

original: She's already been through enough.[p/] You shouldn't remind her about her father’s death unnecessarily.
translation: 她经历的已经足够多了，[p/]没有必要再提醒她父亲的死。

original: Tyrion: This is a pretty strange sword.[p/] I've never seen anything like it.
translation: Tyrion: 真是把稀奇的剑，[p/]我从没见过类似的东西。

original: Celeste: Do you like it?[p/] It's a souvenir I got while I was traveling the Eastern Kingdoms.
translation: Celeste: 你喜欢吗？[p/]这是我在东方古国游历时得到的纪念品。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/][s/] You've [i]been[/i] to the Eastern Kingdoms?!
translation: Tyrion: 等下…….[p/][s/]你<u>去过</u>东方古国？！

original: Tyrion: I thought Wyverngarde had a strict policy preventing people from crossing the border.
translation: Tyrion: 我以为维文加德的政策禁止人们跨越边境。

original: Celeste: Well...[p/] I didn't [i]exactly[/i] enter legally.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]我<u>确实</u>不是合法去那边的。

original: You quickly glance at the guard of the cell.[p/] He doesn't seem to be listening.
translation: 你偷偷瞟了一眼监牢守卫，[p/]他看起来没在听。

original: Tyrion: Please don't make a habit of telling people that...[p/] You're in [i]enough[/i] trouble as it is.
translation: Tyrion: 你可别养成随便和人说这种事的习惯……[p/]你的麻烦已经<u>够</u>多了。

original: Celeste: Yeah yeah....
translation: Celeste: 好，好……

original: Tyrion: [b]Mage Blade[/b]...
translation: Tyrion: [b]法术剑刃[/b]……

original: Celeste: It's a spell that magically sharpens my sword so that it can cut through plate armour.
translation: Celeste: 是种能够使我的剑更锋利的魔法，这样我就能砍穿铠甲。

original: Tyrion: ...When would you even need to use a spell like that?
translation: Tyrion: ……你什么时候会需要砍铠甲？

original: Celeste: Well, it's not [p]just[/p] for plate armor.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……<u>不只</u>是砍铠甲。

original: Celeste: I can cut through all kinds of things with it.
translation: Celeste: 很多东西都能用它砍穿。

original: Celeste: Trees,[p/] boulders,[p/] ballista,[p/] fortified gates.[p/] It cuts through most of those things like butter.
translation: Celeste: 树木、[p/]巨石、[p/]步兵的枪，[p/]加固过的城门等等。用它切这些东西就像切黄油一样轻松。

original: ...You start to wonder what kind of life she led before this case.
translation: ……你不禁开始想象她之前过的都是什么样的生活。

original: Tyrion: I didn't expect to find artificery in a village like yours.
translation: Tyrion: 没想到在这种地方能找到奥术能源装置。

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] I bought it for my family to make their lives easier.
translation: Celeste: 是啊……[p/]是我为了改善家人生活买回来的。

original: Celeste: But I think it just made things more complicated.
translation: Celeste: 但我好像只是又把事情变得复杂了。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] Without an Arcane Power Cell,[p/] those lights aren't very useful.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]没了奥术蓄电池，[p/]这些灯就变成纯粹的摆设了。

original: Tyrion: Can you tell me more about this?
translation: Tyrion: 你对这个有什么想法吗？

original: Celeste: Oh...[p/] I don't really know what to say about that.[p/] Sorry.
translation: Celeste: 啊……[p/]我也不知道说什么。[p/]抱歉。

original: It'd be best to try something else.
translation: 最好问问别的。

original: You return to the dungeon to speak with Celeste.
translation: 你前往地牢想和塞莱斯特谈谈。

original: But when you check the cell that she was being kept in,[p/] you see that it's empty.
translation: 你来到她的牢房前，却发现里面空无一人。

original: Tyrion: The Inquisition must be questioning her.
translation: Tyrion: 裁判所一定正在盘问她。

original: Tyrion: I should come back later.
translation: Tyrion: 我应该之后再来。

original: You return to the cell that Celeste is being kept in.
translation: 你回到了关押塞莱斯特的牢房。

original: Prisoners: ...
translation: Prisoners: ……

original: The ambient despair in the air fills your mind like a horrendous stench.
translation: 空气中弥漫的绝望如恶臭般侵蚀着你的脑海。

original: You do your best to ignore the emotions of the other prisoners.[p/] But you haven't had much practice blocking out [i]this[/i] many people.
translation: 你尽力无视这些负面情绪，[p/]但你从没应付过<u>如此多</u>的份量。

original: As you arrive,[p/] you see Celeste huddled down in a corner.
translation: 抵达之后，[p/]你看见塞莱斯特在角落里缩成一团。

original: As soon as she sees you,[p/] her dour mood seems to lift,[p/] if only for a moment.
translation: 看见你以后，[p/]即使只有一瞬，[p/]她的情绪似乎也有所好转。

original: Celeste: Oh.[p/] Hi, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Celeste: 噢。[p/]你好，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: There’s no need to address me so formally.[p/] Just call me Tyrion.
translation: Tyrion: 没必要这么客气，[p/]叫我提利昂就好。

original: Celeste: Okay.
translation: Celeste: 好的。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] I came here to ask you some questions about the case.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]我是来问你一些关于案件的问题的。

original: Celeste: ...Right.
translation: Celeste: ……好的。

original: Celeste: Oh, you’re back.
translation: Celeste: 啊，你回来了。

original: Celeste: Did you forget something?
translation: Celeste: 忘了什么东西吗？

original: Tyrion: Actually,[p/] there’s one last thing I wanted to talk to you about…
translation: Tyrion: 其实，[p/]我还有件事想和你谈谈……

original: Celeste: Oh?
translation: Celeste: 嗯？

original: Tyrion: Earlier you said something that I just can’t let go.
translation: Tyrion: 你先前说了一些我没办法忽视的话。

original: Tyrion: You said that your father died hating you…
translation: Tyrion: 你说你父亲到死都恨你……

original: Tyrion: But after everything I heard about him,[p/] I don’t think that’s true.
translation: Tyrion: 但据我目前调查所知，[p/]他不可能恨你。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: Your father loved you, Celeste,[p/] even in his final moments.
translation: Tyrion: 你父亲深爱着你，塞莱斯特，[p/]即便是临终之际。

original: You desperately want to reach her.
translation: 你拼命想让她明白这一点。

original: If she keeps believing that he hated her,[p/] that thought will eat away at her for the rest of her life.
translation: 如果她一直觉得父亲恨自己，[p/]余生都会被这一想法困扰。

original: …You know that better than anyone.
translation: ……这种事你再明白不过了。

original: Celeste: I... [mind="...He's just lying to make me feel better."/]
translation: Celeste: 我……. [mind="他只是想靠撒谎让我好受些。"/]

original: But it looks like it won’t be that simple.
translation: 看起来说服她没那么简单。

original: You'll need to win an ARGUMENT against her if you want her to see the truth.
translation: 你必须在<size=1.5em>辩论</size>中说服她，才能让她理解真相。

original: Tyrion: It's a fancy-looking bed.
translation: Tyrion: 看起来很豪华的床。

original: Jolene: Celeste had it custom-made.
translation: Jolene: 是塞莱斯特专门定制的。

original: Tyrion: Wouldn't something like this be really expensive?
translation: Tyrion: 这种东西都很贵吧？

original: Jolene: It was.[p/] I was really surprised when she returned from her travels.
translation: Jolene: 确实不便宜，[p/]她带着这些东西回来的时候我都震惊了。

original: Jolene: Apparently,[p/] she was making a lot of gold from her job as a mercenary.
translation: Jolene: 看来我家宝贝当雇佣兵赚了不少。

original: Tyrion: Wow,[p/] you and Flinhart must have been happy for her.
translation: Tyrion: 哇，[p/]你和弗林哈特肯定为她开心。

original: Jolene: We are,[p/] but I still wish she'd get a less dangerous job...
translation: Jolene: 是啊，[p/]但我还是希望她能选个不那么危险的工作……

original: Tyrion: It's a door leading to the upstairs hallway.
translation: Tyrion: 是一扇通向二层走廊的门。

original: Tyrion: It's a table with several chairs.
translation: Tyrion: 一张桌子和几把椅子。

original: Tyrion: It must be used for entertaining guests.
translation: Tyrion: 一定是用来招待客人的。

original: It doesn't look like it's seen much use though...
translation: 不过看起来很久没用过了……

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of a woman with some sort of aquatic animal.
translation: Tyrion: 一张描绘着一个女人和某种水生生物的画。

original: Jolene: Oh, I love that painting.[p/] Celeste brought it back from her travels.
translation: Jolene: 哦，我很爱那张画。[p/]是塞莱斯特带回来的。

original: Jolene: Supposedly,[p/] that woman is named Madeline Kipling.
translation: Jolene: 听说那个女人叫 Madeline Kipling。<size=0.75em>此类对话均为众筹致谢</size>

original: Jolene: From what I've heard,[p/] she runs a wildlife sanctuary for endangered species.
translation: Jolene: 据我所知，[p/]她经营着濒危动物保护中心。

original: Jolene: I think the animal in this painting is called a "Feykip".
translation: Jolene: 画上的动物应该叫做“Feykip”。

original: Jolene: Celeste told me that she really likes them.
translation: Jolene: 塞莱斯特和我说她很喜欢这些动物。

original: That's interesting.[p/] You weren't aware that these kinds of creatures even existed.
translation: 真是有趣。[p/]你都不知道世上还有这样的动物。

original: Tyrion: Can you tell me why your husband hated mages so much?
translation: Tyrion: 能告诉我您的丈夫为什么如此痛恨法师吗？

original: Tyrion: I understand that most people dislike the nobility and associate magic with them.
translation: Tyrion: 我理解很多人讨厌贵族，并把魔法与他们联系起来。

original: Tyrion: But on that night,[p/] it’s like he was furious at Celeste [i]specifically[/i] because she was a mage.
translation: Tyrion: 但案发当晚，[p/]他好像是<u>针对</u>法师这一点生塞莱斯特的气。

original: Jolene: Oh…[p/] You must have talked to Celeste.
translation: Jolene: 噢……[p/]你已经和塞莱斯特聊过了。

original: Jolene: I wasn’t there when their argument happened,[p/] but I can only imagine what he said to her.
translation: Jolene: 当晚我并不在这，[p/]但我能想象得到他说了什么样的气话。

original: Tyrion: Do you know what happened to him?
translation: Tyrion: 你知道他经历过什么吗？

original: Tyrion: Why does he hate magic so much?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么他如此痛恨魔法？

original: Jolene: Celeste doesn’t know about this,[p/] but years ago Flinhart had a sister named Effie.
translation: Jolene: 塞莱斯特不知道这件事，[p/]许多年前，我丈夫有个叫埃菲的妹妹。

original: Jolene: When I was a child,[p/] we were friends with a boy named Garrick Pierce.
translation: Jolene: 我们还小的时候，[p/]有个叫做加里克·皮尔斯的朋友。

original: Jolene: He was the son of the ruling noble at the time.
translation: Jolene: 他是当时掌权的贵族家的儿子。

original: “Garrick Pierce”? [p/]Isn’t that the nobleman that was speaking with Steelwind earlier?
translation: “加里克·皮尔斯”？[p/]他不就是刚才和斯蒂尔文德说话的那个贵族吗？

original: Jolene: We were all inseparable at the time.
translation: Jolene: 我们当年天天腻在一起。

original: Jolene: He’d always sneak into town to play with us against his family’s wishes.
translation: Jolene: 他经常无视大人的管教，偷偷溜出来和我们玩。

original: Tyrion: They probably weren’t too happy about that.
translation: Tyrion: 估计他家里人不会太高兴。

original: Jolene: He was quite rebellious back then… [mind="...But he's a completely different person now."/]
translation: Jolene: 他小时候还挺叛逆的…… [mind="……但他现在已经完全是另一个人了。"/]

original: Jolene: But everything changed when Garrick began learning how to use magic.
translation: Jolene: 当加里克开始学魔法的时候，一切都变了。

original: Jolene: One day,[p/] when we were playing together,[p/] he wanted to show off the spells that he’d learned.
translation: Jolene: 有一天，[p/]在我们一起玩的时候，[p/]他想和我们炫耀新学会的魔法。

original: Jolene: He was told not to use his magic without his instructor there.[p/] But he was just too excited.
translation: Jolene: 没有导师在场时他是不能随便使用魔法的，[p/]但他当时太兴奋了。

original: Jolene: He began casting his spells,[p/] but something went horribly wrong.
translation: Jolene: 他开始施法，[p/]也就在这时出了意外。

original: Jolene: He lost control of his magic and fatally wounded Effie.
translation: Jolene: 他失去了对魔力的控制，让埃菲受了致命伤。

original: Jolene: We tried bringing her back into town.[p/] But by that time,[p/] it was too late.[p/] She was already gone.
translation: Jolene: 我们试图带她回镇子。[p/]但等抵达时已经晚了。[p/]她已经去世了。

original: Tyrion: I’m sorry…[p/] That must have been traumatizing for all of you.
translation: Tyrion: 抱歉……[p/]你们一定都很难受。

original: Jolene: The next day,[p/] the Arcane Inquisition came to investigate what happened.
translation: Jolene: 第二天，[p/]奥术裁判所来调查事情的来龙去脉。

original: Jolene: House Pierce used their connections to cover up what happened.
translation: Jolene: 皮尔斯家用自己的影响力掩盖了真相。

original: Jolene: They even threatened Flinhart’s family into keeping quiet.
translation: Jolene: 他们甚至威胁弗林哈特的家人保持沉默。

original: Jolene: After that,[p/] the official story was that Effie had been mauled by a wolf.
translation: Jolene: 在那之后，[p/]官方报告称埃菲死于狼的攻击。

original: That's not surprising.[p/] The nobility seldom take responsibility for their actions,[p/] even for a mistake like that.
translation: 不出所料。[p/]贵族基本不愿为自己的行为负责，[p/]即使是这种错误也不。

original: Jolene: Something changed in Flinhart after that.
translation: Jolene: 弗林哈特自那之后有些变了。

original: Jolene: He began speaking out against the nobility.
translation: Jolene: 他开始公然反对贵族。

original: Jolene: Eventually,[p/] he started hosting rallies in this very tavern.
translation: Jolene: 最终，[p/]他开始在自己的酒馆里举行集会。

original: Jolene: Each night,[p/] more and more people began listening to his words and joining his cause.
translation: Jolene: 越来越多的人会来每晚听他演讲，响应他的号召。

original: Jolene: The number of people that he’d gotten under his banner was terrifying.
translation: Jolene: 他召集起的人数多到吓人。

original: Jolene: There was even talk of an outright revolution against the kingdom.
translation: Jolene: 其中甚至有人提议要对王国发动革命。

original: Hm…[p/] That might explain why someone would go out of their way to kill him.
translation: 嗯……[p/]也许这能解释真凶的杀人动机。

original: Jolene: I knew how much danger he was putting himself in.
translation: Jolene: 我知道他在做的事有多危险。

original: Jolene: But no matter how hard I tried,[p/] I couldn’t convince him to stop.
translation: Jolene: 但无论我多么努力劝他，[p/]他都不愿意收手。

original: Jolene: His attitude didn’t even begin to change until we adopted Celeste.
translation: Jolene: 他的态度在我们收养塞莱斯特前都是雷打不动。

original: Tyrion: Can you tell me more about Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: 能聊聊关于塞莱斯特的事吗？

original: Tyrion: How did she become a part of your family?
translation: Tyrion: 她是怎么被收养的？

original: Jolene: It all happened many years ago,[p/] back when the McCoy Tavern was still open.
translation: Jolene: 许多年前的事了，[p/]那时麦考伊酒馆仍在营业。

original: Jolene: We were closing one night when we found a baby with white hair abandoned in the dining area.
translation: Jolene: 有天晚上我们关门的时候，发现有个白发婴儿被遗弃在就餐区。

original: Jolene: We waited weeks for her parents to come by,[p/] but no one ever came looking for her.
translation: Jolene: 我们以为她的父母会回来找她，[p/]但等了好几周都没人出现。

original: Tyrion: And that baby was Celeste?
translation: Tyrion: 那婴儿就是塞莱斯特？

original: Jolene: Yes.[p/] Flinhart and I had always wanted a child.[p/] I thought that Celeste must have been a gift from the Scaled Lord.
translation: Jolene: 是的，[p/]弗林哈特和我一直想要个孩子。[p/]我觉得塞莱斯特一定是鳞甲领主给予我们的礼物。

original: Jolene: But…[p/] one day I saw Celeste practicing her magic.
translation: Jolene: 但……[p/]有一天我看见塞莱斯特在练习魔法。

original: Jolene: I think that’s when I realized that someone from the nobility must have abandoned her at our inn.
translation: Jolene: 那时候我便意识到，遗弃她的人应该出身贵族。

original: Jolene: I didn’t care, though.[p/] I loved her all the same.[p/] I'm sure Flinhart did too.
translation: Jolene: 但我根本不在乎，[p/]我对她的爱依然不变。[p/]我确定弗林哈特也一样。

original: Tyrion: Wait…[p/] You [i]knew[/i] that she was a mage all this time?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]你一直都知道她的法师身份吗？

original: Jolene: I did.[p/] You haven't known her very long,[p/] but she's a terrible liar.
translation: Jolene: 嗯，[p/]你和她相处不久，[p/]但她其实很不擅长说谎。

original: Jolene: Flinhart [i]must[/i] have noticed too.[p/] But I think that he didn’t want to believe it. [mind="It’s my fault. I should have forced him to see the truth."/]
translation: Jolene: 弗林哈特<u>肯定</u>也注意到了，[p/]我想他只是不愿去相信罢了。  [mind="都是我的错，我本该让他看清真相的。"/]

original: Tyrion: I spoke with Celeste earlier…
translation: Tyrion: 我刚和塞莱斯特聊过……

original: Tyrion: She thinks that her father hated her because she was a mage.
translation: Tyrion: 她认为父亲会因为法师身份而恨她。

original: Jolene: …
translation: Jolene: ……

original: Jolene: There’s no way he would ever feel that way.
translation: Jolene: 他绝对不可能这么想。

original: Jolene: He loved her more than anything in the world.
translation: Jolene: 他爱塞莱斯特胜过世间一切。

original: Jolene: No matter what he said to her that night,[p/] nothing would ever change that.
translation: Jolene: 无论他当晚说了什么，[p/]都不会改变他的爱。

original: After seeing them together,[p/] you figured as much.
translation: 看他们之前那么幸福的样子，[p/]你深感认同。

original: Jolene: Celeste was the world to him.
translation: Jolene: 塞莱斯特就是他的全部。

original: Jolene: When we adopted her,[p/] it was the first time in decades that I’d seen him so genuinely happy.
translation: Jolene: 收养她的时候，[p/]我十几年来第一次看见他由衷地开心。

original: Tyrion: They must have been really close.
translation: Tyrion: 他们关系一定相当好。

original: Jolene: More than anything.
translation: Jolene: 好过一切。

original: Jolene: …Do you want to hear a story?
translation: Jolene: ……听我讲个故事吧？

original: Jolene: Celeste had just returned from her travels.
translation: Jolene: 塞莱斯特其实刚回来没多久。

original: Jolene: She wouldn’t stop talking about this foreign drink that she loved.
translation: Jolene: 她经常在他面前说起自己喜欢的一种外国饮料。

original: Jolene: I think it was called “Lotus Juice” or something strange like that.
translation: Jolene: 我记得是叫“莲之水”之类的奇怪名字。

original: Jolene: Well, Flinhart did everything he could to have it shipped here.
translation: Jolene: 在那之后，弗林哈特想尽办法从国外进口那个饮料。

original: Jolene: He called in a bunch of favors with some of his revolutionary friends.
translation: Jolene: 他找了许多一同革命的朋友帮忙。

original: Jolene: But in the end,[p/] he was only able to get a single bottle of it.
translation: Jolene: 但最后，[p/]他也只能拿到一瓶。

original: Tyrion: Is it really [i]that[/i] rare?
translation: Tyrion: <u>这么</u>稀有吗？

original: Jolene: Yes.[p/] I wouldn’t be surprised if it were the only bottle of Lotus Juice in the region.
translation: Jolene: 嗯，[p/]可以说目前全国境内只有那一瓶莲之水。

original: Wait a minute, “Lotus Juice”?
translation: 等等，“莲之水”？

original: Tyrion: Is [i]this[/i] the bottle that Flinhart bought?
translation: Tyrion: 请问弗林哈特·麦考伊买的就是<u>这瓶</u>饮料吗？

original: You show her a picture of the shattered bottle that you found next to Flinhart’s body.
translation: 你给她看了弗林哈特尸体旁边玻璃瓶碎片的照片。

original: Jolene: It is!
translation: Jolene: 对！

original: Jolene: Oh no…[p/] He was going to surprise her with it.
translation: Jolene: 哦不……[p/]这本来是他准备的惊喜。

original: Tyrion: I found the broken pieces next to Flinhart’s-
translation: Tyrion: 这碎片是我在弗林哈特的——

original: Tyrion: Well...[p/] I found them in the dining area.
translation: Tyrion: 呃……[p/]是我在就餐区找到的。

original: Jolene: Hm…[p/] That’s strange.
translation: Jolene: 嗯……[p/]那就怪了。

original: Jolene: He’d been keeping it in our room so she wouldn’t find it.
translation: Jolene: 为了不让塞莱斯特发现，[p/]他一直把这瓶饮料藏在我们的房间。

original: Tyrion: Really?[p/] When was the last time you saw it?
translation: Tyrion: 真的吗？[p/] 你最后一次看见它是在什么时候？

original: Jolene: Right before I left the house that night.
translation: Jolene: 我那晚离开家前还见过。

original: Jolene: It was right before their big argument.
translation: Jolene: 就在他们吵架之前。

original: So it wasn’t just laying around in the bar.
translation: 所以这瓶饮料原本不在吧台那里。

original: He decided to retrieve it after the argument.
translation: 弗林哈特专门回屋拿了这瓶饮料。

original: Jolene: I can't thank you enough for defending Celeste.
translation: Jolene: 您为我女儿辩护让我感激不尽。

original: Jolene: I don't know what we would have done without you.
translation: Jolene: 要是没有您，我真的不知道该怎么办了。

original: Tyrion: Defending people like your daughter is the [i]exact[/i] reason why I became a defense attorney.
translation: Tyrion: 我决定成为辩护律师的理由，<u>就是</u>要为向您女儿的一样弱势群体辩护。

original: ...You just hope you can save her.
translation: ……你只希望能成功救出她。

original: Jolene: Why is this happening to us...?
translation: Jolene: 为什么这种事会发生在我们身上……？

original: Jolene: I can't imagine how Celeste is taking all of this.
translation: Jolene: 塞莱斯特一定难受极了。

original: Tyrion: I'm sorry...[p/] I wish there was more I could do...
translation: Tyrion: 抱歉……[p/]希望我微薄的力量能帮到你们……

original: Jolene: I just want to see her again.
translation: Jolene: 我只想再见她一面。

original: Tyrion: You will.[p/] I'll make sure she's acquitted.
translation: Tyrion: 会的。[p/]我会尽全力证明她无罪。

original: Tyrion: I actually saw Garrick Pierce here earlier.
translation: Tyrion: 我刚刚在走廊看见加里克·皮尔斯了。

original: Tyrion: Did he say anything to you?
translation: Tyrion: 他有和你说什么吗？

original: Jolene: No...[p/] I didn't even know he was here.
translation: Jolene: 没有……[p/]我甚至都不知道他刚刚在这儿。

original: Jolene: ...
translation: Jolene: ……

original: Jolene: But maybe it's for the best.
translation: Jolene: 或许这样才好。

original: Jolene: The Gary we knew is probably long gone by now.
translation: Jolene: 我们认识的加里早就已经不在了。

original: "Gary"?
translation: “加里”？

original: She's been through enough.[p/] It’d be best not to remind her about her dead husband more than you need to.
translation: 她已经足够心碎了，[p/]最好不要过多提及她丈夫的死。

original: Jolene: If only I'd told Flinhart about Celeste's powers...
translation: Jolene: 要是我早点告诉弗林哈特关于塞莱斯特的事……

original: Jolene: Maybe we could have avoided all of this.
translation: Jolene: 或许就能避免这一切。

original: Tyrion: You shouldn't torture yourself with hypotheticals.[p/] You did what you thought was right.
translation: Tyrion: 别再用假设来伤害自己了，[p/]你做了自己认为对的事。

original: Jolene: I suppose you have a point.
translation: Jolene: 你说得有道理。

original: Tyrion: I heard that you've been using artificery to light up your house.
translation: Tyrion: 听说你们一直用这种奥术能源来提供光源。

original: Jolene: Yes.[p/] Celeste was insistent.
translation: Jolene: 是的。[p/]塞莱斯特坚持要我们用这个。

original: Jolene: Honestly,[p/] Flinhart and I didn't see the appeal.
translation: Jolene: 说实话，[p/]弗林哈特和我都没什么兴趣。

original: Jolene: But she was so excited to install it.[p/] We just couldn't say no.
translation: Jolene: 但她在安装时表现得很开心，[p/]我们实在没办法回绝。

original: Jolene: It [i]is[/i] a bit of a problem, though.
translation: Jolene: 不过这个装置<u>确实</u>有点问题就是了。

original: Jolene: The machine that powers the lights always breaks.
translation: Jolene: 给灯供能的装置总是坏掉。

original: Jolene: It's such a shame that the bottle shattered.
translation: Jolene: 那瓶饮料摔碎了真可惜。

original: Jolene: Flinhart was really looking forward to surprising Celeste.
translation: Jolene: 弗林哈特真的很期待给塞莱斯特这个惊喜。

original: It was probably his last gift to her...
translation: 这或许是他留给塞莱斯特的最后礼物了……

original: It's too bad that it's become a part of the crime scene.
translation: 很不幸它成了犯罪现场的一部分。

original: Tyrion: I'm so sorry about what happened to Effie.
translation: Tyrion: 我对埃菲的事深感遗憾。

original: Tyrion: That must have been traumatizing.
translation: Tyrion: 那一定很不好受。

original: Jolene: I suppose it was.
translation: Jolene: 是啊。

original: Jolene: But these things are a lot more common than you'd think.
translation: Jolene: 但这种事比你想的要普遍。

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] The nobility rarely takes responsibility for their mistakes.
translation: Tyrion: 对……[p/]贵族很少为自己犯下的错误负责。

original: Tyrion: I'm still surprised that Celeste is a mercenary.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特在当雇佣兵这事儿还是让我很惊讶。

original: Tyrion: It's not the first job I'd picked to support my family.
translation: Tyrion: 这种工作可不是我补贴家用的首选。

original: Jolene: I think that it fits her.
translation: Jolene: 我觉得还挺适合她的。

original: Jolene: She had a habit of picking fights with people when she was a child.
translation: Jolene: 她小时候就经常和附近的人打架。

original: Tyrion: Oh...[p/] I didn't expect that.
translation: Tyrion: 啊……[p/]我没想到这点。

original: Jolene: She may be adopted.[p/] But she's definitely Flinhart's daughter.
translation: Jolene: 可能她是收养的，[p/]但她毋庸置疑是弗林哈特和我的女儿。

original: Tyrion: Can you tell me more about this?
translation: Tyrion: 你对这个有什么想法吗？

original: Jolene: Sorry,[p/] but I don't know much about these things.
translation: Jolene: 抱歉，[p/]但我不太了解这些。

original: You use the key to enter Celeste’s room.
translation: 用塞莱斯特给的钥匙打开了门。

original: However,[p/] you’re startled when you notice that someone else is already inside.
translation: 本以为会是空房间，[p/]但没想到屋里已经有人了。

original: Jolene: I’ve already told you[p/] “knights” everything that I know!
translation: Jolene: 我已经把我知道的全都告诉你们这些[p/]“骑士”了！

original: Jolene: What more do you-?!
translation: Jolene: 你们到底还要打听什——？！

original: Jolene: Oh?[p/] Aren't you Celeste's attorney?
translation: Jolene: 哎呀？[p/]你不是塞莱斯特的律师吗？

original: Tyrion: I-[p/]I am…[p/] Who are you?
translation: Tyrion: 是、[p/]是我……[p/]请问您是？

original: Jolene: Oh,[p/] how rude of me.
translation: Jolene: 啊，[p/]失礼了。

original: Jolene: I'm Jolene McCoy.[p/] I'm Celeste's mother.
translation: Jolene: 我是朱莲尼·麦考伊，[p/]塞莱斯特的母亲。

original: Jolene: I was at the trial this morning.
translation: Jolene: 我今早也在法庭旁听。

original: Jolene: I can’t thank you enough for everything that you’ve done for my daughter.
translation: Jolene: 对您为我女儿的辩护感激不尽。

original: So [i]this[/i] is Celeste’s mother.
translation: 原来<u>她就是</u>塞莱斯特的母亲。

original: She might be able to tell you more about Flinhart.
translation: 她应该可以告诉你关于弗林哈特的事。

original: Tyrion: ...About that.[p/] Do you mind if I ask you some questions for my investigation?
translation: Tyrion: ……说起这个，[p/]您不介意我问一些调查相关的问题吧？

original: Jolene: Of course.[p/] I'll do anything I can to help.
translation: Jolene: 当然，[p/]我会尽我所能帮忙。

original: Alright.[p/] You think you’ve investigated everything you can for now…
translation: 好了，[p/]感觉你已经充分调查过了……

original: …But there’s still one last thing you need to do.
translation: ……但还有一件事必须去做。

original: You ready yourself for one last conversation with Celeste.
translation: 你得在下一次出庭前再和塞莱斯特谈谈。

original: Celeste: I really appreciate you for trying to make me feel better.
translation: Celeste: 你能为我着想，我真的很感激。

original: Celeste: But I know the truth...[p/] And nothing will change that.
translation: Celeste: 但我知道真相……[p/]真相难以动摇。

original: Damn it...[p/] You're still not getting through to her.
translation: 可恶……[p/]你还是没有说服她。

original: OK
translation: OK

original: Celeste believes that her father died hating her.
translation: 塞莱斯特坚信父亲到死都恨着她。

original: But after seeing them together and learning about them,[p/] you know that can't possibly be true.
translation: 但看到他们之前相处的样子，了解了更多关于他们的事之后，[p/]你知道事情不可能是这样。

original: You just need to convince her of that.
translation: 你必须让她相信这一点。

original: Yes
translation: 是

original: No
translation: 否

original: Celeste: I know you’re just trying to make me feel better.[p/] And I really [i]do appreciate it.
translation: Celeste: 我知道你只是想让我好受点，[p/]我也<u>真的</u>很感谢你。

original: Celeste: But everyone knows that my father hated mages.
translation: Celeste: 但我父亲痛恨法师这件事人尽皆知。

original: Tyrion: I don’t know if it’s my place to say this,[p/] but there’s a reason why your father hated magic so much.
translation: Tyrion: 这件事由我来告诉你可能不太合适，[p/]但是你父亲痛恨魔法是有原因的。

original: Celeste: …What?
translation: Celeste: ……怎么会?

original: Tyrion: When Flinhart was a child,[p/] he had a sister.
translation: Tyrion: 你父亲还是孩童时，[p/]他有个妹妹。

original: Tyrion: She was tragically killed by a mage decades ago.
translation: Tyrion: 她在几十年前被一位法师失手杀害。

original: Tyrion: [i]That's[/i] why he had such an immense hatred for magic.
translation: Tyrion: <u>这</u>才是他如此痛恨魔法的根本原因。

original: Celeste: ...What is this?
translation: Celeste: ……这是什么？

original: Tyrion: [i]This[/i] is the reason why your father hated magic.
translation: Tyrion: <u>这</u>就是你父亲讨厌魔法的原因。

original: Celeste: I'm sorry...[p/] But I don't think I understand.
translation: Celeste: 抱歉……[p/]我没懂两者有什么关联。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/]哦……

original: Perhaps it would be best to try something else.
translation: 也许应该试试别的证据。

original: Celeste: I-[p/]I…[p/] I never knew.
translation: Celeste: 我、[p/]我……[p/]我从没听说过。

original: Celeste: ...But that doesn’t change anything.
translation: Celeste: ……但这也改变不了什么。

original: Celeste: That’s all the more reason for him to have hated me...
translation: Celeste: 不如说他恨我的理由更充分了……

original: Celeste: I [i]knew[/i] how much he hated magic.[p/] But I still learned to use it anyways.
translation: Celeste: 我<u>明知</u>他是那么的痛恨魔法，[p/]但我还是一意孤行。

original: Celeste: Magic killed someone that he loved.[p/][s/] No wonder he was furious!
translation: Celeste: 魔法曾杀害了他爱的人，[p/][s/]难怪他会那么生气！
