original: Tyrion: But you didn’t learn magic to benefit yourself, did you?
translation: Tyrion: 但你学魔法又不是为了让自己受益，对吧？

original: Tyrion: You learned it to save your family after your tavern was shut down.
translation: Tyrion: 你是为了在酒馆停业后补贴家用才学的。

original: Celeste: T-[p/]That’s…
translation: Celeste: 这、[p/]这是……

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: .……什么？

original: Tyrion: You're not a selfish person, Celeste.[p/] And [i]this[/i] proves it.
translation: Tyrion: 你并不自私，塞莱斯特。[p/]<u>这</u>就是证据。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Thank you for trying to make me feel better.
translation: Celeste: 谢谢你试图让我好受一点。

original: Celeste: ...But I don't see how [i]that[/i] proves anything.
translation: Celeste: ……但我看不出<u>这</u>能说明什么。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...
translation: Tyrion: 哦、[p/]哦.……

original: Perhaps it would be best to try something else.
translation: 也许应该试试别的证据。

original: Tyrion: You’re a good person, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特，我知道你心地善良。

original: Tyrion: You did everything you could to help your family.
translation: Tyrion: 你竭尽所能为家里分担压力。

original: Tyrion: I’m sure your father recognized that.
translation: Tyrion: 你父亲肯定知道的。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Just shut up...
translation: Celeste: 别说了……

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Celeste: Shut up![p/][s/] Just stop it!
translation: Celeste: 别说了！[p/][s/]别提这事了！

original: Whatever composure she had before is slowly breaking down.
translation: 她曾经沉着的样子渐渐崩坏。

original: Celeste: You weren’t there![p/][s/] You didn’t hear what he said to me!
translation: Celeste: 你当时根本不在那！[p/][s/]你没听到他说了什么！

original: Celeste: I could see it in his eyes...[p/][s/] There’s no way he would ever forgive me!
translation: Celeste: 从他的眼神就能看出来……[p/]他永远不可能原谅我了！

original: Tyrion: Take a look at this picture, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: 看看这张照片，塞莱斯特。

original: Celeste: What...?[p/] A shattered bottle?
translation: Celeste: 什么……？[p/]碎掉的玻璃瓶？

original: Celeste: Wait…[p/] Is that a bottle of Lotus Juice?
translation: Celeste: 等等……[p/]这是瓶莲之水？

original: Tyrion: Do you know where I found this?
translation: Tyrion: 你知道我是在哪找到这个的吗？

original: Tyrion: On the floor of your family’s inn.
translation: Tyrion: 就在你们家酒馆的地板上。

original: Celeste: What?[p/] That can't be true...
translation: Celeste: 什么？[p/]这不可能……

original: Celeste: I tried to find it here,[p/] but no one sells it in Wyverngarde...
translation: Celeste: 我以前打听过，[p/]维文加德境内根本没有人卖……

original: Tyrion: Your father knew how much you loved this drink.
translation: Tyrion: 你父亲知道你多喜欢这种饮料。

original: Tyrion: He called in quite a few favors just so he could have it imported for you.
translation: Tyrion: 他找了好多人帮忙，只为能帮你进口这种饮料。

original: Celeste: W-[p/]what…?[p/] He did that?
translation: Celeste: 什、[p/]什么……？[p/]他这么做了？

original: Tyrion: Your father didn’t hate you, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: 你父亲并不恨你，塞莱斯特。

original: Tyrion: He loved you more than anything.
translation: Tyrion: 他爱你胜过一切。

original: Celeste: T-[p/]that…[p/][s/] doesn’t change anything!
translation: Celeste: 这、[p/]这……[p/]也改变不了什么！

original: Celeste: If he did that all for me,[p/] it was [i]before[/i] he knew about my secret.
translation: Celeste: 他一定是在发现我是法师<u>之前</u>做的这些事。

original: Celeste: I’m sure…[p/] he never would have done that if he knew the truth.
translation: Celeste: 要是早就知道真相，[p/]他才不会为我做这么多。

original: Tyrion: That’s not true at all.
translation: Tyrion: 这是不可能的。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: What the hell would [i]you[/i] know about him?!
translation: Celeste: <u>你</u>知道他什么了！？

original: Celeste: You barely even [i]knew[/i] him!
translation: Celeste: 你甚至刚认识他没几天！

original: Celeste: How could you possibly know how he felt about me?!
translation: Celeste: 你怎么可能知道他是怎么看待我的？！

original: Celeste: Don’t you think I [i]want[/i] to believe that he still loved me before he died?!
translation: Celeste: 我也<u>想</u>相信他死前是爱我的！

original: Celeste: But I know the truth…[p/][s/] There’s no way he would ever forgive me for what I did!
translation: Celeste: 但我清楚事实……[p/][s/]他不可能原谅做了这些事的我！

original: Tyrion: It’s not just the fact that he bought that drink for you.
translation: Tyrion: 不只有他为你买了这瓶饮料这一点。

original: Tyrion: It’s also where the bottle was when it shattered.
translation: Tyrion: 瓶子碎掉的位置也很重要。

original: Celeste: …What do you mean?
translation: Celeste: ……这是什么意思？

original: Tyrion: Your mother said that the bottle was stowed in her room before your argument.
translation: Tyrion: 你母亲说这瓶饮料一直藏在他们的卧室。

original: Tyrion: But I found the shattered bottle in the lobby,[p/] where his body was.
translation: Tyrion: 但我在大厅找到了这个碎掉的瓶子，[p/]就在他的旁边。

original: Tyrion: I…[p/] ran into him before I went to look for you.[p/] He was going upstairs to his room.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]我去找你的时候在楼梯上和他撞了个满怀。[p/]他当时正上楼去卧室。

original: Tyrion: That can only mean one thing.
translation: Tyrion: 这只意味着一件事。

original: Tyrion: He went to retrieve the bottle [i]after[/i] your argument ended.
translation: Tyrion: 你们吵完<u>之后</u>他才去拿这瓶饮料。

original: Celeste: What…?[p/] Why would he have it?
translation: Celeste: 什么……？[p/]他为什么要拿莲之水？

original: Tyrion: It’s because he was going to give it to you, Celeste!
translation: Tyrion: 因为他打算用这个和你道歉，塞莱斯特！

original: Tyrion: He was going to give you a gift to apologize for what he said to you!
translation: Tyrion: 他想用这个礼物为自己对你说的话道歉！

original: Celeste: H-[p/]he…[p/] he was going to apologize?
translation: Celeste: 他、[p/]他……[p/]他要对我道歉？

original: Tyrion: Your father loved you, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: 你父亲深爱着你，塞莱斯特。

original: Tyrion: And,[p/] as tragic as it is,[p/] he was going to try to apologize to you before he was murdered.
translation: Tyrion: 但遗憾的是，[p/]他还没来得及和你道歉就被杀害了。

original: Celeste: …!
translation: Celeste: ……！

original: Flinhart: …I don’t like this.
translation: Flinhart: ……我不放心。

original: Flinhart: My daughter…[p/] working as a [i]mercenary[/i], of all things.
translation: Flinhart: 我女儿……[p/]这么多工作可以选，却要去做<u>雇佣兵</u>。

original: Celeste: Come on, Dad!
translation: Celeste: 爸！没事的。

original: Celeste: You [i]know[/i] I can handle myself.
translation: Celeste: 你<u>知道</u>我能照顾好自己。

original: Flinhart: I don’t doubt it.
translation: Flinhart: 我不是怀疑你的能力。

original: Flinhart: …But you still shouldn’t have to risk your neck for [i]our[/i] sakes.
translation: Flinhart: ……但我觉得你拼上性命来维持<u>我们的</u>生计很不妥。

original: Celeste: …They closed the inn, Dad.[p/] We won’t be able to survive unless I do this.
translation: Celeste: ……爸，他们关停了酒馆，[p/]我们别无出路了。

original: Flinhart: ...Just be careful, okay?
translation: Flinhart: ……务必小心行事，好吗？

original: Flinhart: I don’t know what I’d do if anything happened to you.
translation: Flinhart: 如果你出了事……[p/]我不知道该怎么办。

original: Flinhart: …No matter what anyone says,[p/] you’re our daughter.
translation: Flinhart: ……无论外人怎么说，[p/]你都是我们的女儿。

original: Flinhart: And we’ll love you until the day we die.
translation: Flinhart: 我们对你的爱至死不渝。

original: Celeste: Dad…[p/] How could I ever think that-…?
translation: Celeste: 爸爸……[p/]我怎么会那样想——？

original: Celeste: I’m sorry![p/] I’m so sorry![p/] Dad!
translation: Celeste: 对不起！[p/]对不起！[p/]爸爸！

original: Celeste had barely been keeping it together throughout the whole ARGUMENT.[p/] But her realization is finally causing her to break down.
translation: 她<size=1.5em>辩论</size>期间一直尽力保持从容，[p/]这件事成了压垮骆驼的最后一根稻草。

original: She begins crying loudly as she quickly embraces you.[p/] In this cold, dark place,[p/] she probably hadn’t felt warmth of any kind for days.
translation: 她抱着你失声痛哭。[p/]在阴冷的监牢内待了这么多天，她大概很久没感受过温暖了。

original: You're caught off-guard and feel a little embarrassed.[p/] But you comfort her while she vents her emotions.
translation: 突如其来的举动搞得你有些尴尬，[p/]但你还是安慰着发泄情绪的她。

original: Tyrion: Are you feeling better?
translation: Tyrion: 你好点儿了吗？

original: Celeste: Yeah…[p/] I think I’m okay now.
translation: Celeste: 嗯……[p/]我应该没事了。

original: Celeste: …I’ve been thinking such horrible things this entire time.
translation: Celeste: ……我这段时间一直在想这种事。

original: She looks at you and gives you a warm smile.
translation: 她抬起双眼。对你露出了暖心的微笑。

original: It’s probably the first time you’ve seen her genuinely smile since this whole ordeal started.
translation: 事件发生以来，这是你第一次见到她发自内心的微笑。

original: Celeste: ...Thank you.
translation: Celeste: ……谢谢你。

original: Celeste: But is everything [i]really[/i] going to be okay?
translation: Celeste: 但庭审的事怎么办呢？

original: Tyrion: I'll make sure of it.
translation: Tyrion: 我会负责的。

original: Tyrion: I'll get justice for you [i]and[/i] your father.[p/] It doesn't matter who stands in my way.
translation: Tyrion: 我会给你<u>和</u>你父亲讨回公道的，[p/]无论挡在我面前的是谁。

original: Tyrion: Even if they're a man,[p/] king,[p/] or god.
translation: Tyrion: 人、[p/]王、[p/]亦或是神。

original: Celeste: You’re completely different now.
translation: Celeste: 你刚才好像变了个人。

original: Celeste: ...What happened to the nervous wreck from before?
translation: Celeste: ……之前那个紧张的毛头小子去哪儿啦？

original: Tyrion: A-[p/]ah![p/] [i]Please[/i] forget about that.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]啊！[p/]<u>求求你</u>忘了吧。

original: Celeste: *giggle*
translation: Celeste: *嬉笑*

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] take some time to rest.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]好好休息一下吧。

original: Tyrion: The trial is going to resume soon.
translation: Tyrion: 再过不久就要继续审理了。

original: With that,[p/] you’ve done everything you can for now.
translation: 这样一来，[p/]你也把能做的事都做了。

original: You’ve learned a lot about what happened the night of the murder…[p/] You just hope it’s enough.
translation: 你已经充分了解了案发当晚的情况……[p/]希望这些足以让你胜诉。

original: But even with your investigation,[p/] you still don’t know what the prosecution has planned…
translation: 即便你进行了充分的调查，[p/]检方的计划仍是一团谜……

original: Aria: Has Pierce told you all of the details, Mr. Rudolf?
translation: Aria: 鲁道夫先生，皮尔斯把当晚的细节都告诉你了？

original: Aria: Will you remember them?
translation: Aria: 你能回忆一下吗？

original: Rhys: Yes.[p/] I pride myself on my eidetic memory.
translation: Rhys: 当然，[p/]我对我超常的记忆力很有自信。

original: Aria: …
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: Just so there are no misunderstandings.
translation: Aria: 为了避免误会。

original: Aria: I do [i]not[/i] approve of this.
translation: Aria: 先说好我<u>不赞成</u>这种做法。

original: Garrick: You said it yourself, Lady Steelwind.
translation: Garrick: 斯蒂尔文德女士，如你的推论所言。

original: Garrick: There’s no possible way that [i]I[/i] could have done the deed.
translation: Garrick: <u>我</u>不可能作案。

original: Garrick: It has to be the bastard child.
translation: Garrick: 一定是那个野种。

original: Garrick: We don’t know what sort of tricks Ruby Tymora might pull tomorrow.
translation: Garrick: 我们可不知道鲁比·泰摩拉明天会搞出什么手段。

original: Garrick: Just see this as a way of securing a just verdict.
translation: Garrick: 我们就当这是谋取公正判决的方法吧。

original: Aria: …
translation: Aria: ……

original: Tyrion: Celeste...[p/] Please calm down.[p/]
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……[p/]请冷静。[p/]

original: Tyrion: [i]This[/i] proves that your father didn't hate you.
translation: Tyrion: <u>这</u>能证明你父亲并不恨你。

original: Celeste: ...Don't talk about things that you don't understand.
translation: Celeste: ……不要谈论你不了解的事。

original: Celeste: I know the truth,[p/] and nothing will change my mind.
translation: Celeste: 我知道真相，[p/]没有什么能让我改变主意。

original: Perhaps it would be best to try something else.
translation: 也许应该试试别的证据。

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of a man in a suit.[p/] There's some text on it.
translation: Tyrion: 一幅穿西装的人的画像，[p/]下面还有几行字。

original: Tyrion: "Adam Eveleigh:[p/] Politician of the Pedantic."
translation: Tyrion: “Adam Eveleigh：[p/]迂腐的政治家。”

original: Orym: I've heard of this guy.[p/] He's some kind of politician from one of the nations west of here.
translation: Orym: 我听说过这家伙。[p/]他是西边某个国家的政治家。

original: Orym: I heard he's pretty much a shoo-in to win whatever election they have going there.
translation: Orym: 据说无论举行怎样的选举，他都能稳操胜券。

original: An "election"?[p/] Was Flinhart studying democracies for his little "revolution"?
translation: “选举”？[p/]弗林哈特是在为他的“革命”研究民主吗？

original: Tyrion: It's a painting...[p/] of a mage?[p/] And there's some text on it.
translation: Tyrion: 这是一幅关于……[p/]法师的画像？[p/]上面写了什么东西。

original: Tyrion: "Somala Daghlian:[p/] a legendary practitioner of the Arcane Arts.[p/] He mysteriously disappeared one day."
translation: Tyrion: “Somala Daghlian：[p/] 传奇奥术实践者。[p/]他突然有一天人间蒸发了。”

original: Tyrion: "It's rumored that he was developing a formula for a new [b]transmutation[/b] spell."
translation: Tyrion: “据说他失踪前正研究着一种新的[b]形变术[/b]配方。”

original: Tyrion: "However,[p/] he was reckless in casting the spell.[p/] And Daghlian quickly lost control of its magic."
translation: Tyrion: “然而，[p/]他施法时太鲁莽了。[p/]很快失去了对魔法的控制。”

original: Tyrion: "His body was never found.[p/] Many speculate that he didn't actually die during the accident.[p/] But if that's true,[p/] where [i]did[/i] he end up?"
translation: Tyrion: “他的尸首不知所踪，[p/]许多人怀疑他从事故中逃过一劫。[p/]可如果那是真的，[p/]他去哪儿了呢？”

original: Orym: Hmph...[p/] Sounds like a cautionary tale against using magic.
translation: Orym: 嗯……[p/]听起来像是预防滥用魔法的小故事。

original: ...[i]That[/i] might explain why Flinhart keeps it in his tavern.
translation: ……<u>这</u>也许就是弗林哈特把画挂在酒馆里的原因。

original: Tyrion: The Inquisition lit some candles...[p/] But there's a magical lamp right there.
translation: Tyrion: 裁判所在这儿点了几支蜡烛……[p/]但旁边就有个魔法台灯。

original: Tyrion: I wonder why they're not using those instead.
translation: Tyrion: 我很好奇为什么不用这个。

original: There's a chalk outline of a person on the ground of the tavern.
translation: 酒馆地上有个用粉笔画出的尸体轮廓。

original: This is probably where Flinhart died.
translation: 这大概就是弗林哈特死亡的位置。

original: The outline matches the picture that the Inquisition took.
translation: 轮廓与裁判所拍的照片完美吻合。

original: Nothing seems out of place here.
translation: 这里没什么特别需要注意的。

original: There’s a broken bottle on the floor.[p/] It’s shattered close to the chalk outline of the body.
translation: 地上有玻璃瓶的碎片。[p/]碎片离尸体轮廓很近。

original: Tyrion: The label has the words “Lotus Juice” on it…
translation: Tyrion: 标签上写着“莲之水”……

original: Orym: I’ve never heard of that brand before.
translation: Orym: 我从来没听说过这个牌子。

original: Orym: Must be foreign.
translation: Orym: 肯定是外国的。

original: There’s a modern-looking lamp mounted on the wall.
translation: 墙上是个看起来蛮现代化的壁灯。

original: Tyrion: It’s a lamp powered by artificery.
translation: Tyrion: 是以奥术能源为动力的灯。

original: Tyrion: I didn’t expect to find something this sophisticated in a town like this.
translation: Tyrion: 没想到在这样的小镇里能找到这么高级的东西。

original: Orym: Bah![p/] “Artificery” is just another form of magic…
translation: Orym: 哈！[p/]“奥术能源”不过是另一种魔法……

original: Tyrion: Actually,[p/] artificery draws from surrounding ley lines to-
translation: Tyrion: 实际上，[p/]奥数能源汲取的是地脉——

original: Orym: I didn’t ask for a science lesson, kid!
translation: Orym: 我可没让你给我上科学课，小子！

original: Orym: Anyways,[p/] look where artificery got these folks.
translation: Orym: 不管怎么样，[p/]看看奥术能源给这些人带来的“便利”吧。

original: Orym: The arcane power cell broke,[p/] and they haven’t had any power for weeks.
translation: Orym: 这个奥术电池已经坏了，[p/]他们好几周没有电力了。

original: Orym: Yep.[p/] Nothing can beat good old oil and flame.
translation: Orym: 哼，[p/]没什么能比过经典的灯油与火组合。

original: Tyrion: I was wondering if I could ask you some questions about the case.
translation: Tyrion: 请问我可以问你一些关于此案的问题吗？

original: Orym: Hah![p/][s/] As if I’d help the likes of you!
translation: Orym: 哈！[p/][s/]没门！

original: Orym: I saw who your boss is,[p/] and I know what you’re up to. [mind="That witch probably sent you here to con me."/]
translation: Orym: 我知道你老大是谁，[p/]你打算做什么我也心知肚明。 [mind="大概率是那个巫婆让你来套我话的。"/]

original: Tyrion: What…?[p/] I’m [i]just[/i] looking for some information.
translation: Tyrion: 啥……？[p/]我<u>只是</u>想获得些情报。

original: Orym: A likely story.
translation: Orym: 说得好听。

original: He was cooperative before when he let you see Celeste...
translation: 他之前帮你见塞莱斯特的时候还非常配合……

original: Why is he being so stubborn now?
translation: 现在他怎么这么顽固？

original: Is he angry that you embarrassed him in court today?
translation: 是因为你今天在法庭上让他难堪了？

original: In any case,[p/] you won’t get anywhere at this rate.
translation: 不管怎样，[p/]这么下去是不会有进展的。

original: If you want his help,[p/] you’ll need to persuade him through an ARGUMENT.
translation: 如果想让他配合调查，[p/]就需要在<size=1.5em>辩论</size>中说服他。

original: Tyrion: So…[p/] what does the Arcane Inquisition do exactly?
translation: Tyrion: 所以说……[p/]奥术裁判所都是做什么的？

original: Orym: …You trying to pick a fight with me?
translation: Orym: ……你是来挑事的吗？

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No![p/][s/] I’m just [i]genuinely[/i] curious!
translation: Tyrion: 没、[p/][s/]没有！[p/][s/]我<u>真的</u>只是好奇！

original: Orym: Well…[p/] I'm sure you already know.[p/] But us Inquisitors investigate crimes that involve magic.
translation: Orym: 哼……[p/]你肯定已经知道了，[p/]裁判所调查涉及魔法的犯罪案件。

original: Tyrion: Do crimes like this happen often?
translation: Tyrion: 像这样的刑事案件经常发生吗？

original: Orym: Nah…[p/] Maybe once in a blue moon.
translation: Orym: 不……[p/]两三年能有一次吧。

original: It makes sense.[p/] Most mages [i]are[/i] in the nobility after all.
translation: 不无道理，[p/]毕竟大多数法师都<u>是</u>贵族。

original: Even if they’re untouchable,[p/] they don’t make a habit of getting into trouble with the law.
translation: 即使他们再难以触及，[p/]也不会轻易违反法律，惹火上身。

original: Tyrion: You must have an easy job, then.
translation: Tyrion: 那你工作还蛮轻松的。

original: Orym: Heh…[p/] You got that right. [mind="The only reason we exist is to clean up the nobility’s messes."/]
translation: Orym: 呵……[p/]那倒没错。 [mind="我们就是专门打扫那帮贵族留下的烂摊子的。"/]

original: He doesn’t seem that happy about that.
translation: 他貌似很不爽。

original: Tyrion: Commander White,[p/] you seem to speak negatively about my client's magic.
translation: Tyrion: 怀特指挥官，[p/]你似乎因为魔法的缘故，[p/]对我的委托人有些负面看法。

original: Tyrion: Do you have a personal grudge against mages?
translation: Tyrion: 你难道对于法师有私人恩怨？

original: Orym: You're damn right I do.
translation: Orym: 那可太有恩怨了。

original: Wow...[p/] He didn't even [i]try[/i] to deny it.
translation: 哇哦……[p/]没想到他都不否认一下。

original: Orym: And if you had any sense,[p/] you would too.
translation: Orym: 如果有点脑子的话，[p/]你也会的。

original: Orym: All a mage has to do is wave their hands and say some magic nonsense.
translation: Orym: 这些法师只要大手一挥，说些莫名其妙的咒语。

original: Orym: Then you suddenly have a dead body on the ground.
translation: Orym: 一瞬之间地上就会出现一具尸体。

original: Orym: And don't get me [i]started[/i] on Mageblight.
translation: Orym: 更别提法师之疫了。

original: Orym: If some noble uses their magic too much,[p/] they end up snapping and going on a rampage.
translation: Orym: 要是某个贵族使用魔法过度，[p/]最后会失控暴走。

original: Tyrion: I don't know if this is going too far…
translation: Tyrion: 我不知道这会不会冒犯到你……

original: Tyrion: But why join the Inquisition if you hate mages so much?
translation: Tyrion: 但你这么痛恨法师，为什么还要加入裁判所呢？

original: Tyrion: Considering the fact that…[p/] Um…
translation: Tyrion: 考虑到……[p/]嗯……

original: Orym: That my “[i]job[/i]” is to sweep the nobility’s crimes under the rug?
translation: Orym: 考虑到我的“<u>工作</u>”只是为了包庇犯罪的贵族？

original: Tyrion: S-[p/][s/]Sorry,[p/] I didn’t mean to insinuate-
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉。[p/]我不是要含沙射影——

original: Orym: Nope.[p/] You have the right of it.
translation: Orym: 没事，[p/]你说得对。

original: Orym: Anytime a noble is involved in a case,[p/] I’m ordered to look the other way.
translation: Orym: 每当有贵族被卷入案件，[p/]我都被要求睁一只眼闭一只眼。

original: Tyrion: You don’t seem very happy to do that...
translation: Tyrion: 你似乎对此不太高兴……

original: Tyrion: Why would you stay in this line of work?
translation: Tyrion: 那你为什么还继续干这行呢？

original: Orym: Because every once in a while,[p/] I’m [i]allowed[/i] to put a criminal mage behind bars.
translation: Orym: 因为每隔一段时间，[p/]我<u>被允许</u>把一个有罪的法师送进监狱。

original: Orym: We can’t go after the nobles.[p/] But any other mage is fair game.
translation: Orym: 我们没办法追究贵族的过错。[p/]但其他法师就另当别论了。

original: Orym: …Or at least,[p/] they [i]were[/i] before your boss showed up.
translation: Orym: ……至少[p/]……在你老大添乱之前。

original: “Your boss”?[p/] Does he have something against Ms. Tymora?
translation: “你的老大”？[p/]他是不是和泰摩拉女士有些过节？

original: Tyrion: I have to ask... [p/]Did something happen between you and Ms. Tymora?
translation: Tyrion: 我不得不问……[p/]你和泰摩拉女士以前发生过什么吗？

original: Orym: Hah![p/] “[i]Ms.[/i] Tymora”.
translation: Orym: 哈！[p/]“泰摩拉<u>女士</u>”。

original: Orym: What are you?[p/] Her lackey or something?
translation: Orym: 你是啥？[p/]她的小跟班？

original: Tyrion: No, actually...[p/] She’s my guardian.
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/]她其实是我的监护人。

original: Orym: O-[p/][s/]Oh…[p/] I didn’t know she even had a-…
translation: Orym: 哦、[p/][s/]哦……[p/]我不知道她甚至有个——

original: Orym: …
translation: Orym: ……

original: Orym: Look, kid.[p/] I don’t know what the deal is between you two.
translation: Orym: 是这样的，小子。[p/]我不清楚你们之间是什么关系。

original: Orym: But no good will ever come from associating with her.
translation: Orym: 但是和她扯上关系准没好事。

original: Tyrion: …This is about the rumors, isn’t it?
translation: Tyrion: ……因为那些谣言吗？

original: Throughout the years,[p/] there have been several insidious rumors surrounding Ms. Tymora.
translation: 这么多年来，[p/]一直有很多关于泰摩拉女士的难听谣言。

original: She's been accused of forgery,[p/] blackmail,[p/] and all manner of illegal activities.
translation: 说她伪造证据，[p/]敲诈勒索，[p/]进行各种非法活动。

original: It’s clearly misinformation spread by the nobility to discredit her.
translation: 显然是贵族们为了败坏她的名声而散播的谣言。

original: She's always been fine with it.[p/] But you can’t help but get angry on her behalf.
translation: 她本人一直都不在意。[p/]但你一直替她感到不平。

original: Orym: It’s more than just rumors.[p/] I’ve seen it for myself.
translation: Orym: 那不仅是谣言，[p/]我亲眼见过。

original: Orym: That woman is evil, kid.
translation: Orym: 小子，那女人是个魔鬼。

original: Tyrion: She defends mages who don’t have the protection of the nobility!
translation: Tyrion: 她仅仅是为不受贵族保护的法师辩护而已！

original: Tyrion: She’s not evil![p/][s/] She’s a hero!
translation: Tyrion: 她才不是什么恶魔！[p/][s/]她是英雄！

original: Orym: Yeah...[p/] Whatever...
translation: Orym: 行……[p/]随你……

original: Tyrion: This probably goes without saying,[p/] but I don’t believe that the sword is the murder weapon.
translation: Tyrion: 可能不言而喻，[p/]但我不觉得那把剑就是凶器。

original: Orym: Right…[p/] I guess you have to prove that someone [i]else[/i] put the sword there.
translation: Orym: 对……[p/]你证明了是<u>别人</u>把剑插进去的。

original: Tyrion: Did the Inquisition find anything suspicious on the scene?
translation: Tyrion: 裁判所有在现场找到了什么可疑的物品吗？

original: Orym: If you’re asking if we found another bloody weapon lying around,[p/] we definitely didn’t.
translation: Orym: 如果你问是否找到了另一把染血的凶器，[p/]那肯定是没有。

original: That would be a little [i]too[/i] convenient, wouldn’t it?
translation: 要是能找到倒好了。

original: Orym: But let’s say that the girl really [i]is[/i] being framed.
translation: Orym: 我们假设那女孩<u>真的</u>被陷害了。

original: Orym: If there was another murder weapon,[p/] the killer probably walked out with it.
translation: Orym: 就算有另一把凶器，[p/]也肯定被凶手带走了。

original: Tyrion: Do you think they could have hidden it somewhere in the tavern?
translation: Tyrion: 你认为有藏在酒馆的可能性吗？

original: Orym: Doubt it.[p/] After the trial,[p/] Steelwind turned the place upside-down and scanned it with her magic.
translation: Orym: 不太可能。[p/]庭审过后，[p/]斯蒂尔文德用她的探测魔法把这儿翻了个底朝天。

original: Orym: If someone did hide a murder weapon here,[p/] they hid it well.
translation: Orym: 如果某人真在这儿藏了凶器，[p/]那他可藏太好了。

original: Or they hid it in plain sight.
translation: 也可能藏在了众目睽睽之下。

original: Tyrion: I can’t believe you made such an obvious mistake during your investigation…
translation: Tyrion: 没想到你竟然在调查过程中犯了如此低级的错误……

original: Orym: Oh, shut it with that.[p/] I already got an earful from Steelwind about that mess.
translation: Orym: 唔啊，快别提了。[p/]我的耳朵早就因为这事儿被斯蒂尔文德训出茧子了。

original: Orym: Well, you don’t have to worry about [i]me[/i] mucking things up.
translation: Orym: 不过，你不用担心<u>我</u>的失职会把调查搞砸。

original: Orym: Steelwind’s basically taken over the entire investigation.
translation: Orym: 斯蒂尔文德她基本接管了整个调查。

original: Tyrion: Wait…[p/] Does she have the authority to do that?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]她有权接管整个调查？

original: Orym: Normally, she wouldn’t.[p/] But I know better than to go against orders from a noble.
translation: Orym: 一般而言，没有。[p/]但是我知道最好别和贵族作对。

original: Right...[p/] There's definitely a strange power dynamic between them.
translation: 对……[p/]他们之间一定存在某种奇怪的权力平衡。

original: Orym: But honestly,[p/] that girl sweats the details too much.
translation: Orym: 说实话，[p/]斯蒂尔文德她太注重细节了。

original: Orym: She even had my men draw up a scaled map of the crime scene.
translation: Orym: 她甚至让我的手下按比例画了一张犯罪现场地图。

original: Tyrion: Wait, really?[p/] Do you have a copy?
translation: Tyrion: 等等，真的？[p/]你有多余的副本吗？

original: Orym: Sure,[p/] knock yourself out.
translation: Orym: 当然有，[p/]请便。

original: Orym: Don’t know how much good it’ll do you.
translation: Orym: 不知道能不能帮到你。

original: Tyrion: I heard that this was Prosecutor Steelwind’s first trial.
translation: Tyrion: 我听说这是检察官斯蒂尔文德第一次出庭。

original: Tyrion: She must be pretty talented if that’s true.
translation: Tyrion: 她一定非常有当检察官的天赋。

original: Orym: A pain in my ass is what she is.
translation: Orym: 她的天赋是折磨我。

original: Orym: That damn noble comes in here,[p/] telling [i]me[/i] how to do [i]my[/i] job?
translation: Orym: 那个该死的贵族跑过来，[p/]教<u>我</u>怎么干好<u>我的</u>工作？

original: Orym: I honestly have no idea what she’s even doing in this line of work.
translation: Orym: 我真不知道她来这儿干什么的。

original: Tyrion: I heard that she’s from a renowned noble house.
translation: Tyrion: 听说她出身于声势显赫的贵族家庭。

original: Tyrion: She must be a pretty powerful mage.
translation: Tyrion: 那她一定是个非常强悍的法师。

original: Orym: Ha![p/] “Powerful” is an understatement.
translation: Orym: 哈！[p/]“强悍”都是低估了。

original: Orym: The Steelwinds who came before her could turn this entire town into a glass crater.
translation: Orym: 斯蒂尔文德家的祖先可以轻松将这个小镇夷为平地。

original: What?![p/] There’s no way that’s true…[p/] right?
translation: 什么？！[p/]这不可能吧……

original: Tyrion: I have to ask... [p/]Did something happen between you and Ms. Tymora?
translation: Tyrion: 我不得不问……[p/]你和泰摩拉女士以前发生过什么吗？

original: Orym: Hah![p/] “[i]Ms.[/i] Tymora”.
translation: Orym: 哈！[p/]“泰摩拉<u>女士</u>”。

original: Orym: What are you?[p/] Her lackey or something?
translation: Orym: 你是啥？[p/] 她的小跟班？

original: Tyrion: No, actually...[p/] She’s my guardian.
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/]她其实是我的监护人。

original: Orym: O-[p/][s/]Oh…[p/] I didn’t know she even had a-…
translation: Orym: 哦、[p/][s/]哦……[p/]我不知道她甚至有个——

original: Orym: …
translation: Orym: ……

original: Orym: Look, kid.[p/] I don’t know what the deal is between you two.
translation: Orym: 是这样的，小子。[p/]我不清楚你们之间是什么关系。

original: Orym: But no good will ever come from associating with her.
translation: Orym: 但是和她扯上关系准没好事。

original: Tyrion: …This is about the rumors, isn’t it?
translation: Tyrion: ……因为那些谣言吗？

original: Throughout the years,[p/] there have been several insidious rumors surrounding Ms. Tymora.
translation: 这么多年来，[p/]一直有很多关于泰摩拉女士的难听谣言。

original: She's been accused of forgery,[p/] blackmail,[p/] and all manner of illegal activities.
translation: 说她伪造证据，[p/]敲诈勒索，[p/]进行各种非法活动。

original: It’s clearly misinformation spread by the nobility to discredit her.
translation: 显然是贵族们为了败坏她的名声而散播的谣言。

original: She's always been fine with it.[p/] But you can’t help but get angry on her behalf.
translation: 她本人一直都不在意。[p/]但你一直替她感到不平。

original: Orym: It’s more than just rumors.[p/] I’ve seen it for myself.
translation: Orym: 那不仅是谣言，[p/]我亲眼见过。

original: Orym: That woman is evil, kid.
translation: Orym: 小子，那女人是个魔鬼。

original: Tyrion: She defends mages who don’t have the protection of the nobility!
translation: Tyrion: 她仅仅是为不受贵族保护的法师辩护而已！

original: Tyrion: She’s not evil![p/][s/] She’s a hero!
translation: Tyrion: 她才不是什么恶魔！[p/][s/]她是英雄！

original: Orym: Yeah...[p/] Whatever...
translation: Orym: 行……[p/]随你……

original: Orym: I never knew Tymora had a kid.
translation: Orym: 泰摩拉有个孩子我是第一次听说。

original: Orym: Why have I never seen you before?
translation: Orym: 为什么我之前没见过你呢？

original: Tyrion: I...[p/] tend to stay inside a lot.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]不怎么外出。

original: As a child,[p/] you couldn't control the Eye of Horus that well.
translation: 孩童时代，[p/]你没办法像现在一样自如控制荷鲁斯之眼。

original: Hearing the myriad of thoughts from a large crowd tended to be overwhelming for you.
translation: 人群传来的庞大想法会让你承受不住的。

original: Orym: Hm...[p/] I've only ever seen her as a ruthless lawyer.
translation: Orym: 哼嗯……[p/]我只觉得她是个冷酷无情的律师。

original: Orym: It's hard to imagine a woman like that taking care of a kid.
translation: Orym: 很难想象这种女人带孩子的画面。

original: Well...[p/] She was just as ruthless as a guardian...
translation: 呃……[p/]她作为监护人的时候也一样冷酷无情……

original: Orym: I never expected a girl like [i]that[/i] to be a mercenary.
translation: Orym: 我真没想到<u>那样的</u>女孩是个雇佣兵。

original: Orym: But I would've also never expected her to be a murderer either.
translation: Orym: 但我也没想过她会是个杀人犯。

original: Tyrion: She's [i]not[/i] a murderer.[p/] And I'll prove it at the trial tomorrow.
translation: Tyrion: 她<u>不是</u>杀人犯，[p/]我明天会在法庭上证明这一点。

original: Orym: Yeah yeah...[p/] Whatever you say, kid.
translation: Orym: 对，对......[p/]随便你怎么说，小子。

original: Tyrion: I heard that this was Prosecutor Steelwind’s first trial.
translation: Tyrion: 我听说这是检察官斯蒂尔文德第一次出庭。

original: Tyrion: She must be pretty talented if that’s true.
translation: Tyrion: 她一定非常有当检察官的天赋。

original: Orym: A pain in my ass is what she is.
translation: Orym: 她的天赋是折磨我。

original: Orym: That damn noble comes in here,[p/] telling [i]me[/i] how to do [i]my[/i] job?
translation: Orym: 那个该死的贵族跑过来，[p/]教<u>我</u>怎么干好<u>我的</u>工作？

original: Orym: I honestly have no idea what she’s even doing in this line of work.
translation: Orym: 我真不知道她来这儿干什么的。

original: Tyrion: She’s a mage from a noble house,[p/] isn’t she?
translation: Tyrion: 她也是个出身于贵族的法师？

original: Tyrion: She must be a pretty powerful mage.
translation: Tyrion: 那她一定是个非常强悍的法师。

original: Orym: Ha![p/] “Powerful” is an understatement.
translation: Orym: 哈！[p/]“强悍”都是低估了。

original: Orym: Any one of the Steelwinds could turn this entire town into a glass crater.
translation: Orym: 斯蒂尔文德家任何一个人可以轻松将这个小镇夷为平地。

original: What?![p/] There’s no way that’s true…[p/] right?
translation: 什么？！[p/]这不可能吧……

original: Tyrion: The Autopsy Report seems to be pretty detailed in some aspects and vague in others.[p/] Why is that?
translation: Tyrion: 尸检报告在某些方面特别详细，但在其他方面却含糊不清。[p/]为什么会这样？

original: Orym: I'm not sure about the details,[p/] but the autopsy is performed by a mage who studies [b]divination[/b].
translation: Orym: 具体我不确定，[p/]但是尸检是由学习[b]占卜术[/b]的法师进行的。

original: Orym: Their magic gives us details about [i]how[/i] someone dies,[p/] but there's always a few blind spots.
translation: Orym: 魔法揭示了死者的详细<u>死因</u>，[p/]不过总会有盲点。

original: Tyrion: Blind spots?[p/] Like what?
translation: Tyrion: 盲点？[p/]什么样的盲点？

original: Orym: Well, for one thing,[p/] if someone mucks around with the body after death,[p/] the report becomes muddled.
translation: Orym: 嗯，举个例子。[p/]如果死后尸体被人摆弄过，[p/]尸检报告就会变得非常混乱。

original: Orym: [b]Divination[/b] magic can tell [i]what[/i] happened to a body,[p/] but not in what order and at what times.
translation: Orym: [b]占卜术[/b]能解释尸体上发生了<u>什么</u>，[p/]但没办法解释发生的顺序和时间。

original: Hm...[p/] But someone definitely stabbed Flinhart's body with Celeste's sword.
translation: 嗯……[p/]但肯定有人用塞莱斯特的剑捅了了弗林哈特的尸体。

original: If what he's saying is true,[p/] it will be that much harder to figure out what kind of weapon originally killed him.
translation: 如果他说得没错，[p/]想要找出原本的凶器会变得十分困难。

original: Orym: That mage's sword really [i]is[/i] strange.
translation: Orym: 那个法师的剑真的很稀奇。

original: Orym: It's almost a shame that we had to confiscate it.
translation: Orym: 被我们没收了真的很可惜。

original: Tyrion: Is it really that abnormal?
translation: Tyrion: 真的有那么少见吗？

original: Orym: It's definitely not like any kind of sword [i]I've[/i] seen.
translation: Orym: 它和我这辈子见过的所有剑都不同。

original: Orym: I wonder if it was forged in the Eastern Kingdoms...
translation: Orym: 我在想是不是东方古国铸造的……

original: Tyrion: I've never seen a real [b]Spell Compendium[/b] before.
translation: Tyrion: 我在此之前从没见过真的[b]法术汇编[/b]。

original: Tyrion: I'm [i]still[/i] not exactly sure how they work.
translation: Tyrion: 我<u>还不是</u>很清楚它的工作原理。

original: Orym: Well, [b]Spell Compendiums[/b] are magical devices that display exactly which spells a mage can cast.
translation: Orym: 嗯，[b]法术汇编[/b]是种魔法装置，能显示一个法师能使用的魔法。

original: Orym: You can probably guess,[p/] but the Inquisition uses these things all the time.
translation: Orym: 你可能猜到了，[p/]裁判所每次都用这些。

original: Tyrion: Right.[p/] Having that information is definitely a blessing for the defense [i]and[/i] the prosecution.
translation: Tyrion: 确实，[p/]这些信息对于辩方<u>与</u>检方都是至关重要的。

original: Tyrion: I can't believe the prosecutor is going into this much detail for her case.
translation: Tyrion: 真不敢相信检察官为了办案会这么考究细节。

original: Orym: Bah...[p/] It's a real headache.
translation: Orym: 切……[p/]只会让我头疼的家伙。

original: Orym: Did you know that this map is scaled?[p/] It's got a legend and everything.
translation: Orym: 你知道这地图是按比例绘制的吗？[p/]连图例之类的都有。

original: Wow...[p/] The prosecutor must be pretty particular.
translation: 哇哦.....[p/]检察官一定很挑剔。

original: Tyrion: This place has been without power for about a week.
translation: Tyrion: 这儿已经一周没动力了。

original: Tyrion: I wonder if there's any information I can infer from that...
translation: Tyrion: 我在想其中能不能推导出什么情报……

original: Orym: They've been using candles to keep the place lit.
translation: Orym: 他们一直用蜡烛来照明。

original: Orym: This is exactly why you can't rely on magic.
translation: Orym: 这正是不能依靠魔法的实例。

original: Tyrion: I wonder what "Lotus Juice" is...
translation: Tyrion: 这“莲之水”到底是……

original: Orym: It's definitely not any drink that [i]I've[/i] heard of.
translation: Orym: <u>我</u>从没听过叫这个名字的饮料。

original: Orym: It must be some kind of imported brand.
translation: Orym: 一定是某种进口品牌。

original: Tyrion: What do you think about [i]this[/i]?
translation: Tyrion: 你有什么看法？

original: Orym: Uh...[p/] I don't know what you're expecting me to say.
translation: Orym: 呃……[p/]我不知道你想要什么回答。

original: Orym: Not much to say about that.
translation: Orym: 我没什么能说的。

original: It'd be best to try something else.
translation: 最好问问别的。

original: You arrive back at the McCoy tavern.[p/] Luckily for you,[p/] the Inquisition set up a teleportation circle for you to use.
translation: 你回到了麦考伊的酒馆。[p/]幸运的是，[p/]裁判所设立了传送门供你使用。

original: With that circle,[p/] you could magically teleport between the capital and the crime scene instantaneously.
translation: 你可以通过它进行魔法传送，瞬时来往首都和犯罪现场。

original: …It’s definitely miles better than having to travel by carriage.
translation: ……这绝对比你坐马车要好太多了。

original: Orym: Oh…[p/] It’s you…
translation: Orym: 哦……[p/]是你……

original: Orym: What are you doing here?
translation: Orym: 你来干什么？

original: Commander White takes notice of you as you enter the tavern.
translation: 一进酒馆，怀特指挥官就看见了你。

original: It looks like he’s working with a team of knights to investigate the crime scene.
translation: 看起来他正和一队骑士调查犯罪现场。

original: Tyrion: I’m the defense attorney in this case.
translation: Tyrion: 我是此案的辩护律师。

original: Tyrion: I have just as much right to investigate this crime scene as you do.
translation: Tyrion: 我和你一样有权调查犯罪现场。

original: Orym: Yeah.[p/] Whatever…
translation: Orym: 行吧。[p/]随便你……

original: Orym: Just remember...[p/] I got my eye on you, kid.
translation: Orym: 总之你记住……[p/]我可一直盯着你呢，小子。

original: You think you’ve found everything that you can here.
translation: 应该已经找全了所有有用的线索了。

original: But what does it all mean?
translation: 但这些线索指向什么？

original: There’s no murder weapon to be found…
translation: 没有找到凶器……

original: And there’s no obvious evidence of another person at the scene…
translation: 也没有其他人在场的证据……

original: Orym: Hey…[p/] You okay?
translation: Orym: 喂……[p/]你没事吧？

original: Orym: You got quiet all of a sudden.
translation: Orym: 你突然就不出声了。

original: Alright…[p/] Just focus.
translation: 好了……[p/]集中注意力

original: Close your eyes,[p/] and let everything else disappear from the world.
translation: 闭上眼，[p/]忘记世界上其他所有东西。

original: Orym: Hey…[p/] You listening?
translation: Orym: 喂……[p/]你有听我说话吗？

original: Tyrion: So,[p/] there’s no clear evidence pointing to another killer.
translation: Tyrion: 虽然没有确凿证据指向另一个凶手。

original: Tyrion: There is,[p/] however,[p/] evidence pointing to how Flinhart moved before his death.
translation: Tyrion: 但是有证据指明弗林哈特死前怎么移动的。

original: Orym: What…?
translation: Orym: 说啥呢……？

original: Tyrion: There’s no blood trail leading to or from the body.
translation: Tyrion: 没有与尸体连接的血痕。

original: Tyrion: What does this imply about the location of Flinhart's death?
translation: Tyrion: 这能说明什么有关弗林哈特死亡位置的事？

original: You follow the Inquisition back to the city where Celeste is being detained.
translation: 你跟着裁判所的人回到了收容室所在的城里。

original: According to Ms. Tymora,[p/] Celeste was the prime suspect in Flinhart’s murder.
translation: 据泰摩拉女士所言，[p/]塞莱斯特是弗林哈特案的头号嫌疑人。

original: And due to the supposed nature of the crime,[p/] her case would be pushed to trial immediately.
translation: 由于案件的恶劣程度，[p/]她的案件将立即审理。

original: But many elements of the situation [i]still[/i] don't make sense.
translation: 但许多因素目前<u>仍</u>无法解释。

original: The Inquisition only investigates crimes committed using magic.
translation: 裁判所只负责调查涉及魔法的刑事案件。

original: So why is Celeste their prime suspect?
translation: 那为什么塞莱斯特会是首要嫌疑人？

original: ...Could [i]she[/i] be a mage?
translation: ……难不成<u>她</u>是一个法师？

original: Tyrion: This is ridiculous![p/][s/] She has a right to speak to an attorney!
translation: Tyrion: 离谱！[p/][s/]她有与律师沟通的权利！

original: ...Anyways,[p/] you find yourself met with another hurdle...[p/] a very [i]frustrating[/i] one.
translation: 一开始就遇到了个棘手的问题……

original: Knight: Yeah…[p/] Well, we can’t let you see her until she’s been processed.
translation: Knight: 呃……[p/]她办完手续之前谁都不能见。

original: Tyrion: Her trial is in an hour![p/][s/] How has she [i]not[/i] been processed yet?!
translation: Tyrion: 她的案子还有一个小时就开庭了！[p/][s/]你和我说她还有手续没办？！

original: Knight: I don’t know what to tell you, kid.[p/] I wish I could help.
translation: Knight: 我也不知道怎么跟你解释，小子。[p/]我也希望能帮你。

original: You don't need to use the Eye to know [i]that's[/i] a complete lie...
translation: 不用荷鲁斯之眼都知道他在说谎……

original: Ruby: So…[p/] you’re really planning on defending her.
translation: Ruby: 所以说…….[p/]你真的打算替她辩护。

original: Ruby: Do you know if she can even [i]afford[/i] a lawyer?
translation: Ruby: 在不知道她能不能<u>请得起</u>律师的前提下？

original: Tyrion: I…[p/] just can’t stand here and do [i]nothing[/i].
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]我就是没办法<u>束手旁观</u>。

original: Tyrion: You saw them, didn’t you?[p/][s/] There’s no way she would murder her father like that!
translation: Tyrion: 你也看到他们相处的样子了！[p/][s/]她不可能这样残忍杀害父亲！

original: Ruby: …
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: *sigh*[p/] I know that look...
translation: Ruby: *叹气*[p/]我知道这眼神……

original: Ruby: I [i]was[/i] saving this for a special occasion but...
translation: Ruby: 我<u>本想</u>在某个特殊场合给你的……

original: Tyrion: This is...!
translation: Tyrion: 这是……！

original: Tyrion: An attorney's runestone?!
translation: Tyrion: 律师符石？！

original: Ruby: If you're going to defend her,[p/] you're going to need one.
translation: Ruby: 既然你决意要为她辩护，[p/]那就需要它来表明律师身份。

original: Tyrion: I...
translation: Tyrion: 我……

original: You begin to tear up.[p/] You've wanted one of these ever since you were a child.
translation: 泪水夺眶而出，[p/]你自幼起就非常想要一块自己的律师符石。

original: It's basically a BADGE of honor for attorneys.
translation: 它就是律师的荣耀<size=1.5em>徽章</size>。

original: Ruby: ...Don't cry, Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: ……别哭，卡斯伯特。

original: Tyrion: S-[p/][s/]Sorry...
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉……

original: Ruby: Anyways,[p/] keep one thing in mind.
translation: Ruby: 总之，[p/]记住一点。

original: Ruby: If you try to defend her,[p/] the Inquisition [i]isn't[/i] going to fight you fairly.
translation: Ruby: 裁判所<u>不会</u>公正地与你较量。

original: Ruby: Our court system only exists to create the [i]illusion[/i] of justice.
translation: Ruby: 我国法庭系统的存在只是为了营造正义的<u>假象</u>。

original: Ruby: They hate people like us,[p/] and they’ll do everything in their power to sabotage you.
translation: Ruby: 他们痛恨我们这种人，[p/]因此他们会做一切力所能及的事来阻挠你。

original: Damn it…[p/] You knew that they’d try to get in your way.[p/] But you didn’t expect them to do it this blatantly.
translation: 可恶……[p/]虽然知道他们会捣乱，[p/]可没想到竟然如此堂而皇之。

original: Orym: Ugh…[p/] What’s with all this noise?
translation: Orym: 唉……[p/]怎么这么吵？

original: Tyrion: You...[p/] You’re that knight from the tavern.
translation: Tyrion: 你……[p/]你是酒馆的那个骑士。

original: Orym: That’s Commander Orym White to you, kid.
translation: Orym: 叫我奥蒙·怀特指挥官，小子。

original: Orym: Hmph…[p/] I had a feeling Tymora would be sniffing around this case.
translation: Orym: 嗯……[p/]我有预感泰摩拉会对这个案子感兴趣。

original: Orym: But I didn’t expect her to send a [i]kid[/i] to do her dirty work.
translation: Orym: 但我真没想到她会让一个<u>毛头小子</u>来干这脏活。

original: Knight: Commander,[p/] he says that he wants to talk to the mage.
translation: Knight: 指挥官，[p/]他说他想和法师聊聊。

original: Orym: And?[p/] She's got a right to an attorney, doesn't she?
translation: Orym: 怎么？[p/]她不是有权与律师沟通吗？

original: Knight: U-[p/]Uh…[p/] W-[p/]well, she hasn’t been processed…
translation: Knight: 呃、[p/]啊……[p/]可、[p/]可她还没办好手续……

original: Commander White looks confused for a moment.
translation: 怀特指挥官面带疑惑了一瞬。

original: Orym: The hell kind of bullshit are you trying to pull?!
translation: Orym: 你在这扯什么淡？！

original: Orym: Let him through, you idiot!
translation: Orym: 让他过去！你这个蠢货！

original: Knight: Y-[p/][s/]Yes, sir!
translation: Knight: 是、[p/][s/]是，长官！

original: The knight leads you through the halls of the dungeon.
translation: 骑士带你穿过地牢走廊。

original: For something built in the capital,[p/] it looks extremely old and decrepit.
translation: 相比于其他首都建筑，[p/]地牢看起来十分破旧。

original: Prisoners: ...
translation: Prisoners: ……

original: You pick up the negative emotions of the prisoners nearby.
translation: 你从附近的囚犯身上感受到一串负面情绪。

original: It’s a heavy and almost crushing feeling.
translation: 那是一种凝重惨痛的感觉。

original: You've always had to avoid crowded places because of how sensitive you are to people's thoughts.
translation: 由于荷鲁斯之眼能够侦测人们的情感，所以你一直尽可能避开人群。

original: You’ve never felt this much concentrated despair before.
translation: 你从未感受过如此强烈的绝望感。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: O-[p/][s/]Oh![p/][s/] It's you!
translation: Celeste: 哦、[p/][s/]哦！[p/][s/]是你！

original: Celeste is lying down on the cold floor of one of the dungeon cells.
translation: 塞莱斯特躺在冰冷的牢房地板上。

original: But she immediately gets up as soon as she sees you.
translation: 但她一看见你就立刻站了起来。

original: Celeste: What are you doing here?
translation: Celeste: 你来干嘛？

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora told me about what happened to your father…
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士告诉了我关于你父亲的事……

original: Tyrion: I’m…[p/] so sorry.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]深感抱歉。

original: Celeste: …
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: …I just don’t understand.[p/][s/] I don’t understand [i]any[/i] of this!
translation: Celeste: 我就是想不通。[p/][s/]<u>哪一件事</u>我都想不通！

original: Celeste: …Why would someone do this?!
translation: Celeste: ……为什么会有人做这样的事？！

original: Celeste: And why are they blaming [i]me[/i] for it?!
translation: Celeste: 他们还要认为是<u>我</u>做的？！

original: Tyrion: …I’m not sure about the details.
translation: Tyrion: ……我不清楚细节。

original: Tyrion: But it’s clear that there were elements of magic involved in what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 但很显然案件牵扯到魔法要素。

original: Tyrion: Since they arrested you based on that evidence,[p/] I can only conclude one thing.
translation: Tyrion: 既然他们依据案件牵扯到了魔法而逮捕了你，[p/]我可以确定一件事。

original: Tyrion: Celeste...[p/] You're a mage, aren't you?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……[p/]你是个法师，对吧？

original: Celeste: …!
translation: Celeste: ……！

original: Celeste: … [mind="There’s no sense in hiding it anymore."/]
translation: Celeste: …… [mind="已经没必要再隐瞒了。"/]

original: Celeste: Yes…[p/] I am.
translation: Celeste: 是的……[p/]我是。

original: Tyrion: ...Do you have noble blood?
translation: Tyrion: ……你继承了贵族血统？

original: Celeste: Of course, not![p/][s/] Why would you say that?!
translation: Celeste: 当然不是！[p/][s/]你怎么会这么想？！

original: Tyrion: S-[p/]Sorry…[p/] But the ability to use magic [i]is[/i] hereditary.
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/]抱歉……[p/]但施法能力一般来说<u>是</u>遗传所得。

original: Tyrion: Most mages tend to have [i]some[/i] kind of noble blood.
translation: Tyrion: 大多数法师都拥有<u>一些</u>贵族血统。

original: Celeste: …
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: I honestly don’t like thinking about that…
translation: Celeste: 说实话，我不愿去想……

original: Celeste: I’m the daughter of Jolene and Flinhart McCoy.
translation: Celeste: 我是朱莲尼·麦考伊与弗林哈特·麦考伊的女儿。

original: Celeste: That’s all I need to know about myself.
translation: Celeste: 我知道这些就好了。

original: ...It would probably be best not to push the matter further.
translation: ……或许应该换个话题。

original: Tyrion: Anyways...[p/] You were probably arrested [i]because[/i] you're a mage.
translation: Tyrion: 总之……[p/]你大概率是<u>由于</u>法师身份而被逮捕的。

original: Celeste: …What?
translation: Celeste: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: A crime was committed using magic.[p/] And you were the only mage around at the time.
translation: Tyrion: 现场犯罪涉及魔法，[p/]而你又刚好是唯一一个在场的法师。

original: Celeste: Is that seriously the only reason?!
translation: Celeste: 真的只是因为这个就逮捕我吗？！

original: Celeste: I only know how to cast one spell!
translation: Celeste: 我只知道一个法术！

original: Tyrion: The Arcane Inquisition doesn't care about the truth.[p/] They only care about closing their cases.
translation: Tyrion: 奥术裁判所不在乎真相。[p/]他们只在乎能否结案。

original: Celeste: … [mind="I can't believe this."]
translation: Celeste: …… [mind="真是难以置信。"]

original: Tyrion: Celeste,[p/] your case is being pushed to trial.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特，[p/]你的案件马上就要审理了。

original: Tyrion: You're going to be brought before a judge within the hour.
translation: Tyrion: 你一小时内就会站在法官面前。

original: Celeste: What?![p/][s/] No one told me anything!
translation: Celeste: 什么？！[p/][s/]他们什么都没告诉我！

original: Damn it...! [p/][s/]They weren’t even planning on [i]telling[/i] her?!
translation: 该死……！[p/][s/]他们甚至都没打算<u>告诉</u>她要庭审？

original: Tyrion: …
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: If you’ll have me,[p/] I’d like to be your defense counsel for the trial.
translation: Tyrion: 如果你愿意的话，[p/]我很乐意当你的辩护律师。

original: Celeste: Right...[p/] I [i]forgot[/i] that you were an attorney!
translation: Celeste: 哦对……[p/]我都<u>忘了</u>你是位律师！

original: Celeste: Would you really do that for me?
translation: Celeste: 你真的要为我辩护吗？

original: Tyrion: After everything I’ve seen them do…[p/] I can’t just stand by and do nothing.
translation: Tyrion: 看了他们的所作所为……[p/]我不能束手旁观。

original: Celeste: But they're a part of the kingdom.
translation: Celeste: 但他们是王国的一部分。

original: Celeste: ...Do we even have a chance? [mind="It's hopeless..."/]
translation: Celeste: ……我们有机会胜诉吗？ [mind="没希望的……"/]

original: Tyrion: Celeste...[p/][p/] Man,[p/] King,[p/] or God,[p/] I won't let them do anything to you.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特……[p/][p/]人、[p/]王、[p/]亦或是神，[p/]我都不会让它伤害你分毫。

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: ...S-[p/][s/]Sorry.[p/] It's just something I have a habit of saying...
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉。[p/]算是我的固定台词……

original: Celeste: No, don't apologize…
translation: Celeste: 不，不用道歉……

original: Celeste: I really appreciate you doing this.
translation: Celeste: 我真的很感激你愿意为我辩护。

original: It’s clear this entire situation is bittersweet for her.
translation: 很显然她的处境不容乐观。

original: And because of the Inquisition’s delays,[p/] You haven’t had any time to investigate the crime scene.
translation: 由于裁判所的刻意延迟，[p/]你甚至还没有调查犯罪现场。

original: You were confident before,[p/] but you begin to doubt whether or not you can really do this.
translation: 之前自信满满，[p/]但现在你开始怀疑自己到底能否成功。

original: Celeste: ... [mind="Everything is happening so fast... It feels unreal..."/]
translation: Celeste: …… [mind="这些事……感觉像是一场噩梦。"/]

original: ...No.[p/] You [i]have[/i] to do this.[p/] This is the [i]exact[/i] reason why you became a lawyer.
translation: 你必须做到，[p/]这是你决定踏上律师这条路的<u>初心</u>。

original: No matter what happens,[p/] you’ll acquit Celeste.
translation: 无论发生什么，[p/]你都要证明她的清白。

original: No...[p/] That's not right.
translation: 不对……[p/]再好好想想。

original: You have the evidence you need to disprove his claims.
translation: 你手里已经有了反驳他的证据。

original: OK
translation: OK

original: Garrick: I’ll tell you [i]exactly[/i] what I have to say, you commoner!
translation: Garrick: 我会把要说的话<u>原原本本</u>说明白，你这平民！

original: Garrick: [i]I’m[/i] not the one on trial, here!
translation: Garrick: 接受法庭审判的人<u>不是我</u>，听到没？！

original: Garrick: We’re here because that [i]bastard[/i] child didn’t know her place.
translation: Garrick: 我们来这儿是为了审判你那个不知自己斤两的<u>野种</u>。

original: Garrick: She’s just a peasant.[p/] Yet she [i]still[/i] learned the arcane arts.
translation: Garrick: 她只是个贱民。[p/]但她<u>还是</u>学习了奥术。

original: Garrick: And [i]look[/i] what happened!
translation: Garrick: <u>看看</u>这导致了什么！

original: Garrick: That girl used our holy arts to [i]murder[/i] her father in a fit of rage!
translation: Garrick: 她一怒之下用我们神圣的魔法<u>杀了</u>她父亲！

original: Tyrion: And how,[p/] pray tell,[p/] did you see “everything”?
translation: Tyrion: 哦？[p/] 是吗？[p/]请问你是怎么看到<u>一切</u>的？

original: Tyrion: If you recall,[p/] [i]you[/i] testified that you only took a single step inside the inn.
translation: Tyrion: 还记得你之前说过的话吗？[p/]<u>你</u>说你只踏进酒馆一步。

original: Tyrion: But you would have needed to be within 15ft to see my client with [b]Conjure Light[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 但你至少要在15英尺内，才能用[b]祈愿光芒[/b]看见我的委托人。

original: Garrick: This again?!
translation: Garrick: 又来这套？！

original: Garrick: If you’re going to keep treading on that one detail,[p/][s/] then I admit it![p/][s/] I stepped further into the inn!
translation: Garrick: 你要是一直揪着细节不放，[p/][s/]那我承认！[p/][s/]我当晚进了酒馆！

original: Garrick: I kept that detail out of my testimony!
translation: Garrick: 我在证词中没有提到这点！

original: Garrick: All because I [i]knew[/i] that you'd use it to cast suspicion on me!
translation: Garrick: 因为我<u>知道</u>你肯定要用这点让人怀疑我！

original: Judge: L-[p/][s/]Lord Pierce!
translation: Judge: 皮、[p/][s/]皮尔斯勋爵！

original: Tyrion: But you didn’t [i]just[/i] keep that detail from your testimony,[p/] did you?
translation: Tyrion: 但你<u>不仅仅是</u>没有提到吧？

original: Tyrion: You testified the opposite![p/][s/] That makes you guilty of committing perjury!
translation: Tyrion: 你反而作证说你没有进入酒馆！[p/][s/]你会因此犯下伪证罪！

original: Garrick: N-[p/][s/]No![p/] I-[p/]I mean…
translation: Garrick: 没、[p/][s/]没有！我、[p/]我是说……

original: Garrick: Agh…![p/][s/] You miserable wretch!
translation: Garrick: 呃啊……！[p/][s/]你这个该死的家伙！

original: No…[p/] That’s not right.
translation: 不对……[p/]再好好想想。

original: He claims to have witnessed the whole murder.
translation: 他声称目睹了整个犯罪过程。

original: But you’ve already proved that he didn’t in the last testimony.
translation: 但你已经在上个证言中证明了他没有。

original: All you have to do is show the evidence that proved him wrong.
translation: 只需要一个关键证据证明他的谬误……

original: Tyrion: And let’s not stop there.
translation: Tyrion: 让我们不要止步于此。

original: Tyrion: For your story to be true,[p/] you would have needed to be within 15ft of my client.
translation: Tyrion: 让我们假设你编造的故事成立，[p/]你必须在当时距离被告十五英尺以内。

original: Tyrion: According to your testimony,[p/] my client had just finished committing a murder.
translation: Tyrion: 根据你的证言，[p/]被告刚行凶完。

original: Tyrion: Wouldn’t she have noticed you?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么她没有注意到你呢？

original: Garrick: I-[p/]I…
translation: Garrick: 我、[p/]我……

original: Tyrion: If you were that close,[p/] then you would have surely been close enough to apprehend her.
translation: Tyrion: 如果你真的在那个距离内，[p/]你当时可以当场逮捕她的。

original: Tyrion: So why didn’t you?[p/] Don’t you have a duty to your citizens?
translation: Tyrion: 那你为什么没有？[p/]维护治安难道不是你的职责吗？

original: Garrick: Shut up![p/][s/] Shut your dirty peasant mouth!
translation: Garrick: 给我闭嘴！[p/][s/]闭上你那张贱民的脏嘴！

original: Garrick: That woman was armed![p/][s/] I had no reason to put my life in danger!
translation: Garrick: 那女人当时有武器！[p/][s/]我没理由冒这个险！

original: Garrick: I was terrified when I saw her holding that bloody sword!
translation: Garrick: 看见她拿着把滴血的剑早就把我吓坏了！

original: Garrick: My life was in danger!
translation: Garrick: 我当时有生命危险！

original: Tyrion: But that can’t be right. Can it, Lord Pierce?
translation: Tyrion: 但那又怎么可能呢？皮尔斯勋爵。

original: Tyrion: [i]This[/i] photo of the crime scene shows that the sword was left in the victim’s body.
translation: Tyrion: 犯罪现场的照片表明剑仍在死者身体里。

original: Tyrion: How could she still be wielding her sword if she left it there?
translation: Tyrion: 她怎么可能挥着剑呢？

original: Garrick: W-[p/][s/]What?![p/] I…
translation: Garrick: 什、[p/][s/]什么？![p/] 我……

original: Garrick: Agh![p/][s/] Damn you![p/][s/] DAMN YOU!
translation: Garrick: 啊！[p/][s/]你这混蛋！[p/][s/]<size=1.5em>你这混蛋！</size>

original: Garrick: Steelwind![p/] Why aren’t you saying anything?!
translation: Garrick: 斯蒂尔文德！[p/]你为什么只是看着？！

original: No…[p/] He claims that Celeste was holding her sword after the murder.
translation: 不对……[p/]他声称塞莱斯特在实施犯罪后拿着剑。

original: But with his proposed sequence of events,[p/] that shouldn’t be possible.
translation: 但根据他编造的事件顺序来说，[p/]这是不可能的事。

original: Is there a piece of evidence that proves Celeste couldn’t have been holding the sword?
translation: 有没有塞莱斯特不可能在那个时间点握着剑的证据？

original: Aria: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Aria: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Aria: U-[p/]Um…[p/] I…
translation: Aria: 呃、[p/]呃……[p/]我……

original: Prosecutor Steelwind has lost her usual air of confidence.[p/] You find it strange, though.
translation: 斯蒂尔文德检察官失去了她以往的自信，[p/]这倒是很新奇。

original: Even when you had the advantage,[p/] she always maintained her usual poise.
translation: 即便你有优势时，[p/]她也总能保持沉着冷静。

original: Judge: L-[p/]Lord Pierce.[p/][s/] Please pull yourself together!
translation: Judge: 皮、[p/]皮尔斯勋爵！[p/][s/]请你冷静！

original: Garrick: How can I remain calm when this charlatan is trying to frame me?!
translation: Garrick: 冷静？你要我怎么冷静？！这个骗子在胡说八道陷害我！

original: Garrick: This is a complete travesty of our justice system!
translation: Garrick: 这完全是对我们司法系统的嘲弄！

original: Garrick: And what do I get instead?![p/][s/] Slander from some [i]lowly[/i] defense attorney!
translation: Garrick: 大老远来我得到了什么？！[p/][s/]一个<u>低贱</u>律师的诽谤！

original: Tyrion: You talk about justice,[p/] but you’ve committed several acts of perjury to twist the outcome of this trial!
translation: Tyrion: 你张口正义闭口正义的，[p/]可你为了扭曲审判结果不惜作伪证！

original: Tyrion: You're [i]clearly[/i] not acting in good faith!
translation: Tyrion: 你<u>明显</u>不安好心！

original: Garrick: ...
translation: Garrick: ……

original: No...[p/] You know better than anyone that he only came here to cover up his crimes.
translation: 不对...[p/]你比谁都清楚他上法庭是来掩饰自己的罪行的

original: He didn't come here in good faith,[p/] and you found proof of that when you cross-examined him.
translation: 他绝对不安好心，[p/]而且你在先前的交叉询问中找到了证据。

original: Tyrion: You don’t care about justice![p/][s/] You just want to further your agenda!
translation: Tyrion: 你根本不在乎什么正义！[p/][s/]你只想达成你的计划！

original: Tyrion: So admit it, Pierce![p/][s/] You created a makeshift sword using [b]Shape Liquid[/b] and you used it to impale Flinhart!
translation: Tyrion: 认罪吧，皮尔斯！[p/][s/]你用[b]形变液体[/b]做了把临时的剑，并用它刺杀了弗林哈特！

original: Tyrion: You shoved my client’s sword into the wound,[p/] while the remnants of the [i]real[/i] murder weapon evaporated!
translation: Tyrion: 你把被告的剑插入伤口，[p/]而<u>真正的</u>凶器已经蒸发！

original: Tyrion: It was a perfect crime, wasn’t it?!
translation: Tyrion: 真是场完美犯罪！

original: Garrick: I-[p/][s/]I…
translation: Garrick: 我、[p/][s/]我……

original: Garrick: …
translation: Garrick: ……

original: Garrick: …
translation: Garrick: ……

original: Garrick: Haha…
translation: Garrick: 哈哈……

original: Tyrion: …What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Garrick: HAHAHAHAHAHA!
translation: Garrick: 啊哈哈哈哈哈哈！

original: Judge: Lord Pierce…?!
translation: Judge: 皮尔斯勋爵……？！

original: Garrick: My apologies, Your Honor.
translation: Garrick: 失礼了，法官阁下。

original: Garrick: It’s just that I realized something [i]absolutely[/i] hilarious!
translation: Garrick: 我刚意识到一些<u>非常</u>幽默的事。

original: What…?[p/] Has he finally lost his mind?
translation: 什么……？[p/]他最终还是疯了？

original: Garrick: The defense put forward an interesting theory.
translation: Garrick: 辩方提出了一个很有趣的理论。

original: Garrick: But…[p/] there’s [i]one[/i] problem with it.
translation: Garrick: 但……[p/]有<u>一个</u>问题。

original: Tyrion: And what’s that?
translation: Tyrion: 是什么呢？

original: Garrick: I think you said it yourself.
translation: Garrick: 你自己也说了。

original: Tyrion: You shoved Celeste’s sword into the wound,[p/] while the remnants of the real murder weapon evaporated!
translation: Tyrion: 你把被告的剑插入伤口，[p/]而<u>真正的</u>凶器已经蒸发！

original: Tyrion: It was a perfect crime, wasn’t it?!
translation: Tyrion: 真是场完美犯罪！

original: Garrick: You see…[p/] It [i]would[/i] have been a perfect crime.
translation: Garrick: 你看……[p/]那<u>本来</u>就是完美犯罪。

original: Garrick: Because any evidence to [i]support[/i] that theory would’ve evaporated with that frozen blade!
translation: Garrick: 任何支持这一理论的证据都会随着那把冰冻剑刃的蒸发而消散！

original: Aria: What?!
translation: Aria: 什么？！

original: Tyrion: No!
translation: Tyrion: 不！

original: He’s right![p/][s/] If he used an ice blade to kill Flinhart,[p/][s/] it would have evaporated by now!
translation: 他说得没错！[p/][s/]如果他用一把冰刃杀害了弗林哈特，[p/][s/]那真正的凶器早就蒸发了！

original: Tyrion: Then that means…
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说……

original: Garrick: There would be [i]nothing[/i] left of the murder weapon!
translation: Garrick: 你根本<u>无法</u>找到真正的凶器！

original: Garrick: You’ve spun quite the tale here today.
translation: Garrick: 你今天在这编了个很有趣的故事。

original: Garrick: But in the end,[p/] you don’t have a shred of evidence to support it, do you?
translation: Garrick: 但最后的最后，[p/]你还是一点证据都没有，不是吗？

original: Garrick: You have [i]NOTHING[/i] on me!
translation: Garrick: 没有<size=1.5em><u>任何证据</u></size>证明我有罪！

original: Celeste: I-[p/][s/]Isn’t there anything we can do?!
translation: Celeste: 我、[p/][s/]我们真的没有办法了吗？！

original: You become quiet.
translation: 你安静了下来。

original: Celeste: Tyrion?! [mind="Why isn’t he saying anything?! Is it really hopeless…?"/]
translation: Celeste: 提利昂？！ [mind="他为什么一言不发？！难道真的没有希望了……？"/]

original: But all it takes is one look at the expression on your face.
translation: 但她只需要看一眼你的表情。

original: Celeste: …!
translation: Celeste: ……！

original: Celeste: …
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Any worries she had instantly disappear.
translation: 她顿时充满了信心。

original: Because she realizes…[p/] The expression on your face…
translation: 因为她意识到……[p/]你脸上的神情……

original: It’s the same expression you made every time you defeated her.
translation: 你每次下棋击败她的表情一模一样。

original: Garrick: W-[p/]what is this…?
translation: Garrick: 什、[p/]什么意思……？

original: Garrick: You can glare at me all you want.
translation: Garrick: 你再怎么瞪我都无所谓。

original: Garrick: It won’t change the fact that you’ve lost.
translation: Garrick: 你的败北是不争的事实。

original: Tyrion: ...I despise people like you.
translation: Tyrion: ……我鄙视你这样的人。

original: Garrick: …!
translation: Garrick: ……！

original: Tyrion: You twist the system to serve your own ends…
translation: Tyrion: 你扭曲司法，只为了达到自己的目的……

original: Tyrion: You trample on the lives of innocent people.
translation: Tyrion: 你践踏无辜人民的性命。

original: Tyrion: But as long as I’m here…[p/][s/] I will [i]never[/i] let that happen again!
translation: Tyrion: 但只要我还站在这里……[p/][s/]我就<u>不会</u>让这种事再度发生！

original: Tyrion: Ugh…[p/] What did I just do…?
translation: Tyrion: 呃啊……[p/]我干了什么……？

original: Your head feels like it’s about to burst.[p/] The pain is unbearable and overwhelming.
translation: 你头痛欲裂。[p/]痛得你几乎难以承受。

original: But at the same time…[p/] you feel an extreme sense of clarity.
translation: 但与此同时……[p/]你有种极度清澈的感觉。

original: As if you can see more than you could before.
translation: 仿佛你能看到以往看不到的东西。

original: Garrick: ... [mind="I can’t believe that peasant pushed me this far…"/]
translation: Garrick: …… [mind="没想到这个平民竟然把我逼到这种地步……"/]

original: Once again,[p/] you see Pierce's thoughts through the Eye of Horus.
translation: 又一次，[p/]你通过荷鲁斯之眼看到了皮尔斯的想法。

original: But this sensation feels different from how it usually is.[p/] It’s more intense and potent this time.
translation: 但这种感觉和平常不一样，[p/]这次更加强烈有力。

original: It’s almost as if you can do more than just read his surface-level thoughts…
translation: 仿佛你不仅仅能读懂他表面上的想法……

original: Garrick: Perhaps I should have used [i]this[/i] spell to create the blade…
translation: Garrick: 也许我应该用<u>这个</u>法术来创造剑刃的……

original: Garrick: No…[p/] It was far safer to use that bottle he was holding…
translation: Garrick: 不对……[p/]当时用他手里握着的水瓶安全得多……

original: Garrick: Conjuring my own water would have left evidence behind.
translation: Garrick: 形变我自身携带的水必然会留下证据。

original: Garrick: Hmph…[p/] What a crass and basic spell.
translation: Garrick: 哼……[p/]一个粗糙又基础的法术。

original: Garrick: It’s no wonder that it’s the only spell that bastard knows.
translation: Garrick: 难怪那个畜生只会用这一种法术。

original: This doesn’t give you anything that you can use…
translation: 这些没什么有用的……

original: You should try something else.
translation: 应该试试别的。

original: Garrick: Ugh…[p/] What kind of fool installs artificery only to leave it in disrepair?
translation: Garrick: 呃啊……[p/]到底是什么样的蠢货才会装了奥术能源却放着不管？

original: Garrick: I would have never had to cast [b]Conjure Light[/b] if those lights were functional.
translation: Garrick: 但凡有一盏灯是好用的，我都不需要用[b]祈愿光芒[/b]来照明。

original: This doesn’t tell you anything that you didn’t already know…
translation: 没有什么新内容……

original: But PROJECTING evidence relating to the murder is definitely the key to finding what you need.
translation: 但<size=1.5em>投射</size>谋杀相关证据，一定是达成你目标的关键。

original: You should try something else.
translation: 应该试试别的。

original: Garrick: If only I could have used [b]Frost Wave[/b],[p/] things would have been much cleaner.
translation: Garrick: 要是我能用[b]霜波[/b]的话，[p/]事情就简单多了。

original: Garrick: But using such an obvious spell would be akin to admitting that [i]I’d[/i] done it.
translation: Garrick: 但用这种法术简直几乎就是在告诉别人<u>我</u>是凶手。

original: That makes sense.
translation: 有道理。

original: There wasn’t any ice at the crime scene.
translation: 犯罪现场没有任何冰。

original: You doubt that he used [b]Frost Wave[/b] during the murder.
translation: 他应该没有在谋杀过程中使用过[b]霜波[/b]。

original: You should try something else.
translation: 应该试试别的。

original: Garrick: After all the trouble I went to,[p/] I can’t believe that lawyer figured out the spell I used.
translation: Garrick: 经历过这么多了，[p/]没想到会被一个律师推理出我用的法术。

original: Garrick: Well…[p/] no matter.[p/] It’s not as if there’s any evidence to prove that I used it.
translation: Garrick: 无所谓。[p/]反正也没有什么证据证明我用过。

original: Garrick: I’m lucky that old fool had that bottle of water with him.
translation: Garrick: 还好那个老家伙拿着瓶水。

original: Garrick: What an ornate sword…
translation: Garrick: 真是把华丽的剑……

original: Garrick: I wonder how a commoner like her obtained such a thing.
translation: Garrick: 像她一样的普通人是怎么得到这种东西的？

original: Garrick: …I wonder if the Inquisition will let me have it once the girl is convicted.
translation: Garrick: ……不知道在她被判刑后，裁判所能不能把它转让给我。

original: This doesn’t give you anything that you can use…
translation: 这些没什么有用的……

original: You should try something else.
translation: 应该试试别的。

original: Garrick: …
translation: Garrick: ……

original: Garrick: Even now,[p/] that image is still lingering in my mind…
translation: Garrick: 直到现在，[p/]那些情景仍然历历在目……

original: Garrick: I didn’t expect this experience to have such an effect on me.
translation: Garrick: 没想到这些经历会对我有这么大的影响。

original: This doesn’t give you anything that you can use…
translation: 这些没什么有用的……

original: You should try something else.
translation: 应该试试别的。

original: Garrick: Hmph…[p/] She only knows [i]one[/i] spell?
translation: Garrick: 嗯……[p/]她只会<u>一种</u>法术？

original: Garrick: Of course she would.
translation: Garrick: 她当然只会一种。

original: Garrick: It’s not as if any of the academies would admit someone like her.
translation: Garrick: 也不会有哪个学院愿意接收她这种人。

original: This doesn’t give you anything that you can use…
translation: 这些没什么有用的……

original: You should try something else.
translation: 应该试试别的。

original: Garrick: I really have an affinity for water magic, don’t I?
translation: Garrick: 我真是天生就适合与水相关的魔法。

original: Garrick: I should really learn some new spell formulas.
translation: Garrick: 我真该多学几种法术。

original: Garrick: Maybe a visit to the academy is in order.
translation: Garrick: 或许该回学校看看。

original: This doesn’t give you anything that you can use…
translation: 这些没什么有用的……

original: You should try something else.
translation: 应该试试别的。

original: Garrick: I can’t believe Flinhart,[p/] of all people,[p/] ended up taking in a noble bastard.
translation: Garrick: 我真没想到世界上这么多人，[p/]弗林哈特刚好就收养了一个贵族野种。

original: Garrick: But from what I hear,[p/] even [i]he[/i] didn’t know what she was.
translation: Garrick: 不过据我所知，[p/]即使是<u>他</u>也不知道她的身世。

original: Garrick: …Hmph.[p/] It serves her right.
translation: Garrick: ……哼。[p/]正适合她。

original: This doesn’t give you anything that you can use…
translation: 这些没什么有用的……

original: You should try something else.
translation: 应该试试别的。

original: Garrick: Flinhart…[p/] How did it come to this?
translation: Garrick: 弗林哈特……[p/]为什么会这样？

original: Garrick: No…[p/] [i]He[/i] was the one who chose to spread dissidence against the Crown.
translation: Garrick: 不……[p/]是<u>他</u>选择要与皇家作对散播异见。

original: Garrick: He should have known what would happen.
translation: Garrick: 他从最开始就该明白这种后果。

original: Garrick: If it wasn’t me,[p/] it would've been someone else.
translation: Garrick: 就算不是我来动手，[p/]其他人迟早也会……

original: This doesn’t give you anything that you can use…
translation: 这些没什么有用的……

original: You should try something else.
translation: 应该试试别的。

original: Garrick: …I wonder how Jolie is handling all of this.
translation: Garrick: ……在这之后朱莲尼会怎么做呢。

original: Garrick: ...What?![p/][s/] Why am I thinking of her [i]now[/i], of all times?!
translation: Garrick: 什么？！[p/][s/]为什么我<u>现在</u>会想起她？！

original: Garrick: That [i]peasant[/i] is of no importance to me!
translation: Garrick: 那个<u>贱民</u>对我来说毫无价值！

original: This doesn’t give you anything that you can use…
translation: 这些没什么有用的……

original: You should try something else.
translation: 应该试试别的。

original: Garrick: This lawyer is the protégé of the infamous Ruby Tymora.
translation: Garrick: 那个律师是臭名昭著的鲁比·泰摩拉的徒弟。

original: Garrick: I suppose I should have expected as much.
translation: Garrick: 我也该预料到这些的。

original: Garrick: But I never expected him to get this far.
translation: Garrick: 但我真没想到他能走到这一步。

original: Garrick: I’ll need to be more wary of them in the future.
translation: Garrick: 以后要多注意他们。

original: This doesn’t give you anything that you can use…
translation: 这些没什么有用的……

original: You should try something else.
translation: 应该试试别的。

original: Garrick: …?
translation: Garrick: ……？

original: Garrick: Why am I thinking of such a thing?
translation: Garrick: 我为什么在想这些？

original: Hm… That piece of evidence didn’t evoke any useful thoughts from him.
translation: 唔……[p/]那份证据没能让他产生什么有用的想法。

original: Maybe you’ll see something if you PROJECT pieces of evidence related to the murder.
translation: 或许应该<size=1.5em>投射</size>一些与谋杀有关的证据。

original: Water from a bottle…?
translation: 一瓶水……？

original: Wait…[p/][s/] A bottle?!
translation: 等下……[p/][s/]一瓶水？！

original: Garrick: Well, then…
translation: Garrick: 那么……

original: Garrick: As [i]riveting[/i] as this has been,[p/] I believe it’s time for me to take my leave.
translation: Garrick: 虽然今天的一切都很富有<u>戏剧性</u>，[p/]但时间不等人，我该走了。

original: Tyrion: Now wait a minute, Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 等下，皮尔斯。

original: Garrick: ...What is it now, you wretch?
translation: Garrick: ……又怎么了？你这个烦人精。

original: Garrick: I’ll say it as many times as you need to hear.
translation: Garrick: 你要我说多少遍才懂？

original: No…[p/] That’s not right.
translation: 不对……[p/]再好好想想。

original: He said that he “used a bottle” to commit the murder.
translation: 他说他“用了一瓶水”来作案。

original: If your hunch is correct,[p/] then that bottle should be all the evidence you need.
translation: 如果你的直觉没错，[p/]这个瓶子将是你破局的关键。

original: Tyrion: You’re right, Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 你说得对，皮尔斯。

original: Tyrion: If you did use [b]Shape Liquid[/b] on a body of water,[p/] the murder weapon would have evaporated entirely.
translation: Tyrion: 如果你真的对水使用了[b]形变液体[/b]，[p/]那凶器早就彻底蒸发了。

original: Garrick: Ah,[p/] it seems you’ve finally gotten that fact through your thick head.
translation: Garrick: 啊，[p/]看来你的猪脑袋终于弄明白了这个事实。

original: Garrick: Bravo.
translation: Garrick: 可喜可贺。

original: Tyrion: But let’s not get ahead of ourselves, Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 你先别着急，皮尔斯。

original: Tyrion: What if you [i]didn’t[/i] use [b]Shape Liquid[/b] on a body of water?
translation: Tyrion: 要是你施加[b]形变液体[/b]的对象<u>不是</u>水怎么办呢？

original: Tyrion: What if it was another type of liquid?
translation: Tyrion: 如果是另一种液体的话呢？

original: Garrick: ...What are you going on about?
translation: Garrick: ……你在卖什么关子？

original: Tyrion: Pierce,[p/] [b]Shape Liquid[/b] doesn’t just work on water.
translation: Tyrion: 皮尔斯，[p/][b]形变液体[/b]不仅仅作用于水。

original: Tyrion: It works on [i]all[/i] kinds of liquids.
translation: Tyrion: 它作用于<u>所有</u>液体。

original: Tyrion: This shattered bottle contained the liquid that you cast your spell on, didn't it?
translation: Tyrion: 这破碎的玻璃瓶里曾装着被你施法的液体，对不对？

original: You show him the picture of the Shattered Bottle of Lotus Juice.
translation: 你向他展示了已经摔成碎片的莲之水饮料瓶的照片。

original: Garrick: That bottle…
translation: Garrick: 那个瓶子……

original: Tyrion: Pierce,[p/] I found this shattered bottle on the ground near the victim's body.
translation: Tyrion: 皮尔斯，[p/]我在受害者的尸体旁找到了这个碎掉的瓶子。

original: Tyrion: …I [i]wonder[/i] what caused it to shatter.
translation: Tyrion: ……我很<u>好奇</u>它是被什么弄碎的。

original: Garrick: …!
translation: Garrick: ……！

original: Tyrion: You must have decided to use any liquid you could find.
translation: Tyrion: 你当时一定决心利用任何能找到的液体。

original: Tyrion: Luckily for you,[p/] the victim was holding the perfect quantity of liquid in his hands.
translation: Tyrion: 你很幸运，[p/]受害者手里正握着量刚刚好的液体。

original: Tyrion: I wonder…[p/] Lord Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 你看……[p/]皮尔斯勋爵。

original: Tyrion: If we had someone analyze the broken pieces of this bottle…
translation: Tyrion: 要是我们派人分析这些瓶子碎片……

original: Tyrion: ...would we find traces of [b]transmutation[/b] magic?!
translation: Tyrion: ……会不会找到[b]形变术[/b]的痕迹呢？！

original: Garrick: You little-!
translation: Garrick: 你这个——！

original: Garrick: T-[p/][s/]That still proves nothing!
translation: Garrick: 这、[p/][s/]这还是证明不了什么！

original: Garrick: So, [i]what[/i] if there are traces of magic on the shattered bottle?
translation: Garrick: 所以，就算瓶子碎片上有魔法痕迹<u>又怎么样</u>？

original: Garrick: You still don’t have a murder weapon!
translation: Garrick: 你还是没有找到凶器！

original: Tyrion: I wasn’t finished, Pierce.
translation: Tyrion: 我没说完呢，皮尔斯。

original: Garrick: What?!
translation: Garrick: 什么？！

original: Tyrion: You see,[p/] the liquid contained in this bottle wasn’t water.
translation: Tyrion: 这瓶里原本装的并不是水。

original: Tyrion: It was soda!
translation: Tyrion: 是一整瓶汽水！

original: Garrick: So?![p/][s/] What difference does [i]that[/i] make?!
translation: Garrick: 所以？！[p/][s/]<u>这</u>能有什么影响？！

original: Tyrion: A blade of ice made out of water would have evaporated entirely…
translation: Tyrion: 水做的冰剑也许能蒸发干净……

original: Tyrion: But a blade of ice made out of [i]soda[/i] would leave a puddle of dried residue!
translation: Tyrion: 但<u>汽水</u>制成的冰蒸发后会留下一滩残留物！

original: Garrick: No…[p/] It can’t be…
translation: Garrick: 不……[p/]不可能……

original: Tyrion: I’d wondered why there was such a circular trace of magic under the body…
translation: Tyrion: 我开始就在想，[p/]为什么尸体下会有这么一个圆形的魔法痕迹……

original: Tyrion: If we checked the outline of that trace,[p/][s/] I’d bet we’d find a dried puddle of soda residue!
translation: Tyrion: 如果我们检查一下痕迹的轮廓，[p/][s/]肯定能找到汽水的残留物！

original: Tyrion: That would [i]prove[/i] that you used your magic on that soda!
translation: Tyrion: 这就能<u>证明</u>你对汽水用了魔法！

original: Tyrion: There’s your murder weapon, Pierce!
translation: Tyrion: 皮尔斯，这就是你要的凶器！

original: Tyrion: ...And that's Checkmate.
translation: Tyrion: ……将军。

original: Aria: ...Bailiff![p/][s/] Tell Orym to analyze the crime scene at once!
translation: Aria: ……法警！[p/][s/]通知奥蒙立刻去检验现场！

original: Aria: We must determine if this “puddle of soda residue” exists!
translation: Aria: 我们必须验证“汽水的残留物”是否存在！

original: Aria: The time window to find traces of magic is closing!
translation: Aria: 魔法痕迹的残留时间已经不多了！

original: Orym: So…[p/] We had our team search the crime scene for that soda puddle.
translation: Orym: 所以……[p/]我们的人为了找这滩汽水检查了犯罪现场。

original: Orym: I really [i]can’t[/i] believe it…[p/] But we found it.
translation: Orym: 真是<u>难以置信</u>……[p/]但我们确实找到了。

original: Orym: In fact,[p/] the outline of the dried soda lines up exactly with the outline of the trace of [b]transmutation[/b] magic.
translation: Orym: 事实上，[p/]汽水留下的痕迹与[b]形变术[/b]的痕迹完美吻合。

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Orym: We checked the broken bottle, too.
translation: Orym: 我们也检查了那个碎掉的瓶子。

original: Orym: There were traces of [b]transmutation[/b] magic on it as well.
translation: Orym: 上面也有[b]形变术[/b]的痕迹。

original: Orym: There’s no doubt about it. [i]Someone[/i] used magic on that soda.
translation: Orym: 毫无疑问。<u>某人</u>对汽水用了魔法。

original: Aria: I see...
translation: Aria: 我明白了……

original: Aria: Thank you, Orym.[p/] Please escort Lord Pierce back to the stand.
translation: Aria: 谢谢你，奥蒙。[p/]请送皮尔斯勋爵回到证人席。

original: Garrick: …
translation: Garrick: ……

original: Tyrion: What do you have to say for yourself, Pierce?
translation: Tyrion: 你还有什么要说的吗，皮尔斯？

original: Garrick: ...Hmph.
translation: Garrick: ……哼。

original: Garrick: What do you think you’ve accomplished here today?
translation: Garrick: 你觉得自己今天做到了什么？

original: Garrick: Do you honestly think you can indict [i]me[/i]?
translation: Garrick: 你真觉得你能起诉<u>我</u>？

original: Garrick: I’m an aristocrat from the highest echelons of our society.
translation: Garrick: 我是来自于社会最顶层的贵族。

original: Garrick: That fool of a man was an insurgent.
translation: Garrick: 那个老蠢货是个叛乱分子。

original: Garrick: He was a threat to society,[p/] and [i]I[/i] did my civic duty by removing him.
translation: Garrick: 他对社会安定有重大威胁，[p/]<u>我</u>只是尽自己的义务而已。

original: Aria: …
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: Bailiff.[p/] Please escort the witness to a holding cell.
translation: Aria: 法警，[p/]请押送证人到拘留所。

original: Garrick: S-[p/][s/]Steelwind…?
translation: Garrick: 斯、[p/][s/]斯蒂尔文德……？

original: Aria: First-degree murder is punishable by execution, Lord Pierce.
translation: Aria: 一级谋杀会被处以死刑，皮尔斯勋爵。

original: Aria: I suggest you remain silent.[p/] Lest you incriminate yourself further.
translation: Aria: 我建议你保持沉默，[p/]以免进一步自证其罪。

original: Garrick: W-[p/][s/]What?![p/] You…[p/][s/] can’t be serious!
translation: Garrick: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！[p/]你……[p/][s/]你认真的？！

original: Aria: Shut your [i]insidious[/i] mouth!
translation: Aria: 闭上你那<u>歹毒</u>的嘴！

original: Garrick: …!
translation: Garrick: ……！

original: Aria: Well…?[p/] What are you all waiting for?
translation: Aria: 那么……？[p/]你们还在等什么？

original: Aria: Take him away.
translation: Aria: 把他带走。

original: Judge: Y-[p/]yes...![p/][s/] Take him away at once!
translation: Judge: 没、[p/]没错……[p/][s/]！立刻把他带走！

original: Celeste: I can’t believe it…[p/][s/] We actually won!
translation: Celeste: 难以置信……[p/][s/]我们真的胜诉了！

original: Celeste: T-[p/][s/]Tyrion…[p/][s/] I…
translation: Celeste: 提、[p/][s/]提利昂……[p/][s/]我……

original: It’s all she can do to hold back her tears.
translation: 她竭尽全力忍住眼泪。

original: Tyrion: You don't need to say anything.[p/] Your face says it all.
translation: Tyrion: 你什么都不用说。[p/]我看你的表情就能明白。

original: Celeste: Thank you…
translation: Celeste: 谢谢你……

original: Ruby: You’ve more than exceeded my expectations today.
translation: Ruby: 你今天的表现远超我的期待。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora!
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士！

original: Ruby: I’ll be honest.
translation: Ruby: 说实话。

original: Ruby: When I realized that the murder weapon evaporated,[p/] I thought that the case was shot.
translation: Ruby: 意识到凶器蒸发之后，[p/]我以为审理会就这样结束。

original: Ruby: I can’t believe you were able to turn that around.
translation: Ruby: 真没想到你能逆转局势。

original: Tyrion: It was just luck…
translation: Tyrion: 只是我运气好……

original: Tyrion: If he [i]had[/i] used water,[p/] we would have been done for…
translation: Tyrion: 要是他用的是水，[p/]我们早就完蛋了……

original: Ruby: It had nothing to do with luck.
translation: Ruby: 与运气无关。

original: Ruby: You were able to deduce which liquid he used.
translation: Ruby: 你能够推断出他用了哪种液体。

original: Ruby: And you did it just by looking at a few shards of broken glass.
translation: Ruby: 靠的还是看了一眼玻璃碎片。

original: Ruby: Your skills of deduction never cease to amaze me.
translation: Ruby: 你的推理能力总能令我惊异。

original: That's not [i]exactly[/i] true...
translation: 其实<u>不全是</u>这样……

original: But with Celeste there,[p/] you can’t tell her about your new ability.
translation: 但塞莱斯特在场，[p/]你还不能告诉她自己的新能力。

original: Aria: You all are quite lively.
translation: Aria: 你们看起来精神不错。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Aria: There’s no need for such hostility.
translation: Aria: 没必要敌意这么大。

original: Aria: Though,[p/] I wouldn’t expect any less from the hound of the Eyetaker.
translation: Aria: 不过我本就没有对“夺眼者”的狗抱什么期待。

original: Ruby: …!
translation: Ruby: ……！

original: Wait…[p/] What did she mean by that...?
translation: 等下……[p/]她这话什么意思……？

original: You glance at Ms. Tymora.[p/] But when she meets your gaze,[p/] she immediately looks away.
translation: 你看了眼泰摩拉女士。[p/]但你们的视线一交汇，[p/]她便移开了目光。

original: She looks like she’s…[p/] focusing.
translation: 她看起来像是在……[p/]集中。

original: …Almost as if to protect herself from a certain Eye.
translation: ……仿佛是在从某种“眼”中保护自己……

original: Aria: I must admit.[p/] I was hoping to test my blade against you directly.
translation: Aria: 不得不承认。[p/]我本想和你直接硬碰硬的。

original: Aria: However,[p/] your protégé proved to be a worthy adversary.
translation: Aria: 不过，[p/]你的徒弟证明他也是位称职的对手。

original: Tyrion: Um…[p/] Thank you?
translation: Tyrion: 呃……[p/]谢谢你？

original: Ruby: Is this some kind of game to you?
translation: Ruby: 对你来说这是某种游戏吗？

original: Ruby: You talk about trials as if they’re some kind of competition.
translation: Ruby: 你把这些庭审说得像比赛一样。

original: Ruby: Your action almost condemned an innocent woman to death.
translation: Ruby: 你的行为差点让一位无辜女性被判死刑。

original: Aria: Our system operates by having two powers of opposition.
translation: Aria: 我们的司法体系是通过两种对立的力量来运作的。

original: Aria: When those powers are balanced,[p/] justice prevails.
translation: Aria: 当二者平衡，[p/]正义便会存在。

original: Aria: Make no mistake. [p/]Your victory today was just our system working as intended.
translation: Aria: 别误会。[p/]你今天胜诉只是因为我们的司法体系在正常运作。

original: Ruby: Ha![p/][s/] “Working as intended”!
translation: Ruby: 哈！[p/][s/]“正常运作”！

original: Ruby: You know very well our system only exists to protect your people.
translation: Ruby: 你很清楚，[p/]我们的司法体系只是为了保护像你一样的贵族。

original: Aria: …I know.
translation: Aria: ……我知道。

original: ...What?
translation: ……什么？

original: Aria: …In any case,[p/] it looks like we’ll be facing each other more frequently in the future.
translation: Aria: ……无论如何，[p/]看来我们今后会经常碰面。

original: Aria: I look forward to doing battle with you again, Tyrion Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 我很期待下次在法庭上与你见面，提利昂·卡斯伯特。

original: What a strange girl.
translation: 好怪的女孩。

original: Celeste: *sighs*[p/] Well, that kind of killed the mood, didn’t it?
translation: Celeste: *叹气* [p/]这下气氛没了，是不是？

original: Ruby: Not at all.[p/] I think we should celebrate.
translation: Ruby: 我不觉得。[p/]我们应该找个地方庆祝一下。

original: Celeste: Oh?[p/] What did you have in mind?
translation: Celeste: 哦？[p/]你有推荐的吗？
