original: Ruby: There’s this amazing restaurant in the upper quarter of the capital city.
translation: Ruby: 首都的上城区有个很棒的餐馆。

original: Ruby: They usually only serve nobles,[p/] but they let anyone in if they have enough gold.
translation: Ruby: 虽然他们通常只招待贵族，[p/]但你知道的，有钱能使鬼推磨。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] Do [i]we[/i] have enough gold?
translation: Tyrion: 等下……[p/]我们钱够吗？

original: Ruby: Of course, we do.
translation: Ruby: 当然够。

original: Ruby: Don’t worry about the details.
translation: Ruby: 不用在意细节。

original: Ruby: I’ll handle everything.
translation: Ruby: 我会处理一切

original: Wait…[p/][s/] Just how much money does Ms. Tymora make?!
translation: 等等……[p/][s/]她到底赚了多少？！

original: Tyrion: And so began my journey into the world of law and magic.
translation: Tyrion: 就这样，我在法律与魔法的世界里踏上旅程。

original: Tyrion: Our justice system is rotten to its core,[p/] and I’ll have many trials ahead...
translation: Tyrion: 司法体系的腐败已经渗透到核心了，[p/]未来会有很多案件等待着我……

original: Tyrion: Regardless,[p/] I’ll keep fighting on and get justice for every one of my clients.
translation: Tyrion: 无论如何，[p/]我会拼尽全力为我的每一个委托人讨回公道。

original: Eris: This…[p/][s/] This feeling![p/][s/] I knew it!
translation: Eris: 这……[p/][s/]这种感觉！[p/][s/]我就知道！

original: Eris: His radiant soul has finally awakened!
translation: Eris: 他那耀眼的灵魂终于觉醒了！

original: Eris: I can't believe it... [p/][s/]I’ve been waiting for so long!
translation: Eris: 不敢相信……[p/][s/]我真是等了好久！

original: Eris: I can’t wait for the day…[p/] when I can see his eyes draped in agony.
translation: Eris: 我已经等不及看到……[p/]他因痛苦垂下双眼的模样了。

original: 让我们说中文！The fields of battle are filled with suffering and despair.
translation: 战场上充斥着痛苦与绝望。

original: On them,[p/] are a clash of souls.[p/] Souls brought to conflict by the corrupt powers that rule over them.
translation: 硝烟之下，[p/]是被腐败势力统治的灵魂们。[p/]这些灵魂间正在激烈冲突。

original: Rhys: I was transporting a client in my carriage that evening.
translation: Rhys: 那晚，我正载着一位客人。

original: Rhys: We were driving by the McCoy Tavern when we heard a disturbance.
translation: Rhys: 我们路过麦考伊的酒馆时，[p/]听到了一些吵闹声。

original: Rhys: I was worried that something was amiss.[p/] So I walked into the building to see what the commotion was.
translation: Rhys: 我当时有些担心出了什么事。[p/]所以我走进了酒馆一探究竟。

original: Rhys: There I saw the defendant.
translation: Rhys: 就在那时我看见了被告。

original: Rhys: She was lit by the blue glow of the dining room lights...
translation: Rhys: 餐厅里蔚蓝的微光照亮了她的身影……

original: Rhys: And she was [i]stabbing[/i] the victim with her magical sword.
translation: Rhys: 她当时正用她自己的魔法剑<u>刺向</u>受害者。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Mr. Rudolf.[p/] You testified that you saw my client [i]murdering[/i] the victim.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 鲁道夫先生。[p/]你作证看到我的委托人在<u>杀害</u>被害者。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: And you supposedly saw her casting [i]magic[/i] while doing so?
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 并且看到她作案过程中还正在使用<u>魔法</u>？

original: Rhys Rudolf: Y-[p/][s/]Yes…[p/] I could never forget such a grisly sight.
translation: Rhys Rudolf: 是、[p/][s/]是的……[p/]那可怕的一幕我此生难忘。

original: Rhys Rudolf: That moment was burned into my memory.
translation: Rhys Rudolf: 当时的情形仿佛烙在我的脑海。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: I see…[p/] Well, it’s [i]funny[/i] that you say that.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 这样啊……[p/]哎，你这么说还挺<u>有趣</u>的。

original: Rhys Rudolf: …How so?
translation: Rhys Rudolf: ……你什么意思？

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Because your entire testimony…
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 因为你的所有证言……

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: ...was a complete [i]lie[/i]!
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: ……都是彻头彻尾的<u>谎言</u>！

original: Rhys Rudolf: W-[s/]What?!
translation: Rhys Rudolf: 什、[s/]什么？！

original: Aria Steelwind: Are you accusing the witness of perjury?
translation: Aria Steelwind: 你这是在指控证人作伪证吗？

original: Aria Steelwind: Surely you know that such accusations can't be made lightly, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria Steelwind: 你也清楚这种指控的分量，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: My accusation is far from baseless, Steelwind.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 我并非毫无依据，斯蒂尔文德。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Think about the state of the crime scene at the time of the murder!
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 想想谋杀发生时作案现场的状况！

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: The witness couldn’t have seen [i]anything[/i],[p/][s/] much less a [i]homicide[/i]!
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 证人根本<u>什么都看不见</u>！[p/][s/]更别提目睹了一场<u>凶杀</u>！

original: Rhys Rudolf: ... [mind="He knows something..."/]
translation: Rhys Rudolf: …… [mind="看来他知道……"/]

original: But on this battlefield,[p/] there are still a few people who carry the ideals of justice within their hearts.
translation: 但在这战场上，[p/]仍有几个心中秉持正义理想之士。

original: But you have to wonder sometimes...[p/] Are these ideals truly "just"?
translation: 但你时常陷入深思……[p/]这些理想真的“公正”吗？

original: Or are they simply lies fed to us by our elders?
translation: 或者只是长辈们灌输给我们的谎言？

original: Garrick Pierce: Damn it...
translation: Garrick Pierce: 可恶……

original: Garrick Pierce: Damn it!
translation: Garrick Pierce: 可恶！

original: Garrick Pierce: Flinhart, you fool!
translation: Garrick Pierce: 弗林哈特，你这个蠢货！

original: Garrick: Why couldn’t you have just [i]listened[/i] to me?!
translation: Garrick: 你为什么就不能听我的？！

original: Garrick Pierce: ...
translation: Garrick Pierce: ……

original: Garrick Pierce: Rudolf.[p/] I require your assistance.
translation: Garrick Pierce: 鲁道夫。[p/]我需要你帮忙。

original: Rhys Rudolf: Yes, sir?
translation: Rhys Rudolf: 有何吩咐？

original: Rhys Rudolf: By the Scaled Lord![p/][s/] What did you-?!
translation: Rhys Rudolf: 鳞甲领主在上！[p/][s/]你到底做了什——！？

original: Rhys Rudolf: You...[p/][s/] killed him!
translation: Rhys Rudolf: 你……[p/][s/]杀了他！

original: Garrick: ...
translation: Garrick: ……

original: Garrick: Alert the town guard.[p/] Tell them that you saw his daughter fleeing the scene.
translation: Garrick: 向镇警报案。[p/]告诉他们你看见他女儿逃离了现场。

original: Garrick: I’m sure their neighbors heard them arguing with each other.
translation: Garrick: 邻居肯定都听到他们吵架了。

original: Garrick: They'll immediately suspect her.
translation: Garrick: 她会成为头号嫌疑人。

original: Rhys Rudolf: ...
translation: Rhys Rudolf: ……

original: Rhys Rudolf: At once, sir.
translation: Rhys Rudolf: 马上照做，阁下。

original: Earlier that day...
translation: 早些时候……

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Ugh...
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 唔呃……

original: You feel yourself slowly succumbing to unbearable pain.
translation: 你感到自己渐渐屈服于难以忍受的痛。

original: You don’t think you’ll be able to survive this much longer.
translation: 你大概撑不了多久了。

original: Ruby Tymora: Are you [i]sure[/i] you're okay, Cuthbert?
translation: Ruby Tymora: 卡斯伯特，你<u>确定</u>自己没事吧？

original: Ruby Tymora: You look like you're about to pass out.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 你看起来要昏迷了。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: D-[p/][s/]Don’t worry about me, Ms. Tymora![p/][s/] I’m fine!
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 无、[p/][s/]无须担心，泰摩拉女士！[p/][s/]我没事！

original: You’ve been riding in this carriage for [i]days[/i].[p/] You are definitely [i]not[/i] fine.
translation: 已经坐了<u>好几天</u>的马车，[p/]你当然有事。

original: With each bump in the road,[p/] you feel yourself becoming more and more nauseous.
translation: 每次马车的颠簸都让你越来越恶心。

original: It’s taking every ounce of willpower just to hold down your lunch.
translation: 你需要拼尽全力才能确保午饭不会被吐出来。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: I-[p/][s/]I'm [i]perfectly[/i] fine…
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 我、[p/][s/]我<u>完全</u>没问题……

original: Ruby Tymora: If you say so…
translation: Ruby Tymora: 既然你都这样说了……

original: You feel the carriage drive over a large bump in the road.
translation: 你感到马车碾过路上的一处凸起。

original: You can feel [i]and[/i] hear your stomach retching in protest.
translation: 你感受<u>并</u>听到胃里翻江倒海……

original: That stew you ate for lunch doesn’t taste [i]nearly[/i] as good the second time...
translation: 午饭的炖菜反刍出来可不好吃……

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: *Hrgh*
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: *呕*

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: O-[p/][s/]On second thought...
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 转、[p/][s/]转念一想……

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: *sigh*[p/] That's better.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: *叹气* [p/]好多了。

original: You take a deep breath of fresh air.
translation: 你深吸了一口新鲜空气。

original: It's the first breath you've taken today that hasn't threatened to come back out.
translation: 这口空气是今天第一个不用担心被吐出来的东西。

original: Ruby Tymora: Sorry about this.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 很抱歉。

original: Ruby Tymora: I didn’t expect the roads in this town to be this uneven.
translation: Ruby Tymora: 我没想到这里的路这么坎坷。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert:  I suppose they don’t get a lot of traffic here.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert:  估计这里没什么人来。

original: You’ve been on the road with your mentor for days.
translation: 和导师一起旅行有些时日了。

original: :Together,[p/] you’ve been searching for a man named: Flinhart McCoy.
translation: 你们一起在寻找一位叫弗林哈特·麦考伊的男人。

original: Supposedly,[p/] he’s been a voice of dissidence against King Olivier for the last few decades.
translation: 据说他与奥利维尔王持不同政见数十年了。

original: You have no idea what kind of business Ms. Tymora would have with him.
translation: 虽然你不清楚泰摩拉女士为什么要去找他。

original: ...But you know better than to ask questions about her affairs.
translation: ……但你知道最好少过问她的事。

original: Merchant: Hello, travelers![p/][s/] Welcome to Kornhaven!
translation: Merchant: 旅行者们，你们好！[p/][s/]欢迎来到科尔哈文！

original: A local merchant steps out from one of the nearby shops.
translation: 附近商店的一个商人走上前。

original: He has a wide smile on his face.[p/] And he approaches your carriage with the enthusiasm of a starving vulture.
translation: 他脸上挂着大大的微笑，[p/]向你们的马车接近，[p/]热情如饥饿的秃鹫见到食物。

original: Merchant: Would a pair of [p/][i]dignified[/i] individuals such as yourselves care for a refreshing drink? [mind="Hmph… Those clothes. They must be from the city."/]
translation: Merchant: 庄严尊重的贵客们啊，要来杯可口清爽的饮料吗？ [mind="嗯……这身衣着，这帮人一定是来自大城市。"/]

original: He certainly [i]has[/i] a friendly expression.[p/] But his thoughts seem [i]very[/i] analytical.
translation: 虽然他脸上的表情<u>显得</u>非常友善，[p/]但他的内心想法值得斟酌。

original: Ruby Tymora: Well,[p/] [i]I[/i] don't need a drink,[p/] but...
translation: Ruby Tymora: <u>我</u>不需要喝的，[p/]但……

original: Ms. Tymora glances at you,[p/] and your stomach rumbles in agreement.
translation: 泰摩拉女士看了眼你，[p/]你的胃低沉作响，替你表示同意。

original: Merchant: Ah![p/] Of course![p/] I have [i]just[/i] the thing for an upset stomach! [mind="With a carriage like that, I bet I could fleece them for a lot."/]
translation: Merchant: 啊！[p/]没问题！[p/]对于晕车我有良药！ [mind="这种规模的马车，我肯定能从他们这狠狠地捞一笔。"/]

original: His thoughts and emotions are laid bare through your Eye of Horus.
translation: 他的想法和心情赤裸裸地暴露在你的荷鲁斯之眼下。

original: But the merchant’s expression doesn’t betray a hint of what he’s truly thinking.
translation: 但是商人的表情没有出卖他的真实想法。

original: ...You wonder if his false smile could get any bigger.
translation: ……你好奇他这假笑能否再夸张一点。

original: At this rate,[p/] he might dislocate his jaw.
translation: 照这样笑下去，[p/]他得笑到下巴脱臼。

original: Merchant: How about two flasks of apple juice for 50 silver pieces?
translation: Merchant: 两瓶苹果汁 50 银币怎么样？

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: 50sp...?
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 50 银币？

original: Merchant: You may find the price daunting![p/] But this is organic and [i]fresh-made[/i] apple juice! [mind="It’s just store-bought juice… But I bet they can’t even tell the difference."/]
translation: Merchant: 你可能觉得价钱有些高！[p/]但这可是原生态有机鲜榨苹果汁！ [mind="这就是店里卖的瓶装果汁，但是他们肯定看不出来区别。"/]

original: Out of the corner of your eye,[p/] you spot an empty bottle of store-bought apple juice.
translation: 你余光瞟到一瓶空的瓶装苹果汁。

original: It’s resting on a table inside the merchant’s shop.
translation: 空瓶就摆在商人店里的桌子上。

original: Merchant: Trust me![p/][s/] It’s worth the extra gold![mind="Heh… I sell them for far less than that."]
translation: Merchant: 相信我！[p/][s/]这绝对值得这个价！[mind="呵……正常卖可比这便宜多了。"]

original: Normally,[p/] the price wouldn't matter that much to you.
translation: 一般对你来说，[p/]价格并不是什么大不了的事。

original: …But you don’t appreciate being treated like an easy mark.
translation: ……但是你就是不想让人觉得你那么容易上当受骗。

original: Merchant: See?[p/][s/] Even [i]you[/i] can't doubt the amazing deal that I'm offering you.
translation: Merchant: 怎样？[p/][s/]就算是<u>你</u>也没办法质疑这物美价廉的产品！

original: No...[p/][s/] That's [i]not[/i] right.
OK
translation: OK

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: I think you need to elaborate.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 我觉得你得展开讲讲。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: You said that this apple juice is organic,[p/] but where is it made?
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 你说这苹果汁是有机的，[p/]那这是从哪里生产的？

original: Merchant: It’s produced by the hardworking people of this town, of course!
translation: Merchant: 当然是通过我们镇上人们辛勤的劳作！

original: Merchant: In a small town like ours,[p/] we only deal with locally sourced products!
translation: Merchant: 我们这样的小镇，[p/]只售卖当地生产的产品！

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: You say that.[p/] But I can [i]see[/i] an empty bottle of store-bought juice inside your shop.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 话是这样说，[p/]但是我能<u>看到</u>你店里有瓶空的瓶装果汁。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Why would you have something like that if you only deal with organic products?
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 如果你只卖本地有机产品的话，那店里为什么会有这种东西？

original: Merchant: O-[p/][s/]Oh![p/][s/] How did [i]that[/i] get there?!
translation: Merchant: 哦、[p/][s/]哦！[p/][s/]<u>那东西</u>咋在那儿？！

original: No…[p/] That’s not right.
translation: 不对……[p/]再好好想想。

original: You [i]saw[/i] the store-bought apple juice inside his shop.
translation: 你<u>看见了</u>放在他店里的瓶装苹果汁。

original: That contradicts his claim that he [i]only[/i] trades organic products.
translation: 这与他所述的“<u>只</u>售卖有机产品”相悖。

original: Merchant: M-[p/][s/]Make no mistake!
translation: Merchant: 别、[p/][s/]别误会！

original: Merchant: I only have that because I wanted to see how [i]my[/i] products compare to that of the city!
translation: Merchant: 我有那空瓶只是想用城里卖的对比一下<u>我的</u>产品！

original: Merchant: And let me tell you,[p/][s/] that mass-produced slop doesn’t even [i]compare[/i] to my product!
translation: Merchant: 我和你说，[p/][s/]那种流水线生产的液体和我的完全<u>没法比</u>！

original: ...What an obvious lie.
translation: ……撒谎不打草稿。

original: Merchant: Honestly,[p/] I’m offering you a very good deal.
translation: Merchant: 说真的，[p/]我可是给你狠狠打折了。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Sir.[p/] It’s obvious those flasks are only worth 5sp.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 先生，[p/]这些破玩意儿明显只值 5 银币。

original: Merchant: W-[p/][s/]Wha-?![p/][s/] How did you-?!
translation: Merchant: 啥、[p/][s/]啥！[p/][s/]你是怎么——？！

original: Merchant: …
translation: Merchant: ……

original: Merchant: W-[p/][s/]Well...[p/] It's clear you’re a [i]very[/i] shrewd man...
translation: Merchant: 好、[p/][s/]好吧……[p/]看来你是个<u>非常</u>精明的人……

original: Tyrion: Right...
translation: Tyrion: 是……

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Sir,[p/] what you’re saying clearly doesn’t match with what you’re thinking.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 先生，[p/]你说的和你心里想的完全不一致啊。

original: Merchant: What I'm "thinking"?[p/] I'm afraid I don't understand.
translation: Merchant: 我在“想什么”？[p/]我不太明白。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: E-[p/]Er,[p/] well…
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 呃、[p/]呃……[p/]这个……

original: You can’t exactly [i]tell[/i] him that you can read his mind…
translation: 你肯定不能<u>直说</u>你能读他的心。

original: You need to rethink this...
translation: 再想想……

original: How does his thought relate to his claim?
translation: 他的想法和证言有什么联系？

original: Orym: Look.[p/] We can talk about this all day, kid.
translation: Orym: 小子，[p/]这没有意义，我们能争论一整天。

original: Orym: You’re getting nothing out of me.
translation: Orym: 你从我这什么都得不到。

original: Damn it…[p/] You’re still not getting through to him...
translation: 可恶……[p/]你还是没有说服他……

original: OK
translation: OK

original: Commander White seems unusually hostile towards you.
translation: 怀特指挥官对你的敌意异乎寻常。

original: And you have a feeling it’s not [i]just[/i] because you embarrassed him in court today.
translation: 你感觉<u>不仅仅是</u>因为今天在法庭上让他难堪。

original: If you can clear up this misunderstanding,[p/] you might be able to convince him to help you.
translation: 若能化解误会，[p/]你也许能说服他为你提供帮助。

original: Yes
translation: 是

original: No
translation: 否

original: Tyrion: Alright,[p/] I’m just going to come out and say it.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧，[p/]我就直说了。

original: Tyrion: Do you have a problem with me, Commander White?
translation: Tyrion: 怀特指挥官，你是对我有意见吗？

original: Orym: You should know exactly what my “problem” is with you.
translation: Orym: 你应该很清楚我对你有什么“意见”。

original: Orym: I [i]saw[/i] who you work for.
translation: Orym: 我<u>看到了</u>你为谁工作。

original: Orym: Do I have to spell it out for you?
translation: Orym: 用我把她的名字拼出来给你看吗？

original: Orym: Or does your boss not tell you what she gets up to?
translation: Orym: 还是说你老大从没跟你提过她做的那些勾当？

original: Deflect [d="Regardless of what Ms. Tymora has done, I'm the one heading this case."/]
translation: Deflect [d="无论泰摩拉女士曾做过什么，我才是本案的律师。"/]

original: Tyrion: Regardless of what Ms. Tymora has done,[p/] [i]I'm[/i] the one heading this case.
translation: Tyrion: 无论泰摩拉女士曾做过什么，[p/]<u>我</u>才是本案的律师。

original: Tyrion: Whatever problems you have with her,[p/] they have nothing to do with me.
translation: Tyrion: 你和她之间的矛盾和我无关。

original: Orym: …
translation: Orym: ……

original: Orym: That still doesn’t change the fact that you work for her.
translation: Orym: 那还是没法改变你在她手下工作的事实。

original: Rationalize [d="It doesn't matter how you feel about me or Ms. Tymora. What matters is that my client deserves a fair trial with fair representation."/]
translation: Rationalize [d="你对我或泰摩拉女士的意见不重要，重要的是我的委托人理应得到公正的审判和律师支持。"/]

original: Tyrion: It doesn't matter how you feel about me or Ms. Tymora.
translation: Tyrion: 你对我或泰摩拉女士的意见不重要。

original: Tyrion: What matters is that my client deserves a fair trial with fair representation.
translation: Tyrion: 重要的是我的委托人理应得到公正的审判和律师支持。

original: Tyrion: All I’m trying to do is give that to her.
translation: Tyrion: 我的一切努力都是为了给予她帮助。

original: Orym: …
translation: Orym: ……

original: Defend [d="You have no right to throw baseless accusations against me or Ms. Tymora!"/]
translation: Defend [d="你无权对我或泰摩拉女士进行毫无依据的指控。"/]

original: Tyrion: You have no right to throw baseless accusations against me [i]or[/i] Ms. Tymora!
translation: Tyrion: 你无权对我或泰摩拉女士进行毫无依据的指控。

original: Tyrion: Whatever you [i]think[/i] she’s done,[p/][s/] you’re wrong!
translation: Tyrion: 你对她所作所为的<u>看法</u>都是错的！

original: Orym: Hah![p/] You’re either a good liar or your really [i]are[/i] that naïve.
translation: Orym: 哈！[p/]你要么也是个大骗子，要么就<u>真的</u>这么天真。

original: Orym: That woman’s hands are dirty.[p/] And nothing you say will change my mind.
translation: Orym: 那女人双手沾满污垢，[p/]你说什么都没办法改变我的看法。

original: You feel as though that wasn't the right way to respond to his claim.
translation: 这似乎不是回应他的正确方式。

original: Remember.[p/] You can read Orym's PSYCHOLOGICAL PROFILE to determine the best way to respond to his claim.
translation: 记住，[p/]你可以阅读奥蒙的<size=1.5em>心理档案</size>来判断最佳的回复方式。

original: Orym: I’ve seen that woman do all kinds of shady shit in the cases I’ve worked.
translation: Orym: 在我负责的案子里，[p/]我见识过那女人做过的那些肮脏事。

original: Orym: Forgery,[p/] bribery,[p/] blackmail.[p/] You name it.
translation: Orym: 伪造、[p/]贿赂、[p/]勒索。[p/]只要是你想得到的。

original: Orym: I’ll bet you’re just the same.[p/] A successor for the devil of defense attorneys.
translation: Orym: 我猜你也和她一样，[p/]虎母无犬子。

original: Defend [d="I’m not Ruby Tymora. Regardless of what you’ve seen her do, I’m going to run an honest case."/]
translation: Defend [d="我不是鲁比·泰摩拉。无论她做过什么都与我无关，我会秉公办案。"/]

original: Tyrion: I’m [i]not[/i] Ruby Tymora.
translation: Tyrion: 我<u>不是</u>鲁比·泰摩拉。

original: Tyrion: It doesn’t matter if the rumors are true or not.
translation: Tyrion: 谣言真实与否并不重要。

original: Tyrion: Regardless of what you’ve seen her do,[p/] I’m going to run an honest case.
translation: Tyrion: 无论她做过什么都与我无关，[p/]我会秉公办案。

original: Orym: ...
translation: Orym: ……

original: Rationalize [d="“Forgery, bribery, blackmail”? Have you seen me do any of those things? Because all I’ve done so far is point out the mistakes that [i]you’ve[/i] made."/]
translation: Rationalize [d="“伪造、贿赂、勒索”？你见我做过这种事吗？目前为止我做的仅仅是指出<u>你的</u>错误。"/]

original: Tyrion: “Forgery,[p/] bribery,[p/] blackmail”?[p/] Have you seen me do [i]any[/i] of those things?
translation: Tyrion: “伪造、贿赂、勒索”？你见我做过这种事吗？

original: Tyrion: Because all I’ve done so far is point out the mistakes that [i]you’ve[/i] made.
translation: Tyrion: 目前为止我做的仅仅是指出<u>你的</u>错误。

original: Orym: ...
translation: Orym: ……

original: Deflect [d="Me being her successor has nothing to do with it."/]
translation: Deflect [d="我是她的徒弟一事与此无关。"/]

original: Tyrion: Me being her successor has nothing to do with it.
translation: Tyrion: 我是她的徒弟一事与此无关。

original: Tyrion: What matters is whether or not you will help me.
translation: Tyrion: 重要的是你愿不愿意帮助我。

original: Orym: Quit trying to change the subject!
translation: Orym: 少在这转移话题！

original: Orym: You can’t even give me a straight answer.
translation: Orym: 你都不敢正面回答我的问题。

original: Orym: That tells me all I need to know.
translation: Orym: 这已经足够知晓你是什么人了。

original: Deflecting his claim doesn't seem to be effective this time.
translation: 这次转移话题不是很奏效。

original: Orym: ...
translation: Orym: ……

original: Orym: Look, kid.[p/] I’d like nothing more than to believe you.
translation: Orym: 听着，小子。[p/]我真的很想相信你。

original: Orym: But after everything I’ve seen her do…[p/] I know better.
translation: Orym: 但在我知晓她的所作所为之后……[p/]我深知一点。

original: Orym: Anyone taught by that woman can’t be anything more than a crook.
translation: Orym: 被那女人教过的人都是骗子。

original: Deflect [d="Nothing that I’ve done has given you any reason to suspect me."/]
translation: Deflect [d="我没做过什么值得你怀疑我的事。"/]

original: Tyrion: Right now I’m just a defense attorney that’s asking you for information.
translation: Tyrion: 现在我只是以一个辩护律师的身份，[p/]向你询问一些案件信息。

original: Tyrion: Nothing that [i]I’ve[/i] done has given you any reason to suspect me.
translation: Tyrion: 我没做过什么值得你怀疑我的事。

original: Rationalize [d="Have you seen me engage in any “crook”-like behavior?."/]
translation: Rationalize [d="你见过我有什么“骗子”般的行为吗？"/]

original: Tyrion: Her way of teaching me was ruthless,[p/] I’ll give you that.
translation: Tyrion: 我承认她教我的方式非常无情。

original: Tyrion: But the only thing that she taught me was how to practice law.
translation: Tyrion: 但她只教过我如何理解与运用法律。

original: Tyrion: Have you seen me engage in any “crook”-like behavior?
translation: Tyrion: 你见过我有什么“骗子”般的行为吗？

original: Defend [d="You have no proof that she’s a “crook”. And you sure don’t have any proof that I’m one either."/]
translation: Defend [d="你没有确切的证据证明她是个“骗子”，也没有任何证据证明<u>我</u>是。"/]

original: Tyrion: You’ve made accusation after accusation against her with nothing to prove it.
translation: Tyrion: 你一次又一次毫无根据地指控她。

original: Tyrion: You have no proof that she’s a “crook”.[p/] And you sure don’t have any proof that [i]I’m[/i] one either.
translation: Tyrion: 你没有确切的证据证明她是个“骗子”，也没有任何证据证明<u>我</u>是。

original: Orym: Like I’ve been saying,[p/] I don’t need any “proof”.
translation: Orym: 我一直在说，[p/]我不需要任何“证明”。

original: Orym: I’ve seen how she works.[p/] And I don't have any proof that you're any different.
translation: Orym: 我见过她如何工作。[p/]我也没有你会与她不同的证据。

original: Defending Ms. Tymora might have been the wrong move.
translation: 替泰摩拉女士辩护貌似是条死路。

original: Orym: …
translation: Orym: ……

original: Orym: You just want some info, right?
translation: Orym: 你只是想知道一些情报，对吧？

original: Tyrion: Yes.[p/] That’s all I’m asking for.
translation: Tyrion: 是的，[p/]除此之外别无所求。

original: Orym: …Alright.[p/] I’ll answer your questions.
translation: Orym: ……好吧，[p/]你问吧。

original: Orym: Just don’t make me regret this.
translation: Orym: 别让我后悔。

original: You’ve successfully persuaded Orym White.
translation: 你成功说服了奥蒙·怀特。

original: No...[p/] There was no blood trail where Flinhart's body is.
translation: 不对……[p/]弗林哈特的周围没有血痕。

original: The [i]lack[/i] of a blood trail tells us something important.
translation: <u>没有</u>血痕这一点揭示了重要事实。

original: Namely,[p/] [i]where[/i] Flinhart was throughout the murder.
translation: 其中之一就是，[p/]谋杀发生时弗林哈特在<u>哪里</u>。

original: Tyrion: Flinhart died where he was attacked.
translation: Tyrion: 弗林哈特在被攻击的地方死亡。

original: Tyrion: He didn’t move from his position at all.
translation: Tyrion: 他在遇袭过程中根本没有移动过。

original: Orym: Um…[p/] Yeah,[p/] I guess you’re right.
translation: Orym: 呃……[p/]对，[p/]确实。

original: Tyrion: There’s also the Autopsy Report,[p/] which says that he died from a stab from behind.
translation: Tyrion: 尸检报告也证实，[p/]他死于一记从背后所造成的刺伤。

original: Tyrion: He was probably caught off guard and was too incapacitated to move anywhere else.
translation: Tyrion: 他遇袭时可能措手不及，也失去了移动的能力。

original: Tyrion: This means that the attack happened at the exact position he fell over.
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说，尸体所在的位置就是第一案发现场。

original: Tyrion: There’s also the shattered bottle of “Lotus Juice”.
translation: Tyrion: 这里还有打碎的“莲之水”瓶子。

original: Tyrion: I doubt it means anything,[p/] but the shattered bottle is right next to the body.
translation: Tyrion: 我不觉得这有多大关系，[p/]但碎掉的瓶子确实就在尸体旁边。

original: No...[p/] Flinhart died at the exact location where the attack happened.
translation: 不对……[p/]弗林哈特在被攻击的地方死亡。

original: And you found the shattered bottle right next to his body.
translation: 你在他身旁发现了一些玻璃瓶碎片。

original: Flinhart must have been holding it at some point.
translation: 弗林哈特一定拿着这个瓶子。

original: Tyrion: Flinhart dropped the bottle when he was attacked.
translation: Tyrion: 弗林哈特遇袭时掉落了这个瓶子。

original: Tyrion: From that,[p/] we can infer that he was holding it the moment [i]before[/i] he was attacked.
translation: Tyrion: 我们可以得知，[p/]他遇袭<u>之时</u>一定拿着这瓶饮料。

original: Orym: Um…[p/] What’s so strange about one bottle, though?
translation: Orym: 呃……[p/]那这瓶饮料哪里奇特？

original: Tyrion: It may [i]seem[/i] like an insignificant detail.
translation: Tyrion: 可能这<u>乍一看</u>无关紧要。

original: Tyrion: But that detail could help me infer other elements of what happened during the murder.
translation: Tyrion: 但这个小细节能帮我推断谋杀发生时的各种要素。

original: Orym: R-[p/]Right…
translation: Orym: 好、[p/]好的……

original: Tyrion: There’s also the fact that the artificery lights were out.
translation: Tyrion: 当时这些奥术能源驱动的灯都没亮。

original: Tyrion: Were these candles here when you arrived at the crime scene, Orym?
translation: Tyrion: 奥蒙，你到现场的时候有这些蜡烛吗？

original: Orym: No.[p/] We had to light some so we could see the crime scene properly.
translation: Orym: 没有，[p/]这些蜡烛是我们为了看清现场才点的。

original: Orym: We thought it was weird too.
translation: Orym: 我们当时也觉得很怪。

original: Orym: The girl and her father must have had their argument in pitch-black darkness.
translation: Orym: 这对父女得是在一片漆黑中吵架。

original: Tyrion: So,[p/] they didn’t light any candles to make up for the broken lights.
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说，[p/]虽然灯不亮，但他们也没有点蜡烛来照明。

original: No...[p/] These candles were lit by the Inquisition [i]after[/i] they came to investigate the murder.
translation: 不对……[p/]这些蜡烛是裁判所来调查谋杀<u>之后</u>才点燃的。

original: And the dining room lights have had no energy for the last week.
translation: 就餐区的灯从上周起就没有电了。

original: It seems strange…[p/] but this can only mean one thing about the room’s lighting.
translation: 挺怪的……[p/]但房间的照明也只意味着一件事。

original: Tyrion: The crime scene had no lighting during the murder.
translation: Tyrion: 谋杀发生时，现场没有照明。

original: Tyrion: The argument that Celeste had with Flinhart must have been spontaneous.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特和弗林哈特的争吵一定是突发的。

original: Tyrion: They weren’t planning to have a conversation in this room.
translation: Tyrion: 他们肯定不会想在这么暗的房间里谈话。

original: Tyrion: In this darkness,[p/] Flinhart wouldn’t have a lot of visibility.
translation: Tyrion: 这么暗，[p/]弗林哈特肯定什么都看不清。

original: Tyrion: If he was stabbed from behind,[p/] he probably didn’t see it coming.
translation: Tyrion: 而且如果是从背后遭到袭击，[p/]大概率他也没注意到。

original: Tyrion: He was clearly surprised and was probably in too much shock to run away.
translation: Tyrion: 他一定非常震惊，以至于没能迈开半步。

original: Orym: Um...
translation: Orym: 呃……

original: Tyrion: Also,[p/] the bottle may [i]seem[/i] insignificant.[p/] But he was holding it when he was attacked.
translation: Tyrion: 另外，[p/]那瓶饮料<u>乍一看</u>无关紧要。[p/]但是被害者遇袭时正拿着这个瓶子。

original: Tyrion: Maybe he was pouring a drink for himself…[p/] or maybe it was for a visitor.
translation: Tyrion: 或许他是想小酌一杯……[p/]又或者是要款待客人。

original: Tyrion: Either way,[p/] the assailant must have been unseen by Flinhart.
translation: Tyrion: 无论如何，[p/]弗林哈特肯定没看见凶手。

original: Orym: Kid...?
translation: Orym: 小子……？

original: Tyrion: Or the assailant attacked him from his blind spot while his back was turned.
translation: Tyrion: 亦或者说。[p/]凶手是在他转身时，从盲点发起攻击。

original: Tyrion: Why would his back be turned though?[p/] Was he distracted by something?
translation: Tyrion: 那他为什么背对着别人呢？[p/] 他是被什么东西分散注意力了吗？

original: Orym: Kid!
translation: Orym: 小子！

original: Tyrion: W-[p/]What...?
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]啊……？

original: Orym: What was [i]that[/i] all about?!
translation: Orym: 你怎么了？！

original: Tyrion: S-[p/]Sorry.[p/] Sometimes I just get lost in my own thoughts…
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/]抱歉……[p/]我有时候就会这样……

original: Orym: Yeah…[p/] well…[p/] cut it out.
translation: Orym: 嗯……[p/]那……[p/]别闹了。

original: Orym: You’re freaking me out.
translation: Orym: 你吓到我了。

original: Tyrion: R-[p/]right…
translation: Tyrion: 好、[p/]好的……

original: Anyways,[p/] you think you’ve found everything you can here.
translation: 总之，[p/]应该已经找全了所有有用的线索了。

original: You should MOVE somewhere else.
translation: 你应该<size=1.5em>移动</size>到别处看看。

original: Tyrion: Commander White,[p/] you testified that the victim was killed using the defendant’s magical sword.
translation: Tyrion: 怀特指挥官，[p/]你作证称被害者死于被告的魔法剑。

original: Tyrion: Am I correct?
translation: Tyrion: 我说得没错吧？

original: Orym: Yeah…[p/] It's pretty obvious when you look at the crime scene.
translation: Orym: 没错……[p/]你一看犯罪现场就明白了。

original: Tyrion: I think I’d actually have to [i]disagree[/i] with you on that.
translation: Tyrion: 我看不然。

original: Tyrion: The defendant’s sword couldn’t have possibly been the murder weapon.
translation: Tyrion: 被告的剑根本不可能是凶器。

original: Orym: What are you talking about, kid?
translation: Orym: 小子，你在胡言乱语什么？

original: Orym: The sword was inside his body!
translation: Orym: 那把剑就插在被害者的身体里！

original: Orym: Of course, that’s what killed him!
translation: Orym: 那铁定是凶器！

original: Tyrion: That may be the case.[p/] But take a look at the Autopsy Report.
translation: Tyrion: 乍一看是这样，[p/]但请仔细看看尸检报告。

original: Tyrion: It states that the fatal wound had heavy traces of magic.
translation: Tyrion: 尸检报告写了致命伤口处有大量魔法痕迹。

original: Tyrion: So how would a [i]non[/i]-magical sword leave traces of magic on the body?!
translation: Tyrion: 那一把<u>非魔法剑</u>是怎么留下这么多魔法痕迹的？！

original: Orym: What?!
translation: Orym: 什么？！

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Tyrion: To leave a trace like that,[p/] the wound would have had to have been created with something magical.
translation: Tyrion: 要想留下那样的痕迹，[p/]一定得是用魔法创造的某种物体造成了伤口。

original: Tyrion: My client’s sword may [i]look[/i] fancy and expensive…[p/][s/] But it is entirely mundane!
translation: Tyrion: 被告的剑可能<u>看起来</u>华丽又昂贵……[p/][s/]但它只是一把普通的剑！

original: Orym: That doesn’t make a [i]lick[/i] of sense!
translation: Orym: 这<u>一点</u>都说不通啊！

original: Orym: If the sword didn’t kill him,[p/][s/] then why was it in the body?!
translation: Orym: 如果那把剑不是凶器，[p/][s/]为什么它插在尸体里？！

original: Judge: Yes.[p/] I find that quite strange, as well.
translation: Judge: 是的。[p/]我也认为那一点很可疑。

original: Tyrion: Well,[p/] there’s only one reasonable explanation, Your Honor.
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下，[p/]要解释这一点只有一种可能。

original: Tyrion: The wound was created magically...
translation: Tyrion: 使用魔法造成伤口之后……

original: Tyrion: ...And someone shoved the sword into the wound afterward!
translation: Tyrion: ……某人将这把剑又插进了伤口里！

original: Orym: The hell are you talking about?!
translation: Orym: 你在说什么？！

original: Orym: The defendant is a damned mage!
translation: Orym: 被告可是个该死的法师！

original: Orym: She could have [i]easily[/i] killed the victim using magic!
translation: Orym: 她可以<u>轻而易举地</u>用魔法杀害受害者！

original: Tyrion: That may be, commander.
translation: Tyrion: 可能吧，指挥官。

original: Tyrion: But why would she kill the victim using magic,[p/][s/] and [i]then[/i] stab him with her sword?!
translation: Tyrion: 但她为什么要先用魔法杀人，[p/][s/]<u>然后</u>再用自己的剑重新插进去？！

original: Tyrion: She would just be incriminating herself!
translation: Tyrion: 完全就是在不打自招！

original: Tyrion: No…[p/] If anything,[p/][s/] this series of events proves one thing!
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/][s/]这一系列证据只能证明一件事！

original: Tyrion: Someone used magic to kill the victim.
translation: Tyrion: 某人使用魔法杀害了弗林哈特·麦考伊。

original: Tyrion: And then they pushed my client’s sword into the wound to frame her!
translation: Tyrion: 之后他为了陷害我的委托人，将她的剑插进伤口！

original: Aria: Don’t get ahead of yourself.
translation: Aria: 别太着急下结论。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Aria: Your Honor,[p/] the defense is trying to spin the facts in his favor.
translation: Aria: 法官阁下，[p/]辩方试图歪曲事实。

original: Aria: He claims that a third party committed the crime and used the sword to frame the defendant.
translation: Aria: 他声称有第三者犯下了整起案件，并利用那把剑嫁祸给被告。

original: Aria: …But wouldn’t the simpler explanation be this?
translation: Aria: ……但不是还有更简单的解释吗？

original: Aria: Magic was being channeled [i]through[/i] the sword at the time of death.
translation: Aria: 这把剑在受害者死时正在<u>被附魔</u>。

original: Aria: [i]That[/i] is what left the magical trace on the body.
translation: Aria: <u>这</u>才是尸体上留有魔法痕迹的原因。

original: Aria: Commander,[p/] please tell the defense how the murder was committed using magic.
translation: Aria: 指挥官，[p/]请你告诉辩方凶手是如何使用魔法杀人的。

original: Orym: What…?
translation: Orym: 什么……？

original: Orym: …
translation: Orym: ……

original: Orym: Alright…[p/] alright…
translation: Orym: 好吧……[p/]好吧……

original: Orym: I think I see where you’re going with this.
translation: Orym: 我明白你的意思了。

original: Orym: It’s true that the sword itself isn’t magical.[p/] But magic can still be channeled through it.
translation: Orym: 那把剑本身确实没有魔法属性，[p/]但是魔法依然可以被附在上面。

original: Orym: That defendant over there? [p/] Her [b]Spell Compendium[/b] has a spell called “[b]Mage Blade[/b]”.
translation: Orym: 被告的[b]法术汇编[/b]证实，她会一种叫做“[b]法术剑刃[/b]”的法术。

original: Orym: She must have used it on her sword [i]before[/i] stabbing the victim.
translation: Orym: 她一定在刺杀受害者<u>之前</u>用了这个法术给剑附魔。

original: Orym: [i]That[/i] spell is the reason why there were traces of [b]transmutation[/b] magic on the wound.
translation: Orym: 这就是伤口上有[b]形变术[/b]痕迹的原因。

original: So,[p/] her [b]Spell Compendium[/b] contains a spell called [b]Mage Blade[/b].
translation: 所以，[p/]她的[b]法术汇编[/b]里有[b]法术剑刃[/b]。

original: A [b]Spell Compendium[/b] is a magical device that lists every spell a mage can cast.
translation: [b]法术汇编[/b]是能显示一个法师所能施展魔法的装置。

original: Luckily, Celeste’s Compendium only contains one spell.
translation: 所幸，塞莱斯特的法术汇编只包含一个法术。

original: That means she can only cast that one spell.
translation: 意味着她只能施展这一种法术。

original: Tyrion: Celeste,[p/] do you have your [b]Spell Compendium[/b] with you?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特，[p/]你还带着[b]法术汇编[/b]吗？

original: Celeste: N-[p/]No…[p/] I left it at the tavern after…
translation: Celeste: 没、[p/]没有……[p/]我把它落在酒馆了，时间是……

original: Celeste: Well,[p/] you know…
translation: Celeste: ……是在那件事之后……

original: If you can’t look at the description for [b]Mage Blade[/b],[p/] you’ll have to approach this another way.
translation: 要是看不到[b]法术剑刃[/b]的具体描述，[p/]就只能另辟蹊径了。

original: The commander’s testimony was a lot vaguer this time.
translation: 这次指挥官的证言含糊其辞许多。

original: If you can PRESS his statements,[p/] you might be able to find new information that you can use against him.
translation: 如果你能<size=1.5em>追问</size>他的证言，[p/]也许就能找到可以利用的情报。

original: Tyrion: Are you saying that my client used a spell and channeled it through her sword?
translation: Tyrion:你是说我的委托人用法术在剑上附魔？

original: Aria: There are a vast number of spells that operate like that.
translation: Aria: 大部分法术都可以这样运作。

original: Aria: Spells from the school of [b]transmutation[/b] are almost always channeled through an object.
translation: Aria: [b]形变术[/b]类的法术几乎都需要物体媒介。

original: Tyrion: “[b]Mage Blade[/b]”?
translation: Tyrion: “[b]法术剑刃[/b]”？

original: Celeste: It’s a [b]transmutation[/b] spell that sharpens my sword.
translation: Celeste: 是种能够使剑刃锋利的[b]形变术[/b]类魔法。

original: Celeste: I usually use it when I need to cut through an enemy’s plate armor.
translation: Celeste: 我通常用它来砍穿敌人的装甲。

original: You didn’t realize that she led such a...[p/] lethal lifestyle.
translation: 没想到她的日常竟如此……[p/]激烈残酷。

original: Tyrion: B-[p/][s/]But anyways,[p/] wouldn’t it be excessive for the defendant to use a spell like that on the victim?
translation: Tyrion: 但、[p/][s/]但无论如何，[p/]被告用这种法术不是有点多此一举吗？

original: Tyrion: He wasn’t wearing [i]any[/i] kind of armor at the time of death.
translation: Tyrion: 死者当时没有穿着<u>任何</u>形式的防具。

original: Aria: The victim and the defendant were in an intense argument.
translation: Aria: 受害者和被告当时正激烈争吵。

original: Aria: Perhaps she used the spell in a fit of rage.[p/] It [i]was[/i] a crime of passion, after all.
translation: Aria: 可能只是一气之下使用了魔法。[p/]毕竟<u>这是</u>冲动杀人。

original: Ugh…[p/] That theory is a little far-fetched…
translation: 呃……[p/]这理论有点牵强了……

original: But you’ll need hard evidence if you want to disprove it.
translation: 但你需要决定性的证据才能反驳对方。

original: Tyrion: But why would she go to the trouble of doing that?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么要这么麻烦呢？

original: Tyrion: Her sword alone would have been enough to commit the murder.
translation: Tyrion: 她只用剑就足以置受害者于死地。

original: Orym: Mages are always looking for an excuse to throw their power around.
translation: Orym: 法师总在找借口肆意施展法术。

original: Orym: There’s no rhyme or reason to it.
translation: Orym: 这方面他们是不讲道理的。

original: Tyrion: Isn’t that just your own personal bias, commander?
translation: Tyrion: 那难道不是指挥官你的个人偏见吗？

original: Aria: We don’t need to understand why the defendant did what she did.
translation: Aria: 我们无需理解被告为什么选择这种作案手段。

original: Aria: The fact of the matter is that magic [i]was[/i] present at the crime.
translation: Aria: 重要的是魔法<u>出现</u>在了犯罪现场。

original: Aria: Do you have any evidence of the contrary?
translation: Aria: 你有反对这一点的证据吗？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You don't...[p/] yet.
translation: 暂时……还没有。

original: Tyrion: If she used a spell like that,[p/] wouldn’t that have created traces of magic on the ground?
translation: Tyrion: 如果她用了这种法术，[p/]那地上不也应该有魔法痕迹吗？

original: Judge: How so?
translation: Judge: 此话怎讲？

original: Tyrion: Well…[p/] Let’s say we follow the prosecution’s theory.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]我们假设检方的理论是正确的。

original: Tyrion: That would mean that the victim fell to the ground with the sword still inside him.
translation: Tyrion: 那就意味着死者倒下的时候剑一直插在他身上。

original: Tyrion: At this point,[p/] [b]Mage Blade[/b] would still be active, right?
translation: Tyrion: 这个过程中[b]法术剑刃[/b]仍在生效，对吧？

original: Tyrion: It would definitely leave a magical trace on the ground after making physical contact with it.
translation: Tyrion: 那么地板上绝对也会留下魔法痕迹。

original: Orym: We’re already way ahead of you.
translation: Orym: 这一点我们早就调查清楚了。

original: Orym: We had our people scan the crime scene.
translation: Orym: 我们的人用魔法扫描过犯罪现场。

original: Orym: And we found traces of [b]transmutation[/b] magic right under the body,[p/] just like you said.
translation: Orym: 如你所说，[p/]尸体下方存在[b]形变术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Tyrion: Oh…
translation: Tyrion: 哦……

original: Orym: If you still don’t believe me,[p/] I have a picture of the crime scene right here.
translation: Orym: 如果你不相信我，[p/]可以看这张犯罪现场的照片。

original: Aria: Oh?[p/] Why was this picture not brought to my attention?
translation: Aria: 哦？[p/]我怎么不知道有这张照片？

original: Orym: There was no need.
translation: Orym: 因为没必要。

original: Orym: This entire case is open and shut.
translation: Orym: 这案子清晰明了。

original: Tyrion: …
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You’ve seen pictures of the dead before.[p/] But it feels different now that the body is of someone you knew.
translation: 你见过许多尸体照片，[p/]但在上面看见认识的人还是五味杂陈。

original: Hm… Looks like there [i]are[/i] traces of magic on the ground…
translation: 嗯……看来地上确实<u>有</u>魔法痕迹……

original: But this shape is a little weird, isn’t it…?
translation: 但是痕迹的形状……是不是有点怪？

original: Aria: …
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: …!
translation: Aria: ……！

original: What was [i]that[/i] just now?
translation: 刚才她<u>这是</u>怎么了？

original: Right…[p/] This photo [i]does[/i] show that he was stabbed from the front.
translation: 确实……[p/]照片上看起来受害者<u>的确</u>是从正面遇刺。

original: But why do you feel like there’s something wrong with this picture?
translation: 但你为什么总觉得照片哪里怪怪的？

original: Hm…[p/] This would be a lot easier if you knew the parameters of [b]Mage Blade[/b].
translation: 唔……[p/]要是你知道[b]法术剑刃[/b]的具体参数就容易多了。

original: But perhaps you can get him to add statements or evidence to his testimony.
translation: 但或许你能让他向证言里补充一些证据或陈述。

original: The only thing that you can do now is PRESS his statements.
translation: 你现在能做的只有<size=1.5em>追问</size>他的证言。

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] It's clear that the witness's testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]证人的证言明显存在矛盾！

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] piece of evidence proves it!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这个</u>就是相关证据！

original: Judge: I fail to see how [i]that[/i] proves anything, Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生……我没看出来这两者有什么关系。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/] 好像是这样的。

original: Tyrion: I’m sorry, Commander White.
translation: Tyrion: 不好意思，怀特指挥官。

original: Tyrion: But it seems that you’ve presented [i]another[/i] glaring contradiction.
translation: Tyrion: 但你提出了<u>又一个</u>矛盾的地方。

original: Orym: Oh yeah?[p/] And what's that?
translation: Orym: 是吗？[p/]哪里矛盾了？

original: Tyrion: You said that my client stabbed the victim from the front?
translation: Tyrion: 你说我的委托人从正面刺杀了受害者？

original: Tyrion: Am I correct?
translation: Tyrion: 没问题吧？

original: Orym: Yeah,[p/] you can see it plain in that picture.
translation: Orym: 当然没问题，[p/]从照片上一眼就能看出来。

original: Orym: So, where’s your “contradiction”?
translation: Orym: 所以，你说的“矛盾”在哪儿呢？

original: Tyrion: That’s the thing, Commander.
translation: Tyrion: 就是这个问题，指挥官。

original: Tyrion: Your [i]picture[/i] clearly shows that the victim was stabbed from the front…
translation: Tyrion: 这张<u>照片</u>证实了受害者是从正面被刺……

original: Tyrion: But the [i]Autopsy Report[/i] says that he died from a stab from [i]behind[/i]!
translation: Tyrion: 但<u>尸检报告</u>证实死者死于<u>背后</u>的突刺！

original: Orym: What?!
translation: Orym: 什么？！

original: Aria: Orym![p/][s/] You were supposed to release [i]everything[/i] that you had!
translation: Aria: 奥蒙！[p/][s/]你本该向我报告你调查到的<u>所有</u>证据！

original: Aria: Why wasn’t this photo [i]given[/i] to me?!
translation: Aria: 为什么没有把这张照片<u>给我</u>？！

original: Orym: T-[p/][s/]There was no need!
translation: Orym: 因、[p/][s/]因为没有那个必要！

original: Orym: There’s no way it could have been anyone other than that damn mage!
translation: Orym: 只能是那个该死的法师干的！

original: Murmurs ring out across the gallery.
translation: 旁听席上一阵窃窃私语。

original: It didn't matter how corrupt the justice system was.
translation: 不管司法系统多么腐败。

original: They wouldn’t be able to cover up such [i]blatant[/i] incompetence.
translation: 他们也没法掩盖这么<u>明显</u>的失职。

original: You have them [i]right[/i] where you want them.
translation: 你<u>正好</u>抓住了他们的弱点。

original: Judge: Order![p/] Order in the court!
translation: Judge: 肃静！[p/]注意法庭秩序！

original: Judge: Mr. Cuthbert, what is the meaning of this?!
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生，这是怎么回事？！

original: Tyrion: I’ll tell you what the “meaning” behind this is, Your Honor!
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下，我来为您解释这是“怎么回事”！

original: Tyrion: As the Autopsy Report states,[p/][s/] the victim died from a stab wound originating from his back!
translation: Tyrion: 尸检报告写着，[p/][s/]死者死于从背后造成的刺伤！

original: Tyrion: But [i]this[/i] photo clearly shows that the sword entered from his front.
translation: Tyrion: 但<u>这张</u>照片里剑明显是从正面刺入的。

original: Tyrion: This can only mean one thing!
translation: Tyrion: 这只能意味着一件事！

original: Tyrion: The sword was inserted into the wound [i]after[/i] the fatal wound had already been created!
translation: Tyrion: 剑刺入伤口是在致命伤已经造成<u>之后</u>！

original: Orym: T-[p/][s/]That’s crazy![p/]
translation: Orym: 这、[p/][s/]这太荒谬了！[p/]

original: Orym: Do you honestly expect us to believe that?!
translation: Orym: 你真的认为我们会信这种事？！

original: Tyrion: Then please enlighten me, Commander White.
translation: Tyrion: 那请你教教我，怀特指挥官。

original: Tyrion: How [i]else[/i] would the sword be facing the opposite way?!
translation: Tyrion: <u>还有</u>什么理由能让剑朝向相反的方向？！

original: Tyrion: Do you think my client stabbed the victim with the hilt of her sword?!
translation: Tyrion: 难不成你认为我的委托人用剑柄刺杀了受害者？！

original: Orym: …
translation: Orym: ……

original: Tyrion: I didn't think so.
translation: Tyrion: 我觉得不可能。

original: Tyrion: What [i]really[/i] happened is clear.
translation: Tyrion: <u>真正</u>发生的事已然明了。

original: Tyrion: The [i]real[/i] murderer stuck the sword through the victim’s wound to implicate my client.
translation: Tyrion: <u>真凶</u>事后将剑刺入尸体来嫁祸我的委托人。

original: Tyrion: But they made a careless mistake and stuck the sword through the [i]opposite[/i] side!
translation: Tyrion: 但犯人粗心大意，<u>搞反了</u>刺入的方向！

original: Aria: Hm…[p/] It appears that I underestimated you, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 嗯……[p/]是我小看你了，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Aria: But you’ve still got ahead of yourself.
translation: Aria: 但你还是太着急下结论了。

original: Judge: Really, Ms. Steelwind?
translation: Judge: 真的吗，斯蒂尔文德女士？

original: Judge: I believe that Mr. Cuthbert has [i]adequately[/i] cast doubt on your case.
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生已经<u>充分</u>证明了本案的疑点。

original: Aria: Oh,[p/] did he now?[p/] Then let me ask [i]you[/i] one question, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 哦，[p/]真的吗？[p/]那我来问问<u>你</u>，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Aria: If your client didn’t kill Flinhart McCoy…[p/] then who did?
translation: Aria: 如果你的委托人不是凶手……[p/]那谁是？

original: Tyrion: …
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: How should I know?
translation: Tyrion: 我为什么会知道？

original: Tyrion: If I'm not mistaken,[p/] it's the [i]commander's[/i] job to figure that out.
translation: Tyrion: 如果我没搞错的话，[p/]这是指挥官奥蒙的工作。

original: Aria: Oh,[p/] I’m well aware of the commander’s [i]incompetence[/i].
translation: Aria: 唉，[p/]我深知指挥官的<u>失职</u>。

original: Aria: But one fact still stands.
translation: Aria: 但某个事实仍然存在。

original: Aria: There was magic detected on the wound and the sword.
translation: Aria: 剑与伤口上检测到了魔法的痕迹。

original: Aria: Would you like for me to tell you how many mages live in that small town?
translation: Aria: 需要我告诉你那个小镇里有多少法师吗？

original: You don't like where she's going with this.
translation: 你感觉走向不太妙。

original: Aria: Just one.
translation: Aria: 只有一个人。

original: Aria: There’s only [i]one[/i] registered mage in that entire town.
translation: Aria: 那整个镇子上只有<u>一个</u>注册在案的法师。

original: Aria: And that mage is your client!
translation: Aria: 而那个法师就是你的委托人！

original: Tyrion: What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么？！

original: Aria: The defendant was also established to have been with the victim [i]hours[/i] before his death.
translation: Aria: 有人看见受害者死前<u>几小时</u>还和被告在一起。

original: Aria: She was the last known person with him,[p/] [i]and[/i] she was the only mage there.
translation: Aria: 她是已知最后一个与受害者在一起的人，[p/]<u>也是</u>镇上唯一的法师。

original: Aria: In addition to that,[p/] I have several witnesses who heard them arguing.
translation: Aria: 不仅如此，[p/]我还有多名听见他们争吵的证人。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Aria: [i]How[/i] she murdered the victim is simply an unanswered question.
translation: Aria: 虽然我们不知道确切的<u>作案过程</u>。

original: Judge: Hm…[p/] I see.[p/] That certainly [i]does[/i] change matters.
translation: Judge: 嗯……[p/]我明白了。[p/]这样事态<u>确实</u>有所改变。

original: Judge: I can’t say that the prosecution’s evidence is irrefutable.
translation: Judge: 检方的证据并非不可辩驳。

original: Judge: …But there is still evidence that casts guilt upon the defendant.
translation: Judge: ……但仍有指向被告犯罪的证据。

original: Damn it![p/][s/] You almost had them!
translation: 可恶！[p/][s/]你差点就成功了！

original: Judge: There are far too many unanswered questions for me to pass a verdict.
translation: Judge: 太多未解之谜萦绕此案，因此我无法在此下达判决。

original: Judge: We will give law enforcement time to clear these unknowns.
translation: Judge: 我们将给予执法部门时间充分调查这些未解之谜。

original: Judge: ...I [i]suggest[/i] that they conduct their investigation more thoroughly this time.
translation: Judge: ……我<u>建议</u>检方这次调查更彻底一些。

original: Orym: ...
translation: Orym: ……

original: Judge: We will resume the trial tomorrow morning.
translation: Judge: 庭审将在明天上午继续。

original: Judge: Court is adjourned.
translation: Judge: 休庭。

original: Ruby: Hello, Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: 你好，卡斯伯特。

original: As you walk out of the courtroom with Celeste,[p/] you are greeted by Ms. Tymora.
translation: 你和塞莱斯特一走出法庭，[p/]泰摩拉女士便走了上来。

original: Tyrion: M-[p/][s/]Ms. Tymora?![p/] You’re…[p/][s/] here?!
translation: Tyrion: 泰、[p/][s/]泰摩拉女士？！[p/] 你在……[p/][s/]旁听？！

original: You recall how you froze up during the first cross-examination.
translation: 你想起了自己第一次交叉询问时的窘相。

original: You feel a little ashamed that your [i]mentor[/i] saw all of that.
translation: 让<u>导师</u>看到那副不成器的样子有点不太好受。

original: Ruby: …
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: Well…[p/] At the end of the day,[p/] you [i]were[/i] able to pull it together.
translation: Ruby: 哎呀……[p/]不管怎么样，[p/]你还是<u>能够</u>重振精神。

original: Ruby: And once you did that,[p/] you performed...[p/] adequately.
translation: Ruby: 这之后，[p/]你的表现……[p/]足够好。

original: Ruby: On that note,[p/] I wanted to give you this.
translation: Ruby: 说到这里，[p/]我有个东西要给你。

original: Celeste: My [b]Spell Compendium[/b]?
translation: Celeste: 这不是我的[b]法术汇编[/b]吗？！

original: Ruby: I swiped it from the dining area before the Inquisition arrived.
translation: Ruby: 这是我在裁判所到达之前，在就餐区捡到的。

original: Ruby: I thought it'd be best for you to have it.
translation: Ruby: 我觉得你拿着比较好。

original: Tyrion: So…[p/] this is your [b]Spell Compendium[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]这就是你的[b]法术汇编[/b]。

original: Tyrion: And it only has one spell.
translation: Tyrion: 只有一个法术。

original: Celeste: [b]Mage Blade[/b]...
translation: Celeste: [b]法术剑刃[/b]……

original: Tyrion: This means that the prosecution has to prove that Celeste used that specific spell.
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说检方必须证明当时塞莱斯特使用了这个法术。

original: Ruby: It will restrict how they approach this case,[p/] which gives you an edge over them.
translation: Ruby: 这能限制他们处理这个案子的方式，[p/]也给了你一个优势。

original: Ruby: …But that prosecutor is really something else.
translation: Ruby: ……但那位检察官真不是一般人。

original: Tyrion: You mean Prosecutor Steelwind?
translation: Tyrion: 你是说斯蒂尔文德检察官？

original: You can still remember her ripping glare…
translation: 你仍记得她如剑一般的眼神……

original: It gives you chills just thinking about it.
translation: 想想都后怕。

original: Ruby: You wouldn’t even know it,[p/] but this was [i]also[/i] her first trial.
translation: Ruby: 你肯定看不出来，[p/]但她<u>也是</u>第一次出庭。

original: Celeste: Really?!
translation: Celeste: 真的假的？！

original: Ruby: I’d thought that her inexperience would make for a good first opponent.
translation: Ruby: 我本以为缺乏经验的她当第一个对手刚好。

original: Ruby: But that girl…[p/] she’s a natural in the courtroom.
translation: Ruby: 但现在看来……[p/]她天生就是上法庭的料。

original: Ruby: It makes me wonder why a [i]Steelwind[/i] would choose to become an attorney in the first place.
translation: Ruby: 但我不知道为什么<u>斯蒂尔文德家</u>的人会选择当一名检察官。

original: Celeste: What do you mean?
translation: Celeste: 这是什么意思？

original: Ruby: The Steelwinds are a powerful noble house.
translation: Ruby: 斯蒂尔文德是个强大的贵族家族。

original: Ruby: Of the noble families,[p/] they are one of the few who answer directly to the king.
translation: Ruby: 一众贵族之中，[p/]斯蒂尔文德家是少数直接听命于国王的贵族之一。

original: Ruby: Most members of their house take high-ranking positions in the kingdom’s military.
translation: Ruby: 斯蒂尔文德家族的多数成员都在王国军队身居高位。

original: Ruby: So, it’s a bit strange that she chose to become a prosecutor despite that.
translation: Ruby: 所以她选择当检察官就有点奇怪了。

original: Tyrion: “Steelwind”…
translation: Tyrion: “斯蒂尔文德”……

original: Tyrion: I feel like I've heard it somewhere before.
translation: Tyrion: 感觉我以前在哪儿听说过。

original: Ruby: In any case,[p/] it’s best that you focus on the trial.
translation: Ruby: 无论如何，[p/]你最好还是专注于准备审理。

original: Ruby: You have about a day until court resumes.
translation: Ruby: 离下次庭审还有一天的时间。

original: Tyrion: Right.[p/] Now that I have time,[p/] I'd like to ask you some questions, Celeste.
translation: Tyrion: 对。[p/]既然现在有时间了，[p/]我想问你些问题，塞莱斯特。

original: Tyrion: …Namely about that argument you had with your father.
translation: Tyrion: ……我想问问当晚你们在吵些什么。

original: Celeste: O-[p/]Oh…
translation: Celeste: 噢、[p/]噢……

original: You see the bailiff starring daggers at Celeste.
translation: 你看到法警死死盯着塞莱斯特。

original: It looks like they’re waiting to take her back to her cell.
translation: 看起来他们正等着把她押运回牢房。

original: Whatever questions you have for her will have to wait.
translation: 无论你想问什么，看来都得等等再说了。

original: Celeste: I-[p/]I should probably go...
translation: Celeste: 我、[p/]我得走了……

original: Celeste walks away while avoiding eye contact with you.
translation: 塞莱斯特低着头离开了。

original: …Bringing up her argument with Flinhart [i]may[/i] have struck a nerve.
translation: ……提及她和弗林哈特的争执<u>可能</u>让她不太好受。

original: Tyrion: I’ll also use this opportunity to investigate the crime scene.
translation: Tyrion: 机会难得，我也会仔细调查犯罪现场。

original: Tyrion: I wouldn’t be surprised if the Inquisition missed something.
translation: Tyrion: 保不准会有什么裁判所没发现的线索。

original: Ruby: You utterly embarrassed them today.
translation: Ruby: 你今天让他们很难堪。

original: Ruby: Don’t expect them to make the same mistake twice.
translation: Ruby: 不要觉得他们会犯相同的错误。

original: Tyrion: Right.[p/] There are still a lot of things we don’t know about.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯，[p/]但是这案子还有很多我们不了解的地方。

original: Ruby: As much as I hate to admit it,[p/] your skills of deduction far surpass mine.
translation: Ruby: 虽然不想承认，[p/]但是你的推理能力远超于我。

original: Ruby: If anyone can figure out what really happened that night,[p/] it’s you.
translation: Ruby: 只有你能弄清楚那晚到底发生了什么事，[p/]卡斯伯特。

original: Tyrion: A courtroom…[p/] I’m in a real courtroom.
translation: Tyrion: 这是法庭……[p/]我真的在法庭里。

original: ...Actually [i]entering[/i] the courtroom has taken a lot of wind out of your sails.
translation: ……其实<u>进入</u>法庭就已经让你消耗了不少能量。

original: You’ve never been here as an attorney before.
translation: 你从未以律师的身份进过法庭。

original: You've only ever acted as Ms. Tymora's assistant.
translation: 以前都是以泰摩拉女士助手的身份参加庭审。

original: Aria: …
translation: Aria: ……

original: The woman at the prosecutor’s bench is staring at you.
translation: 检察官席位的女性正盯着你。

original: Ms. Tymora mentioned her before you went to see Celeste.
translation: 去见塞莱斯特之前，泰摩拉女士和你提起过她。

original: What was her name again?[p/] You think it was "Aria Steelwind".
translation: 她叫什么来着？[p/]好像是叫“阿莉亚·斯蒂尔文德”。

original: You can feel the coldness of her glare burrowing into you.
translation: 她冰冷的视线直击你的内心深处。

original: Why is she staring you down?[p/] Is she trying to intimidate you?
translation: 干嘛这样盯着你？难不成想震慑你？

original: …Because it’s working!
translation: ……效果拔群！

original: Judge: Court is now in session for the trial of Celeste McCoy.
translation: Judge: 法庭现在开庭，审理塞莱斯特·麦考伊案。

original: Aria: The prosecution is ready, Your Honor.
translation: Aria: 检方已准备就绪，法官阁下。

original: Tyrion: …Oh,[p/] uh.
translation: Tyrion: ……噢、[p/]呃。

original: Tyrion: T-[p/]The defense is also ready, Your Honor.
translation: Tyrion: 辩、[p/]辩方也准备好了，法官阁下。

original: Aria: ...He doesn't necessarily [i]sound[/i] very ready.
translation: Aria: ……他<u>听起来</u>不像是准备好了。

original: Judge: ...Regardless,[p/] let’s begin the proceedings.
translation: Judge: ……总之，[p/]让我们继续吧。

original: Judge: Prosecutor Steelwind,[p/] please list the charges.
translation: Judge: 斯蒂尔文德检察官，[p/]请列出指控。

original: Aria: The defendant is Celeste McCoy:[p/] a mercenary for hire and a registered mage.
translation: Aria: 被告名叫塞莱斯特·麦考伊，[p/]注册在案的法师，[p/]工作是雇佣兵。

original: Tyrion: Wait…[p/][s/] Did she just say “mercenary”?!
translation: Tyrion: 等等，[p/][s/]她刚说“雇佣兵”？！

original: Celeste: Yeah…[p/] I had to take up a job after my family’s tavern was shut down.
translation: Celeste: 是啊……[p/]在酒馆停业后我必须得找工作来补贴家用。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh,[p/] right…
translation: Tyrion: 噢、噢……[p/]好的……

original: That’s not exactly the [i]first[/i] occupation you’d choose...
translation: 对你而言那可不是补贴家用的<u>首选</u>工作……

original: Aria: She’s charged with second-degree murder and negligent misuse of the Arcane Arts.
translation: Aria: 她被指控二级谋杀罪以及过失使用奥术。

original: Judge: I see...[p/] So there was [i]magic[/i] involved.
translation: Judge: 我明白了……[p/]所以此案有<u>魔法</u>涉及其中。

original: Aria: Yes.[p/] The crime occurred within the McCoy tavern:[p/] a local inn that shut down years ago.
translation: Aria: 是的，[p/]案件发生在麦考伊酒馆：[p/]这是一个当地已停业多年的酒馆。

original: Aria: The locals reported hearing a loud commotion coming from within the building.
translation: Aria: 当地居民报告说，案发当晚听到酒馆内传来一阵很响的骚动。

original: Aria: Hours later,[p/] a carriage driver that was nearby checked the disturbance.
translation: Aria: 几小时后，[p/]一位附近的马车司机调查了骚动来源。

original: Aria: It was then that he found the victim,[p/] the defendant’s sword [i]still[/i] impaling his dead body.
translation: Aria: 就在那时他发现了受害者，[p/]被告的剑<u>仍</u>插在受害者的尸体上。

original: Aria: The Inquisition has provided an autopsy report and a record of the sword.
translation: Aria: 裁判所提供了一份尸检报告和这把剑的检查报告。

original: Judge: What was the defendant’s relationship with the victim?
translation: Judge: 被告与受害者是什么关系？

original: Judge: I see that they share the same last name.
translation: Judge: 我看到他们同姓。

original: Aria: The defendant is the victim’s daughter,[p/] but not by blood.
translation: Aria: 被告是受害者的女儿，[p/]但没有血缘关系。

original: Aria: She was adopted into the family when she was an infant.[p/] Her birth parents are currently unknown.
translation: Aria: 她在襁褓时便被麦考伊家收养，[p/]她的亲生父母目前未知。

original: Judge: I see…[p/] What a unfortunate turn of events…
translation: Judge: 我明白了……[p/]多么不幸……

original: Aria: To begin,[p/] the prosecution would like to call Commander Orym White to the stand.
translation: Aria: 首先，[p/]检方希望传唤指挥官奥蒙·怀特出庭作证。

original: Aria: Witness,[p/] please state your name and occupation for the court.
translation: Aria: 证人，[p/]请向法庭陈述你的姓名与职业。

original: Orym: Name’s Orym White.[p/] I’m Commander of the Arcane Inquisition.
translation: Orym: 我叫奥蒙·怀特，[p/]是奥术裁判所的指挥官。

original: Aria: Orym,[p/] could you please testify about the details of the Inquisition's investigation?
translation: Aria: 奥蒙，[p/]能请你就裁判所调查所得的细节作证吗？

original: Orym: Yeah... yeah...
translation: Orym: 行……好……

original: Orym: We got a call late at night.[p/] Someone discovered a dead body inside the McCoy Tavern.
translation: Orym: 我们深夜时分接到报警。[p/]有人在麦考伊酒馆内发现了一具尸体。

original: Orym: When we arrived on the scene,[p/] we found Flinhart McCoy dead on the floor.[p/] The defendant’s sword was still inside of him.
translation: Orym: 当我们赶到现场时，[p/]我们发现了地板上已经死亡的弗林哈特·麦考伊。[p/]被告的剑仍插在受害者的身上。

original: Orym: We have several witnesses who heard the victim and defendant in a loud argument before the body was discovered.
translation: Orym: 尸体被发现之前，有几个证人听到了受害者与被告的激烈争吵。

original: Orym: Their argument must have turned ugly.[p/] Because the defendant killed the victim using her magic sword.
translation: Orym: 他们的争吵十分激烈，以至于被告用她的魔法剑杀害了受害者。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Isn’t that really incriminating?!
translation: 这也太可疑了吧？！

original: One of her possessions is the murder weapon!
translation: 她的随身物品之一就是凶器！

original: Judge: Mr. Cuthbert,[p/] you may begin your cross-examination.
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生，[p/]你可以开始交叉询问了。

original: Tyrion: U-[p/]Uh...
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]嗯……

original: You open your mouth to respond.[p/] But nothing comes out.
translation: 你试着开口说点什么，[p/]但发不出声音。

original: You can't think of anything to say.[p/] Everything is blank.
translation: 你都不知道该说什么好，[p/]大脑一片空白。

original: Judge: …Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Judge: ……卡斯伯特先生？

original: Celeste: Hey![p/][s/] What are you doing?!
translation: Celeste: 嘿！[p/][s/]你在干什么？！

original: Celeste: This is the part where you say something, right?!
translation: Celeste: 这不是你该说点什么的环节嘛？！

original: Tyrion: I-[p/]I…[p/] I’m sorry,[p/] I don’t-!
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/]抱歉，[p/]我不是——！

original: Your anxiety is just getting worse.[p/] And your breaths are becoming more and more desperate.
translation: 你的焦虑愈演愈烈，[p/]呼吸也越来越急促。

original: Are you hyperventilating?
translation: 你是出现了过度换气综合征？

original: Aria: *sigh*[p/] What a disappointment…
translation: Aria: *叹气* [p/]真让人失望……

original: Tyrion: ...!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: Aria: I was hoping to fight against the infamous Ruby Tymora, today.
translation: Aria: 我本想今天与臭名昭著的鲁比·泰摩拉对阵。

original: Aria: But it’s clear you can’t even hold a candle to her.
translation: Aria: 但你显然根本比不上她。

original: Aria: Your Honor.[p/] It’s clear that the defense has nothing to say against the prosecution’s overwhelming evidence.
translation: Aria: 法官阁下，[p/]很显然辩方在检方决定性的证据下无话可说。

original: Orym: Yep.[p/] This case is pretty open and shut.
translation: Orym: 对的，[p/]此案清晰明了。

original: Tyrion: N-[p/][s/]No![p/][s/] Wait!
translation: Tyrion: 不、[p/][s/]不！[p/][s/]等下！

original: This...[p/][s/] This isn't what's supposed to happen!
translation: 不……[p/][s/]不应该是这样的！

original: Ruby: …
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: I-[p/]I’m sorry, Tyrion.
translation: Ruby: 抱、[p/]抱歉，提利昂。

original: Ruby: I…[p/] I couldn’t acquit Frey…
translation: Ruby: 我……[p/]我没能证明芙雷无罪……

original: Ruby: She was found guilty.
translation: Ruby: 她被认定有罪。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What..?![p/] B-[p/]But...[p/] that means...
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么……？！[p/]但、[p/]但……[p/]那就是说……

original: Tyrion: Are they going to execute her?!
translation: Tyrion: 他们要处决她吗？！

original: No... [p/]Not again...
translation: 不……[p/]不要又一次……

original: Are you seriously going to let that happen again?!
translation: 真的要眼睁睁看着那件事重演吗？！

original: Celeste: …
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Tyrion!
translation: Celeste: 提利昂！

original: Celeste grabs your shoulders and shakes you out of your panic.
translation: 塞莱斯特猛地晃了晃你，把你从惊慌中拉回现实。

original: Celeste: You need to calm down.
translation: Celeste: 你得冷静。

original: Her gaze is calm and focused despite the gravity of the situation.[p/] But she looks stern,[p/] not angry.
translation: 虽然身处险境，但她的目光沉着专注。[p/]她看起来并不生气，[p/]只是面色凝重。

original: Tyrion: I-[p/]I’m sorry…[p/] I didn’t mean for this to-
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/]抱歉……[p/]我不是故意……

original: Celeste: Stop.[p/][s/] Just listen to me.
translation: Celeste: 停。[p/][s/]听我说。

original: Celeste: You know what to do.[p/] ...Right?
translation: Celeste: 你知道该怎么做……[p/]对吧？

original: Celeste: Uh…
translation: Celeste: 呃……

original: Celeste: Just…[p/][s/] [i]do[/i] it the same way you play chess!
translation: Celeste: 就……[p/][s/]就当你是在下棋！

original: Tyrion: …What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Celeste: I don't know![p/][s/] You were just so calm and focused when we were playing [i]before[/i]!
translation: Celeste: 我也不知道！[p/][s/]你<u>之前</u>与我下棋的时候既专注又冷静！

original: Celeste: No matter how close I got to beating you,[p/] you always knew how to stay calm and win.
translation: Celeste: 当时无论我有多大优势，[p/]你都能保持冷静并赢回来。

original: Celeste: So just…[p/] channel that feeling and look at the...[p/] pieces?
translation: Celeste: 所以你就……[p/]用下棋时的心态……[p/]应对庭审？

original: That doesn't make any sense...[p/] And yet...
translation: 虽然她说得不明不白……[p/]但是……

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You take a moment to focus and let everything else disappear from the world.
translation: 你花了些时间集中注意力，忘记世界上其他所有东西。

original: Every statement that he made…[p/] Every word that came out of his mouth…
translation: 他的每一条论述……[p/]他口中说出的每一个字……

original: Each of those is a possible weakness that you can attack.
translation: 这些都有可能是你可以攻击的弱点。

original: Every bleak moment can be turned around.[p/] You just need to consider every angle.
translation: 任何逆境都可以被扭转，[p/]你不过是需要考虑所有角度。

original: Tyrion: …
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: My apologies for the delay, Your Honor.[p/] The defense is ready to begin cross-examining the witness.
translation: Tyrion: 很抱歉耽搁了宝贵的时间，法官阁下。[p/]辩方已经准备好交叉询问证人了。

original: Judge: ...Very well.
translation: Judge: ……非常好。

original: Aria: Hmph...
translation: Aria: 哼……

original: Celeste: There we go. [mind="Thank god that worked..."/]
translation: Celeste: 这就对了。 [mind="感谢上天，还好有用……"/]

original: Carefully examine every statement he made and find something that contradicts the evidence in your NOTES.
translation: 仔细审查他的每一句证词，从中找出与你<size=1.5em>笔记</size>中证据相悖的证言。

original: Once you do that,[p/] PRESENT the contradicting evidence and prove that his testimony is false!
translation: 然后<size=1.5em>出示</size>与其冲突的证据，证明其中错误！

original: Tyrion: At what time exactly did you get this call?[p/] And who discovered the body?
translation: Tyrion: 你具体是在什么时间接到报案的？[p/]是谁发现了尸体？

original: Orym: The call came in at 1:25 AM.
translation: Orym: 凌晨 1:25 接到报案。

original: Orym: As for the witness who discovered it…[p/] He wanted to remain incognito.
translation: Orym: 至于发现尸体的人……[p/]他想要保持匿名。

original: Hm…[p/] It’s not unusual for a witness to stay anonymous.[p/] It’s well within their right.
translation: 嗯……[p/]证人想要匿名不是件稀奇的事，[p/]他们有这个权利。

original: But this would be a lot easier if you could question the witness directly.
translation: 但要是能直接问目击者就容易多了。

original: Aria: What happened when you arrived, Commander?
translation: Aria: 指挥官，当你赶到现场时发生了什么？

original: Tyrion: How did you know that the sword was my client’s?
translation: Tyrion: 你怎么知道那把剑属于我的委托人？

original: Orym: Her sword is made out of some kind of special alloy.
translation: Orym: 她的剑使用了某种特别的合金。

original: Orym: I think it was forged out of the country or something.
translation: Orym: 我觉得是在国外铸造的。

original: Orym: It’d be hard to mistake something like that.
translation: Orym: 那把剑可不容易弄混。

original: Aria: We also have several eyewitnesses who verified that the sword belonged to the defendant.
translation: Aria: 我们也有几位目击证人能证明那把剑是被告的。

original: Aria: She made no effort to hide it from the public.
translation: Aria: 她没有刻意隐瞒这件事。

original: Aria: Quite the contrary,[p/] she was quite [i]proud[/i] to show it off.
translation: Aria: 与此相反，[p/]她很乐意把剑秀出来。

original: Tyrion: But even [i]if[/i] the sword belongs to my client,[p/] that [i]doesn’t[/i] necessarily mean that she was the one who stabbed him.
translation: Tyrion: <u>即使</u>这把剑属于我的委托人，[p/]也<u>不等于</u>她是杀人凶手。

original: Orym: Yeah, well…
translation: Orym: 嗯，这个嘛……

original: Tyrion: How did they know it was my client and the victim that were arguing?
translation: Tyrion: 他们怎么知道当晚是我的委托人和受害者在争吵？

original: Orym: You were there, weren’t you?[p/] You had to have heard them too.
translation: Orym: 你当晚也在那不是吗？[p/]你肯定听到他们吵架了。

original: Orym: Every witness we talked to knew it was them.
translation: Orym: 每个证人都说是他们在吵架。

original: Tyrion: U-[p/]Uh…[p/] well-
translation: Tyrion: 呃、[p/]呃……[p/]这个——

original: Aria: Your honor,[p/] it’s clear that the defense is playing devil’s advocate.
translation: Aria: 法官阁下，[p/]很明显辩方在装疯卖傻。

original: Aria: Even [i]he[/i] should have recognized their voices.
translation: Aria: 就连<u>他</u>都能分辨出他们的声音。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Well,[p/] they've got you there.
translation: 哎，[p/]被他们得逞了。

original: Tyrion: That’s conjecture!
translation: Tyrion: 那只是你的猜想！

original: Tyrion: Weren’t there plenty of people around who could have committed the crime?!
translation: Tyrion: 当时现场附近有很多可以犯罪的人不是吗？！

original: Orym: That tavern has been closed for years.
translation: Orym: 那酒馆已经停业好几年了。

original: Orym: The defendant, the victim, and Ruby Tymora were the only ones there before the body was discovered.
translation: Orym: 尸体被发现之前，就只有被告、受害者和泰摩拉女士在现场。

original: Orym: Plus,[p/] the murder weapon [i]definitely[/i] belonged to her.
translation: Orym: 而且，[p/]凶器<u>肯定</u>是被告的所有物

original: Well, it’s a given that Ms. Tymora didn’t do this. And it’ll be hard to prove that someone [i]else[/i] was at the crime scene…
translation: 哎，泰摩拉女士肯定不是凶手。也很难证明当时有<u>其他人</u>在现场……

original: But you can't help but feel that there’s something off about what he just said.
translation: 但你就是觉得他说的有什么地方怪怪的，

original: You shouldn’t have panicked so much before.
translation: 你之前不该自己吓自己的。

original: His testimony [i]is[/i] straightforward…[p/] but that will actually make this easier.
translation: 他的证言直截了当……[p/]反而让询问更容易了。

original: Assuming that Ms. McCoy is innocent,[p/] there has to be a flaw in his logic.
translation: 假设麦考伊女士是无辜的，[p/]他的发言里一定有什么逻辑缺陷。

original: You just need to compare every statement to each piece of evidence in your NOTES.
translation: 你需要将你<size=1.5em>笔记</size>里所有的证据与他的发言一一比对。

original: Once you find a contradiction,[p/] PRESENT that piece of evidence to the contradicting statement.
translation: 一旦你找到与证据相悖的发言，[p/]<size=1.5em>出示</size>相关证据来反驳他的证言。

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] It's clear that the witness's testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]证人的证言明显存在矛盾！

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] piece of evidence proves it!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这个</u>就是相关证据！

original: Judge: I fail to see how [i]that[/i] proves anything, Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生……我没看出来这两者有什么关系。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/] 好像是这样的。

original: Alright…[p/] It’s time.
translation: 好了……[p/]是时候了。

original: Ruby: Hello, Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: 卡斯伯特，你好。

original: Tyrion: Oh.[p/] Hi, Ms. Tymora.
translation: Tyrion: 哦。[p/]你好，泰摩拉女士。

original: Ruby: …
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: You’re a lot less jumpy than you were yesterday.
translation: Ruby: 你看起来没有昨天那么手忙脚乱了。

original: Ruby: I’m glad to see that you’re finally getting used to things.
translation: Ruby: 看来你已经渐渐习惯法庭上的针锋相对。

original: Ruby: So,[p/] what did you find in your investigation?
translation: Ruby: 你调查到什么东西了吗？

original: You tell Ms. Tymora about everything you’ve learned over your investigation.
translation: 你向泰摩拉女士讲述你调查到的一切细节。

original: Ruby: Hm…[p/] There aren’t a lot of clues that point to what [i]actually[/i] happened.
translation: Ruby: 嗯……[p/]没什么线索能解释<u>真正</u>发生的事。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] I know a lot of details about the crime scene,[p/] but nothing about the crime itself.
translation: Tyrion: 是啊……[p/]我了解很多关于现场的细节，[p/]但是对于作案过程一无所知。

original: Tyrion: This means I’ll have to rely solely on pointing out contradictions in the witness’s testimonies.
translation: Tyrion: 意味着我只能依靠指出证人证言中的矛盾这一策略。

original: Ruby: Being reactive to the prosecution's moves [i]is[/i] a valid strategy.
translation: Ruby: 被动回应检方的举措也<u>是</u>正常的策略。

original: Ruby: Honestly,[p/] I think it was a miracle that you got the commander to cooperate with you at all.
translation: Ruby: 不过说实话，[p/]能让怀特指挥官配合你的调查还是很厉害的。

original: Right…[p/] You almost forgot…
translation: 对……[p/]差点都忘了这事了……

original: Commander White appears to really have it out for Ms. Tymora.
translation: 怀特指挥官对泰摩拉女士有很大的意见。

original: Tyrion: …
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: Actually…[p/] I wanted to ask about that.
translation: Tyrion: 其实……[p/]我有点事想问问你。

original: Tyrion: Did something happen between you and Commander White?
translation: Tyrion: 你之前和怀特指挥官之间发生过什么事吗？

original: Ruby: …
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Bailiff: Ms. McCoy.[p/] Please proceed to the courtroom with your counsel.
translation: Bailiff: 麦考伊女士。[p/]请与您的律师一同前往法庭。

original: Celeste: Let’s go, Tyrion.
translation: Celeste: 我们走吧，提利昂。

original: Celeste: The trial’s about to start.
translation: Celeste: 马上要开庭了。

original: Ruby: …You should go.
translation: Ruby: ……你确实该动身了。

original: Ruby: The judge is waiting.
translation: Ruby: 法官正在等待。

original: Tyrion: R-[p/]Right…
translation: Tyrion: 对-[p/]对哦……

original: Another secret is left buried between you two.
translation: 你们两个之间又多了一个秘密。

original: Judge: Court is now resumed for the trial of Celeste McCoy.
translation: Judge: 法庭现在开庭，就塞莱斯特·麦考伊一案继续审理。

original: Judge: Let us review the proceedings from yesterday.
translation: Judge: 我们先就昨日的诉讼情况进行回顾。

original: Judge: Yesterday,[p/] the defense presented some shocking oversights made during the investigation.
translation: Judge: 昨天，[p/]辩护人指出案件调查过程中发生了非常严重的疏忽。

original: Aria: Yes.[p/] I personally saw to it that the investigation was conducted [i]properly[/i] this time.
translation: Aria: 没错。[p/]因此这次我也参与调查，确保<u>妥善</u>实施。

original: Judge: I…[p/] see.
translation: Judge: 我……[p/]明白了。

original: Judge: I suppose that puts my mind at ease.
translation: Judge: 这样我就放心了。

original: Aria: At yesterday’s trial,[p/] we found an inconsistency between the crime scene photo and the Autopsy Report.
translation: Aria: 在昨天的审判中，[p/]我们发现犯罪现场的照片与尸检报告有一处矛盾。

original: Aria: Because of this,[p/] the defense tried to push the following narrative:
translation: Aria: 因此，[p/]辩护人试图如此推论：

original: Aria: That a third party [i]must[/i] have interfered with the crime scene to frame the defendant.
translation: Aria: 即，<u>一定</u>有第三者对犯罪现场动了手脚，借此嫁祸被告。

original: Aria: However,[p/] the prosecution has discovered another explanation.
translation: Aria: 然而，[p/]检方已发现了另一种解释。

original: Aria: Because of that,[p/] the individual who discovered the body would like to testify as to what he saw that night.
translation: Aria: 因此，[p/]尸体的发现者将就他当晚所见作证。

original: Aria: His eyewitness account will clear up what actually happened.
translation: Aria: 他的目击证言将澄清事情的真相。

original: Judge: Interesting.[p/] It was my understanding that the individual in question wanted to remain anonymous.
translation: Judge: 有意思。[p/]就我所知这位目击证人本来是想保持匿名的。

original: Aria: Supposedly,[p/] this witness was within the gallery of the trial yesterday.
translation: Aria: 据说，[p/]证人其实昨天就在旁听席听审。

original: Aria: After yesterday’s proceedings,[p/] he felt that he couldn’t stay silent any longer.
translation: Aria: 昨天的审理之后，[p/]他认为自己不可以继续保持沉默。

original: So, [i]that’s[/i] her plan...
translation: 所以，[i]这就是[/i]她的计划……

original: But why would the witness change his mind like that?
translation: 但为什么目击证人会改变想法呢？

original: Did Steelwind persuade him?[p/] …Or is something else happening here?
translation: 是斯蒂尔文德说服了他？[p/]……还是发生了别的事？

original: Judge: Very well.
translation: Judge: 很好。

original: Judge: Let’s hear from this witness.
translation: Judge: 让我们听听这位证人怎么说。

original: Judge: Witness, please state your name and occupation for the court.
translation: Judge: 证人，请向法庭陈述你的姓名与职业。

original: Rhys: My name is Rhys Reginald Rudolf.
translation: Rhys: 我的名字是瑞斯·雷吉纳德·鲁道夫。

original: Rhys: I am a chauffeur of the equine variety.
translation: Rhys: 我是一名马匹御人。

original: Judge: I’m terribly sorry…
translation: Judge: 我很抱歉……

original: Judge: But I’m unfamiliar with that…[p/] profession.
translation: Judge: 但我确实不是很熟悉这个……[p/]职业。

original: Aria: He [i]means[/i] to say that he’s a carriage driver.
translation: Aria: 他[i]意思是[/i]说他是一名马车司机。

original: Judge: O-[p/]Oh…[p/] I see.
translation: Judge: 噢、[p/]哦……[p/]明白了。

original: Judge: But in any case,[p/] it is my understanding that you found the body.
translation: Judge: 但不管怎么说，[p/]就我所知是你发现了尸体。

original: Judge: Am I correct, Mr. Rudolf?
translation: Judge: 是这样吗？鲁道夫先生？

original: Rhys: ...
translation: Rhys: ...…

original: Rudolf appears to be writing something in a notebook.
translation: 鲁道夫看起来像是在笔记本上写着什么。

original: He writes with incredible speed.
translation: 他的笔速惊人。

original: His pen only touches the paper for maybe a second before he’s filled an entire page.
translation: 一瞬之间就写满了一整页。

original: Judge: …Mr. Rudolf?
translation: Judge: ……鲁道夫先生？

original: Rhys: Ah…[p/] Forgive me.
translation: Rhys: 啊……[p/]请原谅。

original: Rhys: I was merely taking notes on the people in this room.
translation: Rhys: 我只是在记录法庭上的人。

original: Judge: “Taking notes”?
translation: Judge: “记录”？

original: Aria: The witness has a certain compulsion to keep a record of every event that he witnesses.
translation: Aria: 证人习惯记录下他看到的所有人和事。

original: Judge: I…[p/] see.
translation: Judge: 我……[p/]明白了。

original: Judge: Then I assume we will receive an accurate testimony of how you found the body?
translation: Judge: 就是说他关于发现尸体的证言会极其准确，对吧？

original: Rhys: Actually,[p/] I witnessed much more than that.
translation: Rhys: 当然，[p/]我不仅仅是发现了尸体。

original: Rhys: I saw the crime as it was being committed.
translation: Rhys: 我目睹了整个犯罪过程。

original: Rhys: And I wrote down everything that I saw.
translation: Rhys: 并且我把所有看到的事都记下来了。

original: Tyrion: What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么？！

original: Judge: That is quite the claim!
translation: Judge: 这可是很重要的事！

original: Judge: If that’s true,[p/] why did you choose to remain silent until now?
translation: Judge: 如果你所言非虚，[p/]为何现在才来作证？

original: Aria: We had initially concluded that the evidence alone was decisive enough.
translation: Aria: 我们本以为现有证据足以定罪。

original: Aria: Therefore,[p/] we saw no need at the time for his testimony.
translation: Aria: 因此，[p/]当时并不需要他的证词。

original: Aria: …However,[p/] those circumstances clearly changed during yesterday's trial.
translation: Aria: ……然而，[p/]昨天的庭审导致情况改变。

original: There’s no way the prosecution [i]wouldn’t[/i] leverage eyewitness testimony from the start…
translation: 检方<u>不可能</u>一开始就放着这么有利的证人不用……

original: Something else is happening here.
translation: 一定有鬼。

original: Judge: Very well.
translation: Judge: 很好。

original: Judge: Mr. Rudolf,[p/] please testify to the court about what you saw that night.
translation: Judge: 鲁道夫先生，[p/]请向法庭就那晚你的所见所闻作证。

original: Rhys: I was transporting a client in my carriage that evening.
translation: Rhys: 那晚我正载着一位客人。

original: Rhys: We were driving by the McCoy Tavern when we heard a disturbance.[p/] This occurred at 1:28 am.
translation: Rhys: 我们路过麦考伊的酒馆时听到了一阵骚乱，[p/]当时是凌晨 1:28。

original: Rhys: Worried that something was amiss,[p/] I walked into the establishment to see what the commotion was about.
translation: Rhys: 由于担心会出什么事，[p/]我走进了酒馆一探究竟。

original: Rhys: There I saw the defendant.[p/] She was lit by the blue glow of the dining room lights.[p/][s/] She had stabbed Flinhart McCoy and was channeling magic into her sword!
translation: Rhys: 就在那时我看见了被告。[p/]餐厅里蔚蓝的微光照亮了她的身影。[p/][s/]她当时正用自己附魔的剑刺向受害者！

original: Rhys: She removed her sword from Flinhart’s back,[p/] and as he slowly turned to face her,[p/][s/] she stabbed him again in the front!
translation: Rhys: 她拔出剑，[p/] 就在弗林哈特转身看向她的时候，[p/][s/]她又从正面刺了他一剑！

original: Rhys: She soon realized that I had witnessed her heinous crime.[p/] She let the body fall to the ground and fled the scene.
translation: Rhys: 她马上就意识到我目睹了她的暴行。[p/]她顾不上倒地的尸体，马上逃离了现场。

original: Judge: Incredible!
translation: Judge: 不可思议！

original: Judge: If everything occurred as the witness described,[p/] then I see no room for debate.
translation: Judge: 如果事实如你所述，[p/]我想也没有辩论空间了。

original: Aria: Of course,[p/] the evidence has [i]always[/i] been irrefutable.
translation: Aria: 当然，[p/]证据<u>一直</u>不容辩驳。

original: You don’t remember seeing him when you left to look for Celeste.
translation: 你不记得去找塞莱斯特的时候见过这家伙。

original: But it [i]was[/i] pretty dark.
translation: 但当时伸手不见五指。

original: Tyrion: Celeste,[p/] did you see this man that night?
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特，[p/]你那晚见过这人吗？

original: Celeste: No.[p/] This is my first time meeting him.
translation: Celeste: 没有。[p/]这是我第一次见到他。

original: Celeste: And I didn't see him when I ran out of the tavern that night.
translation: Celeste: 而且我当晚跑出去的时候也没见过这个人。

original: Tyrion: So,[p/] he has to be lying.
translation: Tyrion: 那他肯定是在说谎。

original: Celeste: Does that mean…[p/] [i]He’s[/i] the one who killed my dad?
translation: Celeste: 难道说……[p/]<u>是他</u>杀了我爸爸？！

original: She tries her best to hide it,[p/] but you can sense her restlessness.
translation: 她尽力不表现出来，[p/]但你能感受到她的焦躁。

original: Tyrion: Hm…[p/] It’s hard to say right now.[p/] But it’s definitely a possibility.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]现在还难说。[p/]不过确实有这个可能。

original: Judge: The defense may now begin their cross-examination.
