translation: Judge: 辩方可以开始交叉询问了。

original: Tyrion: Who was the passenger in your carriage?
translation: Tyrion: 当时车上的乘客是谁？

original: Rhys: Ah…[p/] well-
translation: Rhys: 啊……[p/]这个——

original: Aria: The identity of the passenger is irrelevant.
translation: Aria: 乘客的身份与此案无关。

original: Aria: This [i]witness[/i] is the one who actually observed the crime as it occurred.
translation: Aria: 这位<u>证人</u>才是目睹了犯罪过程的人。

original: Tyrion: If there was another person at the scene,[p/] they may also have crucial testimony.
translation: Tyrion: 如果还有一个人在现场，[p/]那么他的证词也至关重要。

original: Aria: The passenger is under no obligation to testify before the court.
translation: Aria: 那个乘客没有义务向法庭作证。

original: Aria: And the current witness’s account of the events is more than adequate.
translation: Aria: 且当前证人的证言对于案件审理已经足够。

original: Judge: I agree.
translation: Judge: 我同意。

original: Judge: I see no reason for Mr. Rudolf to disclose the identity of their client.
translation: Judge: 我认为没有必要让鲁道夫先生公开乘客的身份。

original: Judge: The defense must present a more valid reason to do so.
translation: Judge: 辩方需要更有力的证据证明乘客的身份与此案有关。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: I’m assuming this “disturbance” was the argument between my client and her father.
translation: Tyrion: 我想“骚乱”是指当事人与她父亲的争吵。

original: Rhys: Yes.[p/] I heard two voices:[p/] one young female and one gruff male.
translation: Rhys: 没错，[p/]我听到了一个年少女性的声音，[p/]和一个粗鲁男人的声音。

original: Rhys: Presumably,[p/] these were the voices of Celeste and Flinhart McCoy.
translation: Rhys: 现在想想，[p/]应该是塞莱斯特和弗林哈特·麦考伊的声音。

original: Right.[p/] That matches up with what their neighbors heard too.
translation: 这和附近住户的证词吻合。

original: Aria: What did you do after hearing this disturbance, Mr. Rudolf?
translation: Aria: 鲁道夫先生，在那之后发生了什么？

original: Tyrion: You stopped your carriage in the [i]middle[/i] of a job?
translation: Tyrion: 你<u>工作中途</u>因为好奇停车了？

original: Tyrion: That seems pretty abnormal for a carriage driver.
translation: Tyrion: 这对于干你们这行的来说貌似不太正常啊。

original: Tyrion: What did your passenger think of this?
translation: Tyrion: 乘客对你没意见吗？

original: Rhys: He had no quarrel with it.
translation: Rhys: 他没有提出不满。

original: Tyrion: What kind of passenger would be okay with stopping mid-drive?
translation: Tyrion: 哪有开到一半停下来不走还没意见的乘客啊？

original: Aria: The passenger’s thoughts on the matter are irrelevant to his testimony.
translation: Aria: 乘客对这件事的想法与此案无关。

original: Aria: …Unless you have any hard evidence to prove otherwise.
translation: Aria: ……除非你有证据证明其有关。

original: Tyrion: …
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Aria: Now then.[p/] Please tell us what you saw in the establishment, Mr. Rudolf.
translation: Aria: 鲁道夫先生，[p/]请告诉我们你看见了什么。

original: Tyrion: You sound certain that you saw my client and the victim.
translation: Tyrion: 你听起来很确定自己看到了我的委托人和受害者。

original: Tyrion: How were you so sure it was them?
translation: Tyrion: 你怎能如此确定当时就是他们？

original: Rhys: Flinhart McCoy and his daughter were well known within the town.
translation: Rhys: 弗林哈特·麦考伊和他的女儿是镇上的名人。

original: Rhys: Flinhart made himself quite known in the region through his…[p/] social activism.
translation: Rhys: 弗林哈特出名是因为他的某种……[p/]社会活动。

original: Rhys: And young Celeste dresses in a manner that is far wealthier than the townsfolk of Kornhaven.
translation: Rhys: 而塞莱斯特的穿着比科尔哈文镇上其他人更显高贵。

original: Tyrion: Do you live in the same town as the McCoys?
translation: Tyrion: 你和麦考伊一家住在同一个镇子里？

original: Tyrion: How would you know about this?
translation: Tyrion: 你是怎么知道的？

original: Rhys: I don’t live there…[p/] But my work brings me there quite frequently.
translation: Rhys: 我不住在那儿……[p/]但我的工作经常经过那里。

original: Aria: The witness’s place of residence has no bearing on his testimony.
translation: Aria: 证人的住处与他的证言无关。

original: Aria: What matters is that he was there when the murder occurred.
translation: Aria: 重要的是犯罪发生时他就在场。

original: …Why is Steelwind deflecting questions about his personal life?
translation: ……为什么斯蒂尔文德一直要回避有关证人生活的问题？

original: Tyrion: So,[p/] you’re saying that my defendant stabbed him [i]twice[/i] with her sword?
translation: Tyrion: 所以，[p/]你是说被告用剑捅了受害人<u>两次</u>？

original: Rhys: Y-[p/]Yes…[p/] That’s [i]exactly[/i] what I saw.
translation: Rhys: 没、[p/]没错……[p/]这<u>正是</u>我看到的。

original: Tyrion: But there’s only one visible wound on the body.
translation: Tyrion: 但是尸体只有一处可见伤势。

original: Tyrion: If what you say is true,[p/] then that means that she stabbed him through the same wound.
translation: Tyrion: 假设你说的是真的，[p/]那意味着她从同一处刺了回去。

original: Tyrion: Isn’t that extremely improbable?
translation: Tyrion: 这不是非常不可能吗？

original: Aria: Improbable but not impossible.
translation: Aria:  非常不可能不等于完全不可能。

original: Aria: It is strange,[p/] I’ll give you that.
translation: Aria: 我承认这确实很怪。

original: Aria: But nevertheless,[p/] that’s what the witness [i]saw[/i] happen.
translation: Aria: 但无论如何，[p/]这就是证人<u>所见</u>。

original: She’s really reaching with this…
translation: 她这也太牵强了……

original: But you won’t get anywhere unless you can [i]prove[/i] that he’s lying.
translation: 你必须<u>证明</u>他在说谎，否则不会有任何进展。

original: Tyrion: And you let her get away?
translation: Tyrion: 你就让她这么跑了？

original: Rhys: I’m just a simple carriage driver.
translation: Rhys: 我只是个马车夫。

original: Rhys: I have no way of combating an armed assailant.
translation: Rhys: 我没有与武装歹徒战斗的能力。

original: Aria: The witness also saw the defendant using magic.
translation: Aria: 证人还看到被告使用魔法。

original: Aria: Did you honestly expect a chauffeur to subdue an armed mercenary?
translation: Aria: 你真认为一个马匹御人能压制一个全副武装的雇佣兵？

original: You suppose that she has a point there.
translation: 她说得有道理。

original: Tyrion: He must have come up with a detailed story beforehand and wrote it down.
translation: Tyrion: 他一定精心编造了个故事，提前写在了记事本上。

original: Tyrion: His little quirk of writing down everything is the perfect cover for him to read over his notes.
translation: Tyrion: 他那把所见所闻都记下来的习惯是偷看笔记的借口。

original: Celeste: I guess it would be hard to catch him lying if he has a way to keep his story straight.
translation: Celeste: 如果他能保证故事逻辑自洽，那很难抓住什么马脚。

original: Tyrion: Actually,[p/] it’s just the opposite.
translation: Tyrion: 事实上，[p/]恰恰相反。

original: Tyrion: With all those details,[p/] it will be that much easier to find an inconsistency.
translation: Tyrion: 细节越多，[p/]越容易找到不一致之处。

original: You just need to find out which detail is incorrect.
translation: 你只需要找出错误的部分。

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] It's clear that the witness's testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]证人的证言明显存在矛盾！

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] piece of evidence proves it!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这个</u>就是相关证据！

original: Judge: I fail to see how [i]that[/i] proves anything, Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生……我没看出来这两者有什么关系。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/] 好像是这样的。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Mr. Rudolf.[p/] You testified that you saw my client [i]murdering[/i] the victim.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 鲁道夫先生。[p/]你作证看到我的委托人在<u>杀害</u>受害者。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: And you supposedly saw her casting [i]magic[/i] while doing so?
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 并且看到她作案过程中还正在<u>施法</u>？

original: Rhys Rudolf: Y-[p/][s/]Yes…[p/] I could never forget such a grisly sight.
translation: Rhys Rudolf: 是、[p/][s/]是的……[p/]那可怕的一幕我此生难忘。

original: Rhys Rudolf: That moment was burned into my memory.
translation: Rhys Rudolf: 当时的情形仿佛烙在我的脑海。

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: I see…[p/] Well, it’s [i]funny[/i] that you say that.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 这样啊……[p/]哎，你这么说还挺<u>有趣</u>的。

original: Rhys Rudolf: …How so?
translation: Rhys Rudolf: ……你什么意思？

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: Because your entire testimony…
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 因为你的所有证言……

original: Tyrion Cuthbert: ...was a complete lie!
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: ……都是彻头彻尾的<u>谎言</u>！

original: Rhys Rudolf: W-[s/]What?!
translation: Rhys Rudolf: 什、[s/]什么？！

original: Aria Steelwind: Are you accusing the witness of perjury?
translation: Aria Steelwind: 你这是在指控证人作伪证吗？

original: Aria Steelwind: Surely you know that such accusations can't be made lightly, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria Steelwind: 你也清楚这种指控的分量，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: My accusation is far from baseless, Prosecutor Steelwind.
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 我并非毫无依据，斯蒂尔文德。

original: Tyrion: Take a look at this report.
translation: Tyrion: 看看这份报告。

original: Tyrion: The dining room lights are artificery devices that are powered by an arcane power cell.
translation: Tyrion: 用餐区的光照来源是一批用奥术蓄电池为动力的壁灯。

original: Tyrion: However,[p/] that same arcane power cell was broken during the time of the murder.
translation: Tyrion: 然而，[p/]案发时奥术蓄电池处于损坏状态。

original: Tyrion: The dining room lights [i]had[/i] no energy,[p/][s/] and the room would’ve been pitch black!
translation: Tyrion: 就餐区的灯当时<u>没有</u>电力，屋内会是一片漆黑！

original: Tyrion: The witness couldn’t have seen [i]anything[/i],[p/][s/] much less a homicide!
translation: Tyrion Cuthbert: 证人根本<u>什么都看不见</u>！[p/][s/]更别提目睹了一场<u>凶杀</u>！

original: Aria: …
translation: Aria: ……

original: Rhys: W-[p/]Wait![p/][s/] I can explain!
translation: Rhys: 等、[p/] 等下！[p/][s/] 我可以解释！

original: Aria: There’s no need, witness.
translation: Aria: 没那个必要，证人。

original: Aria: You could have easily seen another source of light.
translation: Aria: 那里有其他的光源。

original: Aria: Perhaps one of the McCoys lit a candle because of the blackout.
translation: Aria: 可能麦考伊家的人之一因停电点了蜡烛。

original: Tyrion: The witness clearly described a source of “blue light”!
translation: Tyrion: 证人清晰描述了光源是某种“蓝光”！

original: Tyrion: A candle or lantern wouldn’t emit a color like that!
translation: Tyrion: 蜡烛或灯笼不可能发出这种颜色的光！

original: Aria: Then the witness was clearly mistaken!
translation: Aria: 那一定是证人记错了！

original: Tyrion: The witness records everything he sees in his notebook!
translation: Tyrion: 证人有个记录所有所见所闻的习惯！

original: Tyrion: He even remembers the [i]exact[/i] times that each event occurred!
translation: Tyrion: 他甚至记下了每件事发生的<u>具体</u>时间！

original: Tyrion: So why would he be incorrect about such a clear and [i]obvious[/i] detail?!
translation: Tyrion: 怎么可能会弄错如此<u>明显</u>的细节？！

original: Tyrion: No…[p/][s/] What the witness saw was clearly some form of magic!
translation: Tyrion: 不对……[p/][s/]证人看到的明显是某种魔法！

original: Tyrion: And due to the lack of power,[p/] it couldn’t have been artificery.[p/] It must have been an arcane spell!
translation: Tyrion: 由于缺乏电力，[p/]我们可以排除奥术能源的可能性。[p/]一定是某种法术！

original: Rhys: …!
translation: Rhys: ……！

original: Rhys: That’s it!
translation: Rhys: 就是那个！

original: Judge: What is it, witness?
translation: Judge: 证人，是什么？

original: Rhys: I must have made an incorrect assumption!
translation: Rhys: 我一定是错误假定了！

original: Rhys: Please allow me to revise my testimony!
translation: Rhys: 请允许我更改证言！

original: Judge: …
translation: Judge: ……

original: Judge: What do you think of this, Prosecutor Steelwind?
translation: Judge: 你怎么认为，斯蒂尔文德检察官？

original: Aria: …If the witness wants to revise his testimony,[p/] then I see no harm in obliging him.
translation: Aria: ……如果证人想要修改证词，[p/]我想没有坏处。

original: Judge: And you, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Judge: 你呢？卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: If he thinks he saw something different,[p/] then it's only fair to hear him out.
translation: Tyrion: 如果他觉得自己看到了什么不同的东西，[p/]听他说说才公平。

original: You’ll tear through each of his lies no matter [i]what[/i] he does.
translation: 不管他做<u>什么</u>，你都会撕破他的每一层谎言。

original: Rhys: I remember now![p/][s/] Yesterday,[p/] it was revealed that Flinhart was killed using magic!
translation: Rhys: 我现在想起来了！[p/][s/]昨天，[p/]你们揭示弗林哈特是被魔法杀害的！

original: Rhys: I must have seen Flinhart’s daughter channeling a magic spell.
translation: Rhys: 我看到的肯定是弗林哈特的女儿在使用某种法术。

original: Rhys: The spell was called “[b]Mage Blade[/b]”,[p/] am I correct?
translation: Rhys: 那个法术叫“[b]法术剑刃[/b]”对吧？

original: Rhys: That’s it![p/][s/] The blue glow that I saw must have been created by [b]Mage Blade[/b]!
translation: Rhys: 就是那个！[p/][s/]一定是[b]法术剑刃[/b]释放出的蓝光！

original: Judge: Hm…[p/] I see.
translation: Judge: 嗯……[p/]我明白了。

original: Judge: So, the “blue light” that you saw came from the defendant’s magic.
translation: Judge: 所以你看到的“蓝光”来自被告施展的魔法。

original: Judge: Mr. Cuthbert, you may proceed with your cross-examination.
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生，你可以进行交叉询问了。

original: Tyrion: With pleasure.
translation: Tyrion: 乐意至极。

original: Tyrion: Are you changing your testimony based on yesterday’s trial?
translation: Tyrion: 你是在基于昨天的庭审修改证言吗？

original: Rhys: No![p/][s/] I assure you![p/][s/] That’s not what I’m doing!
translation: Rhys: 没有！[p/][s/]我向你保证！[p/][s/]我没有这么做！

original: Rhys: But after thinking about it further,[p/][s/] I think I finally [i]understand[/i] what I saw!
translation: Rhys: 但是仔细考虑过后，[p/][s/]我终于<u>明白</u>自己看到了什么！

original: Tyrion: Wouldn’t that be pretty noticeable and distinct?
translation: Tyrion: 那不应该给你留下特别的印象吗？

original: Aria: The witness is of the commonfolk.
translation: Aria: 证人只是一介平民。

original: Aria: Furthermore,[p/] the defendant’s magical ability wasn’t known to many until the night of the murder.
translation: Aria: 另外，[p]案发当晚之前，很多人都不知道被告会使用魔法。

original: Aria: What reason would the witness have to think that he was witnessing magic?
translation: Aria: 证人有什么理由觉得自己看到了魔法？

original: Aria: He would just think that the sword was wreathed in a glow by some other means.
translation: Aria: 他只会觉得剑是因为其他原因而发光。

original: That last part is a bit far-fetched…[p/] But you can’t really refute it right now.
translation: 她的解释有些牵强……[p/]但你目前没办法反驳她。

original: Tyrion: You seem uncertain about the spell that you saw my client use.
translation: Tyrion: 你好像不太确定我的委托人用了什么法术。

original: Tyrion: How can we trust the [i]rest[/i] of your testimony?
translation: Tyrion: 我们怎么相信你的<u>其余</u>证言？

original: Aria: The witness has no knowledge of the Arcane Arts,[p/] I'll grant you that.
translation: Aria: 我向你保证，[p/]证人对于奥术毫无所知。

original: Aria: But it doesn’t matter if he was unable to identify the specific spell.
translation: Aria: 不过他无法识别法术也没关系。

original: Aria: The only thing that matters is that he [i]saw[/i] it happen.
translation: Aria: 重要的是他<u>目击</u>了施法瞬间。

original: You won’t get anywhere unless you can prove that he [i]didn’t[/i] see [b]Mage Blade[/b].
translation: 必须证明他<u>没有</u>看见[b]法术剑刃[/b]，否则不会有任何进展。

original: Tyrion: You still don’t sound so sure of it yourself.
translation: Tyrion: 你还是听起来没什么自信啊。

original: Rhys: I-[p/]I [i]wasn’t[/i] sure of it at first.
translation: Rhys: 我、[p/]我一开始不确定。

original: Rhys: But then I remembered that Flinhart was killed using magic.
translation: Rhys: 但我回忆起来弗林哈特死于魔法。

original: Rhys: Is it really so hard to believe I didn’t realize that magic was used when I saw the scene?
translation: Rhys: 我没能辨认出现场看到的是魔法这点如此难以置信？

original: Tyrion: …I suppose not.
translation: Tyrion: ……这倒不是。

original: Not that you [i]actually[/i] believe him.
translation: 你并不相信他。

original: Celeste: He just keeps telling lie after lie…
translation: Celeste: 他一直在说谎……

original: Celeste is trying to keep her composure.[p/] But you notice her firmly clenching her fists.
translation: 塞莱斯特尽力保持沉着，[p/]但你看到了她握紧拳头。

original: Tyrion: He’s trying to cover for his mistake.
translation: Tyrion: 他只是在尝试掩盖自己的错误。

original: Tyrion: I’m sure he’s just making things up on the spot now.
translation: Tyrion: 他现在只是在编故事罢了。

original: Celeste: He doesn’t know how magic works.
translation: Celeste: 他对魔法一窍不通。

original: Celeste: I bet he barely understands what [b]Mage Blade[/b] even does.
translation: Celeste: 我敢说他基本不明白[b]法术剑刃[/b]干什么用的。

original: Tyrion: Right.[p/] There [i]has[/i] to be a flaw with his testimony because of that.
translation: Tyrion: 没错。[p/]他的证言也会<u>因此</u>出现漏洞。

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] It's clear that the witness's testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]证人的证言明显存在矛盾！

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] piece of evidence proves it!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这个</u>就是相关证据！

original: Judge: I fail to see how [i]that[/i] proves anything, Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生……我没看出来这两者有什么关系。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/] 好像是这样的。

original: Tyrion: Mr. Rudolf,[p/] you don’t know much about magic, do you?
translation: Tyrion: 在魔法这方面你完全是个门外汉，[p/]没错吧，鲁道夫先生？

original: Rhys: Of course not!
translation: Rhys: 当然！

original: Rhys: Are you trying to say that I should have recognized Celeste's [b]Mage Blade[/b]?
translation: Rhys: 你难道要说我一开始就该就认出塞莱斯特的[b]法术剑刃[/b]吗？

original: Tyrion: No…[p/] I admit that you probably wouldn’t know about [b]Mage Blade[/b]…
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/]我承认你大概不知道[b]法术剑刃[/b]……

original: Tyrion: …But that’s [i]exactly[/i] where your mistake was!
translation: Tyrion: ……但这<u>正是</u>你露出马脚的地方！

original: Rhys: M-[p/][s/]My mistake?!
translation: Rhys: 露、露出马脚？！

original: Tyrion: Mr. Rudolf.[p/] If you [i]were[/i] aware of how [b]Mage Blade[/b] works,[p/] then you would know that the spell emits a [i]yellow[/i] radiant glow.
translation: Tyrion: 鲁道夫先生，[p/]如果你了解[b]法术剑刃[/b]的原理，[p/]就会知道这种法术只会释放出<u>黄光</u>。

original: Tyrion: Which means the “blue glow” you saw couldn’t have [i]possibly[/i] been [b]Mage Blade[/b]!
translation: Tyrion: 自然，你看到的“蓝光”<u>不可能</u>来自于[b]法术剑刃[/b]！

original: Aria: This is ridiculous.
translation: Aria: 这太荒谬了。

original: Aria: I’ll grant you that the witness clearly remembers seeing a blue glow.
translation: Aria: 我知道证人记忆里看到的是蓝光。

original: Aria: But what significance could such a minor detail have?
translation: Aria: 但这点不同无关紧要！

original: Tyrion: It’s extremely significant, Prosecutor Steelwind!
translation: Tyrion: 这可太重要了，斯蒂尔文德检察官！

original: Tyrion: If the witness [i]did[/i] see a blue magical glow,[p/][s/] then he must have witnessed [i]another[/i] spell at the scene!
translation: Tyrion: 如果证人<u>看到了</u>魔法蓝光，[p/][s/]那他看到的一定是<u>另一种</u>法术！

original: Aria: Preposterous![p/][s/] You don’t have [i]any[/i] evidence to back up that claim!
translation: Aria: 荒唐！[p/][s/]你没有<u>任何</u>证据支持你的推断！

original: Tyrion: That blue light made a large impression on the witness!
translation: Tyrion: 蓝光给证人留下了深刻的印象！

original: Tyrion: He wrote it down in his notebook,[p/][s/] and he specifically mentioned the colour!
translation: Tyrion: 他写在了本子上，[p/][s/]还在证言时特地提到了颜色！

original: Tyrion: There’s no way he would be mistaken about something like that!
translation: Tyrion: 他不可能弄错这种事！

original: Rhys: …
translation: Rhys: ……

original: Tyrion: So, what did you [i]really[/i] see, Mr. Rudolf?!
translation: Tyrion: 那么，你当晚到底看到了什么，鲁道夫先生？！

original: Tyrion: Did you see my client at the scene,[p/][s/] casting a spell that she couldn’t possibly cast?!
translation: Tyrion: 你真的看到我的委托人在现场[p/][s/]施展一种她根本不可能会的法术？！

original: Tyrion: Or did you see [i]another[/i] mage at the scene?!
translation: Tyrion: 还是说，你在现场看见了<u>另一个</u>法师的存在？！

original: Rhys: U-[p/]Um…[p/] W-[p/]well…
translation: Rhys: 啊、[p/]呃……[p/]这、[p/]这个……

original: Aria: Your Honor![p/][s/] The defense has no right to accuse the witness like this!
translation: Aria: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]辩方无权这样逼问证人！

original: Tyrion: Let me remind you that perjury is a crime, Mr. Rudolf!
translation: Tyrion: 鲁道夫先生，作伪证可是犯罪！

original: Tyrion: If you are found to have lied in your testimony,[p/] you [i]will[/i] be prosecuted!
translation: Tyrion: 如果发现你在证言中撒谎，[p/]我们<u>就会</u>起诉你！

original: Rhys: No![p/][s/] Wait, please!
translation: Rhys: 不！[p/][s/]求你等等！

original: Garrick: Now that is quite enough of that.
translation: Garrick: 闹够了吧。

original: Garrick Pierce suddenly steps down from the gallery and walks to the witness stand.
translation: 加里克·皮尔斯突然走下旁听席，站上了证人席。

original: He’s breaking every possible rule in the book,[p/] but no one in the room moves to stop him.
translation: 他公然无视法庭秩序，[p/]但没人敢阻止他。

original: The bailiff looks to the judge nervously.[p/] But the judge just narrows his eyes and carefully watches Pierce.
translation: 法警紧张地看向法官，[p/]法官也只是眯起眼睛，谨慎观察皮尔斯。

original: Pierce,[p/] meanwhile,[p/] shoves the still-flustered Rudolf off of the stand and begins addressing the courtroom.
translation: 与此同时，[p/]皮尔斯把慌慌张张的鲁道夫推开，开始发言。

original: What is he even [i]doing[/i] here?!
translation: 他来<u>干什么</u>？！

original: Garrick: I will not stand by while you harass my servant.
translation: Garrick: 我不会默许你骚扰我的仆人。

original: Aria: Pierce![p/][s/] We discussed this!
translation: Aria: 皮尔斯！[p/][s/]我们说好的！

original: Aria: There is no need for you to take the stand!
translation: Aria: 你没有必要出庭作证！

original: ... And what,[p/] pray tell,[p/] did they “discuss”?
translation: ……说好的？[p/]说好什么了？

original: Garrick: Nonsense.[p/] I have nothing to hide.
translation: Garrick: 无稽之谈。[p/]我身正不怕影子斜。

original: Garrick: And if you had done [i]your[/i] job properly,[p/] I wouldn’t have needed to intervene.
translation: Garrick: 再说了，如果你能做好<u>你的工作</u>，[p/]根本无需我来介入。

original: Aria: …
translation: Aria: ……

original: For the first time,[p/] Steelwind doesn’t seem to have control of the situation.
translation: 这好像是你第一次见斯蒂尔文德失去对情况的控制。

original: Judge: What is the meaning of this, Ms. Steelwind?!
translation: Judge: 斯蒂尔文德检察官，这都是怎么一回事？！

original: Judge: Who is this man?!
translation: Judge: 他是谁？！

original: Aria: *sigh*[p/] This is Garrick Pierce, Your Honor.
translation: Aria: *叹气* [p/]这是加里克·皮尔斯，法官阁下。

original: Garrick: That is [i]LORD[/i] Garrick Pierce to you, Steelwind.
translation: Garrick: 是加里克·皮尔斯<size=1.5em><u>勋爵</u></size>，斯蒂尔文德。

original: Garrick: I am the honorable heir to the Pierce noble house.
translation: Garrick: 我是皮尔斯贵族家的继承人。

original: Garrick: In any case,[p/] I must apologize.
translation: Garrick: 总之，[p/]我必须道歉。

original: Garrick: I’m afraid that these…[p/] misunderstandings are entirely my fault.
translation: Garrick: 这些误解完全是我的错。

original: Judge: What do you mean?
translation: Judge: 这是什么意思？

original: Garrick: You see…[p/] Rudolf wasn’t the one who witnessed the crime that fateful night.
translation: Garrick: 其实……[p/]鲁道夫不是当晚目击凶案的人。

original: Garrick: It was me.[p/] I was the one who witnessed the crime.
translation: Garrick: 是我。[p/]我才是当晚的目击者。

original: Garrick: I had my driver report the body so that [i]I[/i] could remain anonymous.
translation: Garrick: 我让他报警来保证<u>自己的</u>匿名身份。

original: Tyrion: What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么？！

original: Tyrion: Are you saying that you had Rudolf [i]lie[/i] for you?!
translation: Tyrion: 你是说你让鲁道夫为了你<u>撒谎</u>？！

original: Garrick: I simply dictated to him what I saw and had him repeat that to law enforcement.
translation: Garrick: 我只是让他对执法人员重复一遍我看见的内容而已。

original: Garrick: It simply wouldn’t do for a member of the nobility to appear publicly in court.
translation: Garrick: 贵族成员公开出现在法庭里不合适。

original: Judge: Lord Pierce!
translation: Judge: 皮尔斯勋爵！

original: Judge: Regardless of your intentions,[p/][s/] this is a very clear act of perjury!
translation: Judge: 与你的意图无关，[p/][s/]这明显是在做伪证！

original: But from the look on the judge's face,[p/] you can easily tell that he won’t face any [i]actual[/i] consequences…
translation: 但从法官的神色来看，[p/]他绝对不会受到任何<u>实际</u>惩罚……

original: Garrick: I understand…[p/] and I will accept the consequences of that.
translation: Garrick: 我理解……[p/]我愿意承担这一行为的后果。

original: Garrick: But I would be remiss if Rudolf’s shoddy testimony allowed that girl to escape her crimes.
translation: Garrick: 但如果鲁道夫的粗劣证言使那女孩脱罪，就是我的疏忽。

original: Garrick: Please let me testify as to what I saw that night.
translation: Garrick: 请允许我对当晚自己看到的事作证。

original: Judge: …
translation: Judge: ……

original: Judge: Very well.
translation: Judge: 很好。

original: Judge: This is highly irregular,[p/] but I believe the court [i]will[/i] benefit from hearing your testimony.
translation: Judge: 这种情况史无前例，[p/]但我相信你的证言会对<u>法庭</u>有助益。

original: Judge: However,[p/] know that this misconduct has hurt your credibility.
translation: Judge: 但我必须提醒你，[p/]这一不当行为已经损害了你的声誉。

original: Garrick: Very well.
translation: Garrick: 很好。

original: Garrick: On the night of the murder,[p/] I found myself unable to sleep.[p/] So, I went on a leisurely carriage ride around Kornhaven.
translation: Garrick: 案发当晚，[p/]我难以入睡。[p/]于是我乘马车在科尔哈文附近散心。

original: Garrick: I happened to be passing by the McCoy tavern when I heard a loud commotion from within the building.
translation: Garrick: 经过麦考伊酒馆时，我恰好听到屋内一阵骚乱。

original: Garrick: Curious,[p/] I stopped my carriage and took a single step inside the establishment.[p/][s/] That is when I saw the scene inside!
translation: Garrick: 好奇心作祟，[p/]我下车刚向里踏进一步，[p/][s/]就看到了里面的情形！

original: Garrick: I saw the defendant stabbing that poor man twice with her sword!
translation: Garrick: 我看见被告用她的剑捅了受害者两次！

original: Tyrion: Garrick Pierce…[p/] He’s a member of the nobility.
translation: Tyrion: 加里克·皮尔斯……[p/]他是贵族的一员。

original: Celeste: That means that he’s probably a mage, right?
translation: Celeste: 也就是说他大概率是个法师对吧？

original: Celeste: And he’s the only other mage that was there that night.
translation: Celeste: 而且是当晚除我之外的唯一一个法师。

original: Celeste: Does that mean…?
translation: Celeste: 是否意味着……？

original: Tyrion: There’s no doubt about it.
translation: Tyrion: 肯定没错。

original: Tyrion: He’s the only person that could have left a trace of [b]transmutation[/b] on the body.
translation: Tyrion: 他是唯一一个能在尸体上留下[b]形变术[/b]痕迹的人。

original: Tyrion: He [i]has[/i] to be the mage that we’re looking for.
translation: Tyrion: 他<u>一定</u>就是我们要找的法师。

original: Celeste: …
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: …Sorry,[p/] this must be a lot for you right now.
translation: Tyrion: ……抱歉，[p/]我知道你现在心里很不好受。

original: Celeste: Don't worry about me.
translation: Celeste: 别担心我。

original: Celeste: Focus on taking him down.
translation: Celeste: 专心把他拿下。

original: Tyrion: That seems like a...[p/] strange way to pass the time.
translation: Tyrion: 你散心的方式……[p/]挺有雅兴啊。

original: Not that you believe him for a second.
translation: 他说的话你一个字都不信。

original: Aria: The witness’s eccentricities are beside the point.
translation: Aria: 证人的怪癖与此案无关。

original: Aria: What matters is that he was clearly [i]at[/i] the scene.
translation: Aria: 他当时在场才是关键。

original: Garrick: …I wouldn’t [i]quite[/i] put it that way.
translation: Garrick: ……我可不会<u>这么</u>形容自己……

original: Garrick: But nevertheless…
translation: Garrick: 但总之……

original: Tyrion: I’m guessing this “commotion” was the argument between my client and the victim?
translation: Tyrion: 你听到的“骚乱”是我的委托人与受害者的争论？

original: Garrick: One would conclude that. Yes.
translation: Garrick: 可以这么总结，没错。

original: Aria: As we all know,[p/] both of them became quite loud during their argument.
translation: Aria: 我们都知道，[p/]当晚吵架时双方声音都很大。

original: Aria: It’s not unreasonable to say that the witness heard them from his carriage.
translation: Aria: 证人路过时听到的说法并不可疑。

original: If he was at the Tavern Entrance,[p/] then that would mean he was…[p/] here.
translation: 如果他当时在酒馆入口，[p/]也就意味着具体位置是……[p/]这里。

original: Tyrion: You saw the entire scene from the tavern entrance?
translation: Tyrion: 你从酒馆入口看到了整个犯罪过程？

original: Tyrion: It would be quite dark considering that the lights weren’t operational.
translation: Tyrion: 因为灯没有电，现场当时应该是一片漆黑才对。

original: Tyrion: Even [i]if[/i] my client was using [b]Mage Blade[/b] at the time.
translation: Tyrion: <u>即使</u>我的委托人当时正在使用[b]法术剑刃[/b]。

original: Garrick: Ah,[p/] of course.[p/] I’d forgotten that detail.
translation: Garrick: 啊，[p/]当然。[p/]我忘了这一细节。

original: Garrick: I couldn’t see what was happening,[p/] so I used my magic to illuminate the scene.
translation: Garrick: 我当时什么都看不清，[p/]所以我用自己的魔法来照亮现场。

original: Tyrion: You used magic at the crime scene?
translation: Tyrion: 你在犯罪现场用了法术？

original: Garrick: Yes.[p/] I remember it clearly.
translation: Garrick: 没错，[p/]我清晰记得。

original: Garrick: I conjured a blue light to illuminate the scene.
translation: Garrick: 我召唤了蓝光来照亮现场。

original: Garrick: That same blue light must have been what my driver saw.
translation: Garrick: 我仆从看见的蓝光也是因为这个。

original: Tyrion: I thought that Rudolf didn’t witness the crime at all.
translation: Tyrion: 看来鲁道夫根本没有目睹犯罪过程。

original: Aria: If I had to guess,[p/] Mr. Rudolf must have seen the blue light from the carriage.
translation: Aria: 我估计鲁道夫先生是在车上看到的蓝光。

original: Aria: He must have made that detail a part of his testimony earlier.
translation: Aria: 之前他肯定是把这一细节杂糅到了自己的证言中。

original: That actually makes a lot of sense now that you think about it.
translation: 现在想想倒是说得通。

original: Rudolf was so sure that he saw a blue light.[p/] It would be strange if he was lying about that.
translation: 鲁道夫特别确定他看见了蓝光，[p/]他没道理要在这里撒谎。

original: Tyrion: But anyways,[p/] which spell did you use to illuminate the crime scene?
translation: Tyrion: 你用的哪种法术来照亮现场？

original: Garrick: It was the [b]Conjure Light[/b] spell.
translation: Garrick: 一种叫[b]祈愿光芒[/b]的法术。

original: Tyrion: Your Honor,[p/] if the witness used magic at the crime scene,[p/] then I’d like for his [b]Spell Compendium[/b] to be added to the court record.
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下，[p/]既然证人在现场使用了魔法，[p/]那我请求将证人的[b]法术汇编[/b]添加至法庭记录。

original: Aria: I see no reason to invade the witness’s privacy over a trivial illumination spell.
translation: Aria: 我不觉得可以为了一个微不足道的照明法术侵犯证人的隐私。

original: Judge: I agree.
translation: Judge: 同意。

original: Judge: The defense would need a stronger reason to requisition the witness’s [b]Spell Compendium[/b].
translation: Judge: 辩方需要更有力的理由来要求获得证人的[b]法术汇编[/b]。

original: Garrick: Right you are, Your Honor.
translation: Garrick: 没错，法官阁下。

original: Garrick: Your wisdom is truly fitting of your station.
translation: Garrick: 您的聪慧与您的地位相称。

original: Oh, shut up.
translation: 哎呦，闭嘴吧。

original: Tyrion: Casting a spell seems like a pretty significant detail to forget.
translation: Tyrion: 施法这种重要细节不该忘记吧？

original: Garrick: For you, maybe.
translation: Garrick: 对你来说，也许。

original: Garrick: But for a practiced mage like myself,[p/] using magic is as natural as moving my arm.
translation: Garrick: 但像我这样的高阶法师，[p/]施法如同移动手臂一般自然。

original: You admit that you wouldn’t know what it’s like to be a mage.
translation: 你承认自己确实不知道施法是什么样的感觉。

original: Tyrion: And I assume that you’re going to say that she stabbed him from opposite sides each time?
translation: Tyrion: 我猜你也要说被告正反捅了受害者两次？

original: Garrick: Of course.
translation: Garrick: 当然。

original: Garrick: Mind you,[p/] I have no idea why she would act like that.
translation: Garrick: 听好，[p/]我不清楚她这么做的理由。

original: Garrick: But can you prove that she didn’t do exactly what I described?
translation: Garrick: 但你能证明她没有做我所描述的事吗？

original: Tyrion: I suppose not…
translation: Tyrion: 我还不能……

original: At least not yet, anyways...
translation: 至少现在……

original: Tyrion: Pierce is definitely the real murderer.
translation: Tyrion: 皮尔斯绝对是真凶。

original: Tyrion: This means there has to be a lie somewhere in his testimony.
translation: Tyrion: 他一定会在证言某处撒谎。

original: Celeste: He keeps saying that he stood at the entrance the entire time.
translation: Celeste: 他一直强调自己全程只站在入口。

original: Celeste: If he killed my father,[p/] then he would have been further in.
translation: Celeste: 如果是他下的手，[p/]他当时一定在酒馆更深处。

original: Tyrion: Right.
translation: Tyrion: 没错。

original: Is there any way you can [i]prove[/i] that he was further inside the building?
translation: 有什么证据能<u>证明</u>他当时站在酒馆内部吗？

original: Tyrion: Your Honor![p/][s/] It's clear that the witness's testimony is contradictory!
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下！[p/][s/]证人的证言明显存在矛盾！

original: Tyrion: And [i]this[/i] piece of evidence proves it!
translation: Tyrion: <u>这个</u>就是相关证据！

original: Judge: I fail to see how [i]that[/i] proves anything, Mr. Cuthbert...
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生……我没看出来这两者有什么关系。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...[p/] I guess you're right.
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/]哦……[p/] 好像是这样的。

original: Tyrion: Lord Pierce,[p/] you said that you illuminated the scene from the tavern entrance?
translation: Tyrion: 皮尔斯勋爵，[p/]你说你从酒馆入口照亮了整个现场？

original: Tyrion: And you only took a single step into the building?
translation: Tyrion: 而且你只向里踏了一步，没错吧？

original: Garrick: Of course.
translation: Garrick: 当然。

original: Garrick: I remember it very clearly.[p/] I stood only at the entrance.
translation: Garrick: 我记得很清楚。[p/]我只站在入口。

original: Tyrion: In that case,[p/] I’d like for you to take a look at the map of the tavern.
translation: Tyrion: 那样的话，[p/]我想请你看看这张酒馆的地图。

original: Tyrion: If we take a look at this map,[p/] that would place you right here, [p/]where the "W" is.
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说，[p/]你站在“W”所标识的位置。

original: Tyrion: Am I correct?
translation: Tyrion: 没错吧？

original: Garrick: O-[p/] Of course, I was.
translation: Garrick: 当、[p/]当然。我确实站在那里。

original: Garrick: I do not know what you wish to achieve by having me repeat that fact.
translation: Garrick: 我不知道你为什么要让我重复这一点。

original: Tyrion: Well,[p/] I find it interesting that you illuminated the crime scene from all the way back there.
translation: Tyrion: 哎呀，[p/]因为你说能从酒馆门口照亮整个犯罪现场这句话挺好笑的。

original: Tyrion: Considering, that [b]Conjure Light[/b] only illuminates an area within 15ft!
translation: Tyrion: 毕竟，[b]祈愿光芒[/b]只能照亮以使用者为中心 15 英尺的范围！

original: Garrick: What?!
translation: Garrick: 什么？！

original: Aria: The spell’s range is irrelevant.
translation: Aria: 法术的范围无关紧要。

original: Aria: We’ve already established that the victim would have been illuminated by Mage Blade.
translation: Aria: 我们已经证明了受害者会被法术剑刃照亮。

original: Tyrion: During his testimony,[p/][s/] Lord Pierce [i]clearly[/i] stated that he couldn’t see what was happening!
translation: Tyrion: 在他作证时，[p/][s/]皮尔斯勋爵<u>明确</u>说过他根本看不清发生了什么事！

original: Tyrion: [i]That's[/i] why he cast [b]Conjure Light[/b] in the first place!
translation: Tyrion: 因为看不清，<u>所以</u>他才用了[b]祈愿光芒[/b]！

original: Tyrion: However,[p/] [b]Conjure Light[/b] [i]doesn’t[/i] work like a normal source of light.
translation: Tyrion: 然而，[p/][b]祈愿光芒[/b]和一般的光源<u>不一样</u>。

original: Tyrion: It only provides illumination up to 15ft of the caster and no further.
translation: Tyrion: 它最多也只能照亮施法者 15 英尺内的范围。

original: Tyrion: If he [i]had[/i] stayed at the entrance,[p/] his spell wouldn’t have done [i]anything[/i] to help illuminate the scene.
translation: Tyrion: 如果他<u>仅仅是</u>站在入口，[p/]那这法术对于照亮现场<u>毫无用处</u>。

original: Judge: But what does this mean?
translation: Judge: 但这意味着什么？

original: Judge: Lord Pierce,[p/] did you illuminate the crime scene or not?
translation: Judge: 皮尔斯勋爵，[p/]你到底有没有照亮犯罪现场？

original: Garrick: W-[p/]well,[p/] I-
translation: Garrick: 这、[p/]这个嘛，[p/]我——

original: Tyrion: I can answer that question for you, Your Honor!
translation: Tyrion: 我能替他回答你的问题，法官阁下！

original: Tyrion: Lord Pierce [i]did[/i] illuminate the scene of the crime.
translation: Tyrion: 皮尔斯勋爵<u>确实</u>照亮了犯罪现场。

original: Tyrion: He illuminated it because he was standing right where it happened!
translation: Tyrion: 因为他当时就站在谋杀发生的地方！

original: Judge: Mr. Cuthbert.[p/][s/] Are you trying to say that Lord Pierce was that close to where the murder occurred?!
translation: Judge: 卡斯伯特先生。[p/][s/]你的意思是说在谋杀发生时，皮尔斯勋爵离凶杀现场非常近？！

original: Judge: How would that be possible?!
translation: Judge: 这怎么可能？！

original: Tyrion: Well,[p/] there’s only one way this scenario would make sense, Your Honor.
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下，[p/]仅有一种可能说得通。

original: Tyrion: And that would be if [i]Garrick Pierce[/i] was the one who murdered Flinhart McCoy.
translation: Tyrion: <u>加里克·皮尔斯</u>才是杀害弗林哈特·麦考伊的人！

original: Garrick: H-[p/][s/] Hold on for a moment![p/][s/] This is absurd!
translation: Garrick: 等、[p/][s/]等等！[p/][s/]这太荒谬了！

original: Garrick: I could have easily used a [i]different[/i] spell to illuminate the room.
translation: Garrick: 我完全可以用<u>另一个</u>法术照亮房间。

original: Tyrion: And [b]which[/b] spell would that be, Pierce?
translation: Tyrion: 那是什么法术，皮尔斯？

original: Garrick: I-[p/]I…[p/] Uh…[p/]
translation: Garrick: 我、[p/]我……[p/]呃……[p/]

original: Garrick: The name escapes me.
translation: Garrick: 我突然想不起来了。

original: Garrick: I’m not sure [i]which[/i] one it was now that I think about it…
translation: Garrick: 我现在想不起来是<u>哪一个</u>了……

original: Aria: …You idiot.
translation: Aria: ……你这白痴。

original: Tyrion: Well,[p/] maybe we can figure it out together.
translation: Tyrion: 没关系啊，[p/]我们可以一起帮你想。

original: Tyrion: …When you relinquish your [b]Spell Compendium[/b] to the court!
translation: Tyrion: ……只要你愿意把[b]法术汇编[/b]提交给法庭！

original: Garrick: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Garrick: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Garrick: This is a clear violation of my privacy!
translation: Garrick: 这是公然侵犯我的个人隐私！

original: Garrick: Steelwind![p/][s/] Why aren’t you objecting to this?!
translation: Garrick: 斯蒂尔文德！[p/][s/]你为什么一言不发！？

original: Aria: If you had listened to my instructions,[p/] you wouldn’t be in this situation.
translation: Aria: 要是当初听我的话，[p/]你才不会落得如此窘境。

original: Aria: You’ve made your bed.[p/] Now lie in it.
translation: Aria: 你自掘坟墓。[p/]现在该躺里面了。

original: Garrick: Steelwind,[p/] you treacherous-!
translation: Garrick: 斯蒂尔文德，[p/]你这混蛋……！

original: Judge: That’s enough!
translation: Judge: 够了！

original: Judge: It appears that the prosecution has no objections.
translation: Judge: 看来检方没有反对意见。

original: Judge: With everything that has occurred,[p/] I must ask that Lord Pierce relinquish his [b]Spell Compendium[/b] to the court.
translation: Judge: 鉴于法庭上发生的一切，[p/]我必须要求皮尔斯勋爵将他的[b]法术汇编[/b]上交法庭。

original: Celeste: Good job, Tyrion!
translation: Celeste: 提利昂，干得好！

original: Celeste: We got his [b]Spell Compendium[/b]!
translation: Celeste: 拿到他的[b]法术汇编[/b]了！

original: With that,[p/] this case is as good as yours.
translation: 这样的话，[p/]案件几乎已在你掌握。

original: Aria: …
translation: Aria: ……

original: ...Or is it?
translation: ……在吗？

original: She didn’t even [i]try[/i] to stop you from taking his [b]Spell Compendium[/b].
translation: 她压根就没<u>试过</u>阻止你获得皮尔斯的[b]法术汇编[/b]。

original: She wouldn’t let that happen just to spite Lord Pierce.
translation: 她不是那种落井下石的人。

original: She definitely still has something up her sleeve…
translation: 她绝对还有王牌……

original: Tyrion: Your Honor, I’ve looked at the spells in Lord Pierce’s [b]Compendium[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下，我已经检查了皮尔斯勋爵的[b]汇编[/b]中的法术。

original: Tyrion: [b]Conjure Light[/b] is the only spell that he can cast that would shed a blue light.
translation: Tyrion: [b]祈愿光芒[/b]是他唯一能施放的发出蓝光的法术。

original: Tyrion: This renders his testimony and many of his statements false.
translation: Tyrion: 这表明他的证词与许多陈述都不真实。

original: Garrick: …!
translation: Garrick: ……!

original: You can practically hear Lord Pierce grinding his teeth.
translation: 你几乎能听到皮尔斯勋爵咬牙切齿的动静。

original: Tyrion: Your Honor, Lord Pierce could very well be a suspect in the murder of Flinhart McCoy.
translation: Tyrion: 法官阁下，皮尔斯勋爵在弗林哈特·麦考伊案中有重大嫌疑。

original: Tyrion: The defense argues that [i]this[/i] presents enough reasonable doubt to acquit the defendant.
translation: Tyrion: 辩方认为<u>这一推论</u>属于合理质疑，同时也说明被告无罪。

original: Judge: …
translation: Judge: ……

original: Judge: I acknowledge that Lord Pierce’s actions are quite suspect.
translation: Judge: 我认同皮尔斯勋爵的行为确实很有嫌疑。

original: Judge: However,[p/] I will not pass a verdict just yet.
translation: Judge: 但是，[p/]我现今还不会做出判决。

original: Judge: There is much more we need to learn.
translation: Judge: 还有更多问题需要进一步讨论。

original: Celeste: What!?[p/][s/] That’s not how it works!
translation: Celeste: 什么？！[p/][s/]不应该是这样的吧！

original: Celeste: We proved that there’s reasonable doubt!
translation: Celeste: 我们都已经证明有合理疑点了！

original: Celeste: That should be enough to acquit me, right?!
translation: Celeste: 这应该已经足够撤销我的指控了吧？！

original: Tyrion: …In a normal case, maybe.[p/] But it’s different for this trial.
translation: Tyrion: ……普通案件的话，可能吧。[p/]但这次审理的案件不同。

original: Tyrion: The public won’t accept an unsolved homicide involving magic.
translation: Tyrion: 公众不会允许魔法相关的谋杀案悬而未决。

original: Tyrion: Unless we can unequivocally prove your innocence,[p/] the court will keep drawing out this case.
translation: Tyrion: 除非我们能明确证明你的无辜，[p/]否则庭审只会继续下去。

original: Celeste: What?![p/] But…[p/][s/] that’s not fair!
translation: Celeste: 什么？[p/]但……[p/][s/]这不公平！

original: Tyrion: That’s just how the system works…
translation: Tyrion: 这就是这个体系的运转方式……

original: Tyrion: Our court system doesn’t exist to exact justice.
translation: Tyrion: 我们的司法体系并非为了伸张正义而存在。

original: Tyrion: It exists so that the kingdom can save face.
translation: Tyrion: 它的存在只是为了维系王国体面。

original: Celeste: No...
translation: Celeste: 不是吧……

original: Judge: However,[p/] the court [i]will[/i] be suspending the trial of Celeste McCoy until further notice.
translation: Judge: 总之，[p/]法庭将中止对塞莱斯特·麦考伊的审判，直至另行通知。

original: Judge: That is,[p/] until Lord Pierce can be investigated as a possible suspect.
translation: Judge: 即意味着，[p/]直到皮尔斯勋爵能以可能的嫌疑人身份接受调查。

original: Aria: A “possible suspect”?
translation: Aria: “可能的嫌疑人”?

original: Aria: The very idea of that is preposterous, Your Honor.
translation: Aria: 这个想法本身就很荒谬，法官阁下。

original: Damn it…[p/] You knew she was planning something.
translation: 该死的……[p/]你就知道她早有谋划。

original: Aria: Let’s revisit the basic facts of this case, shall we?
translation: Aria: 我们来重新回顾一下案件的基本事实，好吗？

original: Aria: Flinhart McCoy was murdered using a blade with a [b]transmutation[/b] spell active on it.
translation: Aria: 弗林哈特·麦考伊是被一把附有[b]形变术[/b]的刃器杀害的。

original: Aria: Mr. Cuthbert,[p/] why don’t you tell me the spells that Lord Pierce knows?
translation: Aria: 卡斯伯特先生，[p/]要不你来告诉我皮尔斯勋爵知晓的法术都有哪些吧？

original: Tyrion: Um…[p/] Alright.
translation: Tyrion: 呃……[p/]好吧。

original: Tyrion: His spells are: [b]Prestidigitation[/b],[p/] [b]Conjure Light[/b],[p/] [b]Conjure Water[/b],[p/] [b]Frost Wave[/b],[p/] and [b]Shape Liquid[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 他拥有的法术有: [b]魔术戏法[/b]，[p/][b]祈愿光芒[/b]，[p/][b]造水术[/b]，[p/][b]霜波[/b]，[p/]以及[b]形变液体[/b]。

original: Tyrion: …
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: …!
translation: Tyrion: ……!

original: Aria: You’ve realized it too, haven’t you?
translation: Aria: 你也意识到了，不是吗?

original: Aria: Lord Pierce doesn’t [i]know[/i] any [b]transmutation[/b] spells that can be channeled through a solid object!
translation: Aria: 皮尔斯勋爵<u>并不知道</u>任何能用于固体的[b]形变术[/b]！

original: Tyrion: What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么？！

original: Tyrion: T-[p/]that…[p/][s/] That can’t be right!
translation: Tyrion: 这、[p/]这……[p/][s/]这不可能！

original: Garrick: ...!
translation: Garrick: …...！

original: Garrick: Ha![p/][s/] You’re right![p/][s/] You’re absolutely right, Lady Steelwind!
translation: Garrick: 哈！[p/][s/]你说得对啊！[p/][s/]你说得完全正确，斯蒂尔文德女士！

original: Garrick: I couldn’t have [b]possibly[/b] committed the murder.
translation: Garrick:我本来就[b]不可能[/b]实施这次谋杀。

original: Judge: I see…
translation: Judge: 我明白了……

original: Judge: With that in mind,[p/] that would leave the defendant as the only possible killer.
translation: Judge: 考虑到这一点，[p/]那被告就是唯一可能的凶手。

original: Celeste: But he was the only other mage there!
translation: Celeste: 但他是当时除我以外在场的唯一一个法师！

original: Celeste: He [i]has[/i] to be the real murderer!
translation: Celeste: 真凶<u>只可能</u>是他！

original: Tyrion: But he doesn’t know any [b]transmutation[/b] spells that can affect a solid object.
translation: Tyrion: 但他确实不知道任何可以影响固体的[b]形变术[/b]。

original: Tyrion: We can’t prove that he stabbed him while casting magic.
translation: Tyrion: 我们没法证明他在施放魔法时刺杀了被害人。

original: Celeste: Wait a minute…
translation: Celeste: 等一下……

original: Celeste: How did he do it then?
translation: Celeste: 那他怎么做到的呢？

original: Tyrion: …!
translation: Tyrion: ……！

original: She’s right![p/] How [i]did[/i] he do it?
translation: 她说到点子上了！[p/]他<u>怎么</u>做到的？

original: If there are traces of [b]transmutation[/b] magic on the wound…[p/] then Flinhart was definitely stabbed by something magical.
translation: 如果伤口上有[b]形变术[/b]魔法痕迹的话……[p/]那么弗林哈特必然是被魔法相关的什么东西刺杀的。

original: But none of his [b]transmutation[/b] spells can affect a steel blade…
translation: 但他没有能影响钢剑的[b]形变术[/b]魔法……

original: ...Does that mean that he used something else?
translation: ……是否意味着他使用了其他东西？

original: Judge: The defense [i]did[/i] cast some doubt on this witness’s testimony.
translation: Judge: 辩护人<u>确实</u>提出了一些证词的疑点。

original: Judge: Nevertheless,[p/] I must conclude that he could not have possibly committed the murder.
translation: Judge: 然而，[p/]我的结论还是他没有可能实施谋杀。

original: Judge: With that in mind-
translation: Judge: 考虑到这一点——

original: Tyrion: Please wait, Your Honor!
translation: Tyrion: 请等一下，法官阁下！

original: Tyrion: We still can’t conclude that Lord Pierce couldn’t have committed the crime.
translation: Tyrion: 我们还不能得出皮尔斯勋爵没有可能实施谋杀的结论！

original: Garrick: What are you on about?
translation: Garrick: 你在说什么呢？

original: Garrick: Lady Steelwind said it herself, you commoner!
translation: Garrick: 斯蒂尔文德女士已经说过了，你这平民！

original: Garrick: I don’t know any spells that can be channeled through a metal blade!
translation: Garrick: 我根本不知道任何能用于金属刃器的法术！

original: Tyrion: …
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: He's right...[p/] Which can only mean one thing...
translation: 他说得对……[p/]因此这只意味着一件事。

original: Tyrion: You didn’t use a metal blade, did you?
translation: Tyrion: 你并没有使用金属刃器，不是吗？

original: Garrick: …
translation: Garrick: ……

original: Garrick: …!
translation: Garrick: ……！

original: Aria: What nonsense is this?
translation: Aria: 这都是什么无稽之谈?

original: Aria: The autopsy report clearly states that the wound was created by a blade.
translation: Aria: 尸检报告已经清楚地表明伤口是刃器造成的。

original: Aria: If he didn’t channel magic through a blade,[p/] how could he have possibly committed the crime?
translation: Aria: 如果他没有他通过刃器施放魔法，[p/]他又怎么可能实施这次犯罪呢？

original: Judge: Yes,[p/] your claim seems quite contrary to the facts thus far, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Judge: 是的，[p/]你的主张看起来与目前已知的事实有矛盾，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Judge: Which spell could Lord Pierce have possibly used to kill the victim?
translation: Judge: 哪种法术是皮尔斯勋爵可能用于杀死被害人的？

original: Judge: Um...[p/] What's this?
translation: Judge: 嗯……[p/]这是什么？

original: Tyrion: [i]This[/i] is the spell that Lord Pierce used to commit the murder.
translation: Tyrion: [i]这就是[/i]皮尔斯勋爵用于事实谋杀的那个法术。

original: Aria: Mr. Cuthbert,[p/] I fail to see how [i]that[/i] could have killed the victim [i]and[/i] left a trace of [b]transmutation[/b].
translation: Aria: 卡斯伯特先生，[p/]我不明白<u>这</u>是怎么杀死被害人<u>并</u>留下了[b]形变术[/b]痕迹的。

original: Tyrion: You simply lack imagination, Ms. Steelwind.
translation: Tyrion: 只是你缺乏想象力，斯蒂尔文德女士。

original: Aria: No.[p/] [i]You[/i] just lack common sense, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 并不。[p/]只是<u>你</u>缺少常识，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Looking back on it,[p/] Pierce probably used something else to kill Flinhart.
translation: 回想一下，[p/]皮尔斯可能是用其他东西杀死了弗林哈特。

original: ...But what was it?
translation: ……但到底是什么东西？

original: Tyrion: You see, Your Honor.
translation: Tyrion: 你知道的，法官阁下。

original: Tyrion: Garrick Pierce didn’t kill the victim using a sword…
translation: Tyrion: 加里克·皮尔斯并没有用剑杀死被害人……

original: Tyrion: He killed him using an object shaped [i]exactly[/i] like a sword!
translation: Tyrion: 他是用一个形状和剑<u>完全</u>一样的东西杀死了被害人！

original: Garrick: …!
translation: Garrick: ……！

original: Aria: What…?
translation: Aria: 什么……？

original: Judge: I’m…[p/] afraid I don’t quite understand, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Judge: 我……[p/]可能没太明白，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Tyrion: I’d like for the court to take a look at Lord Pierce’s [b]Spell Compendium[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 各位请仔细看看皮尔斯勋爵的[b]法术汇编[/b]。

original: Tyrion: Garrick Pierce knows a seemingly insignificant spell called [b]Shape Liquid[/b].
translation: Tyrion: 加里克·皮尔斯知道如何释放一个叫做[b]形变液体[/b]的魔法。

original: Tyrion: With it,[p/] he can control a body of water,[p/] and shape it into any complex shape he wants.
translation: Tyrion: 他能用此魔法来控制任意液体，[p/]并将其形变成他想要的形状。

original: Tyrion: Then he can freeze that liquid,[p/][s/] maintaining its current shape!
translation: Tyrion: 然后他能冻住液体，[p/][s/]保持其形变后的形状！

original: Tyrion: A shape like a sword!
translation: Tyrion: 形变成一把剑再简单不过了！

original: Aria: What?!
translation: Aria: 什……什么?!

original: Aria: No![p/] Is it possible that he…?
translation: Aria: 不！[p/]难道他真的……？

original: Tyrion: What do you have to say for yourself, [i]"Lord"[/i] Pierce?
translation: Tyrion: 你有什么要为自己辩解的吗？皮尔斯<u>“勋爵”</u>？

original: Garrick: …
translation: Garrick: ……

original: Garrick: What do I have to say?
translation: Garrick: 我需要辩解什么？

original: Pierce’s breathing becomes more frantic.[p/] He’s clearly not used to being put in a corner like this.
translation: 皮尔斯的呼吸逐渐紧促，[p/]他很显然不太习惯这种被逼到角落的感觉。

original: You can see his stress and frustration emanating through the Eye of Horus.
translation: 你能通过荷鲁斯之眼看清他的压力和紧张。

original: …You have him now.[p/] Time for the finishing blow.
translation: ……差不多可以最后一击了。

original: There are some candles lighting up the hallway.
translation: 墙上的蜡烛点亮了整条走廊。

original: They look like they used to be a part of the old architecture.
translation: 看起来是自酒馆建成以来就有的内饰。

original: Several doors lead to guest rooms.
translation: 有几扇通向客房的门。

original: Aside from the rooms that you and Ms. Tymora used,[p/] they don't look like they've been open for quite some time.
translation: 除了你与泰摩拉女士住的那两间，[p/]其他房门看起来很久没有开过了。

original: There's a door at the end of the hallway.
translation: 走廊的尽头有一个房间。

original: It looks like it's seen some use recently.
translation: 看起来最近经常开关。

original: You try to open the door,[p/] but it seems to be locked.
translation: 你试着开门，[p/]但是门被锁住了。

original: Perhaps someone might have a key to open it.
translation: 别人可能有钥匙。

original: Aria: If people keep seeing you here,[p/] they're going to start asking questions.
translation: Aria: 要是人们看见你在这乱逛，[p/]他们肯定会问东问西。

original: Aria: Leave the investigation to me.[p/] All you have to do is stay quiet until the trial is over.
translation: Aria: 把调查交给我，[p/]你只需要审理结束前保持安静。

original: While heading upstairs,[p/] you spot the prosecutor having a conversation with someone.
translation: 上楼的时候，[p/]你发现检察官在和某人谈论着什么。

original: They seem to be in some kind of argument.
translation: 听起来在争论什么。

original: Garrick: Enough![p/] [i]I[/i] will do as I see fit.
translation: Garrick: 够了！不用你来教<u>我</u>做事。

original: Garrick: You may be a Steelwind,[p/] but this is [i]my[/i] land.
translation: Garrick: 就算你是斯蒂尔文德家的人，也不能在<u>我的</u>领地上指手画脚。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh,[p/] sorry.
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/][s/]噢，[p/][s/]不好意思。

original: Garrick: Oh?[p/] You're that defense attorney from the trial.
translation: Garrick: 哦？[p/]你是那个辩护律师。

original: Tyrion: I am...
translation: Tyrion: 是我……

original: Tyrion: I'm sorry...[p/] But who-?
translation: Tyrion: 请问你是——？

original: Garrick: Ah,[p/] how rude of me.
translation: Garrick: 啊，[p/]失礼了。

original: Garrick: My name is [i]Lord[/i] Garrick Pierce,[p/] the ruling noble of this land.
translation: Garrick: 我是加里克·皮尔斯<u>勋爵</u>，[p/]统治这片土地的贵族。

original: Garrick: [i]As[/i] the ruling noble,[p/] I suppose I should thank you for playing your role in the current trial.
translation: Garrick: <u>作为</u>这里的统治者，[p/]我大概应该感谢你在法庭上尽自己的责任。

original: Garrick: ...As misguided as it may be.
translation: Garrick: ……虽然你是向着错误的方向努力。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Tyrion: ...I suppose that [i]you[/i] also think my client is guilty?
translation: Tyrion: ……我可以理解为<u>你</u>也认为我的委托人有罪吗？

original: Garrick: It does not matter what [i]I[/i] think.
translation: Garrick: 这与<u>我的</u>观点无关。

original: Garrick: This entire scandal has done nothing but rile up the commonfolk.
translation: Garrick: 这个丑闻只会激怒平民。

original: Garrick: Magic is a gift for the nobility and the nobility alone.
translation: Garrick: 魔法是上天给予贵族的礼物，而且仅应贵族享有。

original: Garrick: It is a symbol of the aristocracy and our divine right to rule.
translation: Garrick: 它是高贵的象征，是上天给予我们的神圣统治权。

original: Garrick: And now that [i]bastard[/i] child has tainted that symbol in the public eye.
translation: Garrick: 那个<u>野种</u>的所作所为玷污了平民眼里的象征。

original: Tyrion: All of that has nothing to do with her!
translation: Tyrion: 这和她毫无关系！

original: Tyrion: She's just an innocent woman who got wrapped up in all of this!
translation: Tyrion: 她只是个不幸卷入这一切的可怜人！

original: Garrick: Even if she [i]is[/i] innocent,[p/] the charges have been laid and made public.
translation: Garrick: 即使她<u>是</u>无辜的，[p/]指控也已经公之于众。

original: Garrick: Someone must take the fall,[p/] lest the public accuse the justice system of corruption.
translation: Garrick: 必须有人伏法，[p/]以免公众指责司法系统的腐败。

original: Tyrion: So you're saying that she should be found guilty even if she's innocent?!
translation: Tyrion: 你是说即便她是无辜的也要被判有罪吗？！

original: Garrick: What do you suppose will happen if she's acquitted?
translation: Garrick: 你以为她被无罪释放会有什么后果？

original: Garrick: All the public will see is a mage going free despite a myriad of evidence.
translation: Garrick: 公众看到的只会是法师在无数证据指控下依然脱罪。

original: Garrick: [i]That[/i] alone would be enough to cause public outrage.
translation: Garrick: <u>仅此一项</u>就足以引起众怒。

original: Garrick: Tensions between the aristocracy and the commonfolk are high enough as is.
translation: Garrick: 贵族与平民之间的阶级矛盾已经足够尖锐。

original: Garrick: What is one [i]insignificant[/i] girl when compared to the stability of our great kingdom?
translation: Garrick: 一个<u>无关紧要的</u>女孩怎么能和伟大王国的稳定相比？

original: Tyrion: That's-!
translation: Tyrion: 你这——！

original: Aria: That's enough.[p/] Stop antagonizing him, Pierce.
translation: Aria: 够了。[p/]不要继续让他敌视你了，皮尔斯。

original: Garrick: ...Hmph.
translation: Garrick: ……哼。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: I can't refute what he said,[p/] but I don't agree with it.
translation: Aria: 我没办法反驳他的理论，[p/]但我也并不认同。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Aria: The system should be based on truth and justice,[p/] not on public opinion.
translation: Aria: 司法系统应基于真相和正义，[p/]而非公众看法。

original: Tyrion: Then why are you working against my client?!
translation: Tyrion: 那你为什么还在试图指控我的委托人？！

original: Tyrion: Do you honestly think she's the kind of person that would kill her father?!
translation: Tyrion: 你真的认为她是那种会杀害自己父亲的人吗？！

original: Aria: It doesn't matter what kind of person she [i]appears[/i] to be.
translation: Aria: 她<u>看起来</u>是什么样的人并不重要。

original: Aria: The evidence clearly points to her as the only possible killer.
translation: Aria: 证据清晰指明她是唯一可能作案的人。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Aria: But you should fight according to your own ideals.
translation: Aria: 但你应该为根据自己的原则作战。

original: Aria: Just as I will fight for mine.
translation: Aria: 这也是我的作战理念。

original: It's hard to get a read on that woman.
translation: 你很难阅读这个女人的想法。

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of a knight.
translation: Tyrion: 一幅骑士的画像。

original: Tyrion: There's some text under it.
translation: Tyrion: 下面写着什么。

original: Tyrion: "Sir Diogo:[p/] former Commander of the Arcane Inquisition."
translation: Tyrion: "Diogo 阁下：前奥术裁判所指挥官。"

original: Tyrion: "Well-beloved by both the people and his fellow knights."
translation: Tyrion: “深受人民和下属骑士们的爱戴。”

original: Tyrion: "After many years of service,[p/] Commander Diogo retired with honors."
translation: Tyrion: “经过多年的辛勤工作，[p/] Diogo指挥官光荣退休。”

original: Tyrion: "With this plaque,[p/] we thank and honor him for his dedication and commitment to the kingdom of Wyverngarde."
translation: Tyrion: “谨以此画像感谢他为维文加德所作出的贡献，并为他献上最崇高的敬意。”

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of a knight.
translation: Tyrion: 一幅骑士的画像。

original: Tyrion: There's some text under it.
translation: Tyrion: 下面写着什么。

original: Tyrion: "General David Serrano:[p/] former Chief of the Kingsguard."
translation: Tyrion: “David Serrano 将军：前国王卫队队长。”

original: Tyrion: "A beloved ally of House Steelwind who served during the Great Luminite War."
translation: Tyrion: “一位深受爱戴的斯蒂尔文德家盟友，曾参与了大圣战。”

original: Tyrion: "The annals of history have countless tales of his courage,[p/] wit,[p/] and heroism."
translation: Tyrion: “史记上记载了无数关于他充满勇气，[p/]智慧，[p/]英雄气概的故事。”

original: Tyrion: "With this plaque,[p/] we thank and honor him for coming to the defense of our kingdom in our greatest time of need."
translation: Tyrion: “借此画像感谢他在我们最需要的时候保卫了王国。”

original: Tyrion: It's a bench outside the courtroom.
translation: Tyrion: 法庭外的长椅。

original: Tyrion: I used to sit here as a child when Ms. Tymora was defending her clients.
translation: Tyrion: 小时候，泰摩拉女士为委托人辩护时，我会坐在这里等她。

original: Tyrion: This door leads to the courtroom.
translation: Tyrion: 这扇门通向法庭。

original: Tyrion: The fates of countless people have been decided beyond these doors.
translation: Tyrion: 这扇门后决定过无数人的生死。

original: Ruby: ...You haven't really found out [i]anything[/i], have you?
translation: Ruby: ……你还没找到<u>任何</u>线索对吧？

original: Tyrion: S-[p/]Sorry...[p/] I just thought I'd check with you first.
translation: Tyrion: 抱歉……[p/]我就想先回来和你汇报一下。

original: Ruby: I can't always hold your hand, Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: 我没办法一直把着你的手教你，卡斯伯特。

original: Ruby: You need to MOVE to the crime scene and look for evidence that you can use.
translation: Ruby: 你得<size=1.5em>移动</size>去犯罪现场，寻找用得上的证据。

original: Tyrion: I found a lot of clues...[p/] But they don't really tell me what happened.
translation: Tyrion: 我找到不少线索……[p/]但我还是不清楚到底发生了什么。

original: Ruby: Even so...[p/] Knowing the state of a crime scene is instrumental to cross-examining witnesses.
translation: Ruby: 即使如此……[p/]了解犯罪现场的情况也是交叉询问的关键。

original: Right...[p/] You'll probably want to make a habit of remembering what you've learned about the crime scene.
translation: 没错……[p/]你应该养成记住犯罪现场里每一个细节的习惯。

original: Tyrion: It seems Flinhart was a complicated man...
translation: Tyrion: 弗林哈特看起来是个扑朔迷离的男人……

original: Ruby: Well, it's not uncommon for people like him to despise magic.
translation: Ruby: 哎，他那样的人鄙视魔法很寻常。

original: Ruby: To them,[p/] magic is a symbol of the nobility and the Crown.
translation: Ruby: 对于他们来说，[p/]魔法是贵族与皇室的象征。

original: Tyrion: But it's as if he hates magic [i]specifically[/i].[p/] There [i]has[/i] to be an explanation for that.
translation: Tyrion: 但是他的恨意<u>只针对</u>魔法。[p/]这背后<u>一定</u>有什么原因。

original: Ruby: You've definitely learned a lot.
translation: Ruby: 你成长了很多。

original: Ruby: You did well for your first time, Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: 卡斯伯特，对于第一次来说你做得很好。

original: But only time will tell if it was all worth it.
translation: 但只有时间才能证明这到底值不值得。

original: ...And you still want to speak with Celeste before this is all over.
translation: ……在一切都结束之前你还想和塞莱斯特聊聊。

original: Tyrion: Where should I go next, Ms. Tymora?
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士，我接下来该去哪里？

original: Ruby: Well...[p/] You haven't really [i]gone[/i] anywhere.
translation: Ruby: 这个……[p/]你还哪里<u>都没去</u>呢。

original: Ruby: You should really head to the crime scene.
translation: Ruby: 你真的应该先去犯罪现场看看。

original: Tyrion: R-[p/][s/]Right...[p/] Of course.
translation: Tyrion: 对、[p/][s/]对的……[p/]当然了。

original: Tyrion: Where should I go next, Ms. Tymora?
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士，我接下来该去哪里？

original: Ruby: The Inquisition should be done questioning Celeste by now.
translation: Ruby: 现在这个时间，裁判所对塞莱斯特的询问应该结束了。

original: Ruby: You'll want to talk to her and find out why she was arguing with Flinhart.
translation: Ruby: 你应该找她谈谈，问问她当时和弗林哈特在吵什么。

original: Tyrion: Where should I go next, Ms. Tymora?
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士，我接下来该去哪里？

original: Ruby: Well...[p/] The client [i]gave[/i] you the key to her room, right?
translation: Ruby: 嗯……[p/]委托人<u>给</u>了你房间钥匙对吧？

original: Ruby: It's the only place you haven't checked.
translation: Ruby: 那是你唯一一处没调查过的地方了。

original: Ruby: You might find something useful there.
translation: Ruby: 应该能找到些有用的情报。

original: Ruby: You've definitely learned a lot.
translation: Ruby: 你成长了很多。

original: Ruby: I think you've definitely collected enough evidence for the upcoming trial.
translation: Ruby: 我认为你已经了收集足够多的证据。

original: But there's one last thing you need to do.
translation: 但还有件事必须去做。

original: You [i]need[/i] to talk to Celeste about her father.
translation: 你<u>需要</u>和塞莱斯特谈谈她父亲的事。

original: Ruby: ...Don't waste my time, Cuthbert.
translation: Ruby: ……卡斯伯特，别浪费我的时间。

original: Tyrion: S-[p/][s/]Sorry....
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉……

original: Ruby: Oh, Cuthbert.[p/] You're back already.
translation: Ruby: 卡斯伯特，[p/]这么快就回来了？

original: Tyrion: Sorry...[p/] I guess I'm just a little lost about where to go next.
translation: Tyrion: 抱歉……[p/]我有点不知道该去哪儿了。

original: Ruby: Hm...[p/] Well, I suppose I can give you some guidance...[p/] [i]this[/i] time.
translation: Ruby: 嗯……[p/]好吧，那<u>这次</u>我就提点你一下……

original: Player: Flinhart didn't move during the murder
translation: Player: 弗林哈特 谋杀 过程中 没有移动

translation: Player: 弗林哈特 在袭击中 掉落 瓶子

translation: Player: 谋杀 过程中 犯罪现场 没有照明

original: Orym: It’s true that the sword itself isn’t magical.[p/] But magic can still be channeled through it.
translation: Orym: 那把剑本身确实没有魔法属性，[p/]但是魔法依然可以被附在上面。

original: Orym: That defendant over there? [p/] Her [b]Spell Compendium[/b] has a spell called “[b]Mage Blade[/b]”.
translation: Orym: 被告的[b]法术汇编[/b]证实，她会一种叫做“[b]法术剑刃[/b]”的法术。

original: Orym: She must have used it on her sword [i]before[/i] stabbing the victim.
translation: Orym: 她一定在刺杀受害者<u>之前</u>用了这个法术给剑附魔。

original: Orym: [i]That[/i] spell is the reason why there were traces of [b]Transmutation[/b] magic on the wound.
translation: Orym: 这就是伤口上有[b]形变术[/b]痕迹的原因。

original: Orym: You can see it right in this photo. She killed him with a stab from the front.
translation: Orym: 如图片所示，她从正面一刀捅死了他。

original: Player: Overflow
translation: Player: 溢出

original: Player: Objection
translation: Player: 异议

original: Orym: We got a call late at night. Someone discovered a dead body inside the McCoy Tavern.
translation: Orym: 我们深夜时分接到报警。[p/]有人在麦考伊酒馆内发现了一具尸体。

original: Orym: When we arrived on the scene,[p/] we found Flinhart McCoy dead on the floor. The defendant’s sword was still inside of him.
translation: Orym: 当我们赶到现场时，[p/]我们发现了地板上已经死亡的弗林哈特·麦考伊。[p/]被告的剑仍插在受害者的身上。

original: Orym: We have several witnesses who heard the victim and defendant in a loud argument before the body was discovered.
translation: Orym: 尸体被发现之前，有几个证人听到了受害者与被告的激烈争吵。

original: Orym: Their argument must have turned ugly.[p/] Because the defendant killed the victim using her magic sword.
translation: Orym: 他们的争吵十分激烈，以至于被告用她的魔法剑杀害了受害者。

original: Player: Overflow
translation: Player: 溢出

original: Player: Objection
translation: Player: 异议

original: Rhys: I was transporting a client in my carriage that evening.
translation: Rhys: 那晚，我正载着一位客人。

original: Rhys: We were driving by the McCoy Tavern when we heard a disturbance.[p/] This occurred at 1:28 am.
translation: Rhys: 我们路过麦考伊的酒馆时听到了一阵骚乱，[p/]当时是凌晨 1:28。

original: Rhys: Worried that something was amiss,[p/] I walked into the establishment to see what the commotion was about.
translation: Rhys: 由于担心会出什么事，[p/]我走进了酒馆一探究竟。

original: Rhys: There I saw the defendant.[p/] She was lit by the blue glow of the dining room lights.[p/][s/] She had stabbed Flinhart McCoy and was channeling magic into her sword!
translation: Rhys: 就在那时我看见了被告。[p/]餐厅里蔚蓝的微光照亮了她的身影。[p/][s/]她当时正用自己附魔的剑刺向受害者！

original: Rhys: She removed her sword from Flinhart’s back,[p/] and as he slowly turned to face her,[p/][s/] she stabbed him again in the front!
translation: Rhys: 她拔出剑，[p/] 就在弗林哈特转身看向她的时候，[p/][s/]她又从正面刺了他一剑！

original: Rhys: She soon realized that I had witnessed her heinous crime.[p/] She let the body fall to the ground and fled the scene.
translation: Rhys: 她马上就意识到我目睹了她的暴行。[p/]她顾不上倒地的尸体，马上逃离了现场。

original: Player: Overflow
translation: Player: 溢出

original: Player: Objection
translation: Player: 异议

original: Rhys: I remember now![p/][s/] Yesterday,[p/] it was revealed that Flinhart was killed using magic!
translation: Rhys: 我现在想起来了！[p/][s/]昨天，[p/]你们揭示弗林哈特是被魔法杀害的！

original: Rhys: I must have seen Flinhart’s daughter channeling a magic spell.
translation: Rhys: 我看到的肯定是弗林哈特的女儿在使用某种法术。

original: Rhys: The spell was called “[b]Mage Blade[/b]”,[p/] am I correct?
translation: Rhys: 那个法术叫“[b]法术剑刃[/b]”对吧？

original: Rhys: That’s it![p/][s/] The blue glow that I saw must have been created by [b]Mage Blade[/b]!
translation: Rhys: 就是那个！[p/][s/]一定是[b]法术剑刃[/b]释放出的蓝光！

original: Player: Overflow
translation: Player: 溢出

original: Player: Objection
translation: Player: 异议

original: Garrick: On the night of the murder,[p/] I found myself unable to sleep.[p/] So, I went on a leisurely carriage ride around Kornhaven.
translation: Garrick: 案发当晚，[p/]我难以入睡。[p/]于是我乘马车在科尔哈文附近散心。

original: Garrick: I happened to be passing by the McCoy tavern when I heard a loud commotion from within the building.
translation: Garrick: 经过麦考伊酒馆时，我恰好听到屋内一阵骚乱。

original: Garrick: Curious,[p/] I stopped my carriage and took a single step inside the establishment.[p/][s/] That is when I saw the scene inside!
translation: Garrick: 好奇心作祟，[p/]我下车刚向里踏进一步，[p/][s/]就看到了里面的情形！

original: Garrick: I used [b]Conjure Light[/b] to illuminate the scene from the tavern entrance. From there, I clearly saw the crime unfold!
translation: Garrick: 我在旅馆门口用了[b]祈愿光芒[/b]照亮现场。在那里，我清晰看见了犯罪的全过程！

original: Garrick: I saw the defendant stabbing that poor man twice with her sword!
translation: Garrick: 我看见被告用她的剑捅了受害者两次！

original: Player: Overflow
translation: Player: 溢出

original: Player: Objection
translation: Player: 异议
